WHEN THEY TEAMED UP ON THE BEACH-THEY WERE ONE POTENT FUCKIN' FORCE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3995024395134298233\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_159M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html?showComment=1518568565432#c3995024395134298233\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 14, 2018 at 6:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_159MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID-- THERE IS A LATEST FAD OF BILLIONAIRES GIVING AWAY THEIR WEALTH ( MENTIONED IN THEIR WILLS ) LEAVING ASIDE A SMALL PERCENTAGE FOR THEIR CHILDREN TO TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES AND THE IMMEDIATE FIRST GENERATION CHILDREN THEY PRODUCE.<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE ANSWER?<br />\n<br />\nTHESE BILLIONAIRES UNDERSTAND THE PHILOSOPHY OF SANATANA DHARMA -- OR REBIRTH<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR-- WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT \"YOU\"<br />\n<br />\nYOU ARE ARE SEEING A HUMAN CADAVER IN WHICH YOU HAVE TAKEN SHELTER FOR THIS BIRTH ON PLANET EARTH -- LIKE A HAT OR A SHIRT<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY YOU WILL DIE AND YOUR SOUL ( YOU- A BALL OF ENERGY ) WILL EXIT -- AND PARK IN ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAITING NEXT RE-INDUCTION ON PLANET EARTH IN THE BODY OF A BABY IN SOME MOTHERs WOMB --COULD BE SOMALIA / JAPAN / AFRICA / ALASKA --WHATEVER<br />\n<br />\nNOW UNDERSTAND THE WISDOM<br />\n<br />\nYOU ARE ON A RAFT FLOATING ON A RIVER. THIS RAFT IF SWIFTLY GOING DOWN STREAM PROPELLED BY THE RIVER CURRENT TOWARDS A WATERFALL -- FOR THE FINAL PLUNGE( DEATH )...<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT STOP THIS PLUNGE TO DEATH<br />\n<br />\nWHILE ON THE RAFT , YOU ARE FISHING .. YOU CANT EAT MORE THAN 3 FISHES DAY<br />\n<br />\nYET SOME GREEDY CRIMINALS , THEY STEAL FISH FROM OTHER RAFTS .. THEY OVERFISH AND STORE THESE FISHES IN A FISH BANK ASHORE --THE BANKS ( CALL IT A COMPUTER )<br />\n<br />\nRICH CRIMINALS CAN NEVER SEE ALL THE FISH ( MONEY ) THEY HAVE STASHED AWAY ASHORE<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE USE OF ALL THIS HOARDED FISH ( MONEY -LAND -GOLD ) ?<br />\n<br />\nFOR ALL YOUR KNOW, YOUR GRANDCHILD MAY BE THE PERSON ( SOUL ) FROM WHOSE RAFT YOU STOLE FISH --IN HIS NEXT BIRTH<br />\n<br />\nWHERE IS THE WISDOM IN STEALING AND HOARDING FISH FOR NEXT 100 GENERATIONS?<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD HAS CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\nIN HIS NEXT LIFE HE COULD BE SOME PIRATE IN SOMALIA OR SOME ROHINGYA REFUGEE IN SOME CAMP<br />\n<br />\nAFTER DEATH -- THE KING AND THE PAWN GOES INTO THE SAME BOX ( ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS )<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS ALL THIS BULLSHIT ONE-UP-MANSHIP WHILE ALIVE ?<br />\n<br />\nBE HAPPY WHILE ALIVE-- DONT OVERFISH -- FISH ENOUGH TO PROVIDE FOR YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN ( WHO WILL TAKE CARE OF THEIR OWN CHILDREN WITH SOME LEFT OVER FISH --IF REQUIRED )<br />\n<br />\nYOUR WORST ENEMY TODAY COULD BE YOUR GREAT GRANDSON<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER-- WE WERE ALL BORN WITH THE STARS --AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.. YOU GREAT GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WERE BORN AT THE SAME INSTANT.<br />\n<br />\nWHO AM I ?<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU UNDERSTAND THIS --AND LIVE IN THE MOMENT --YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE WILL REDUCE --BECAUSE YOU WILL NOT BE A SON OF A BITCH AFTER THAT<br />\n<br />\nDEATH IS A GREAT LEVELLER<br />\n<br />\nTHE PURPOSE OF LIFE IS TO BE HAPPY ( NOT BY SCREWING SOMEBODY ELSEs HAPPINESS ) -AND BEING CREATIVE -- AND GRACEFUL.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/happiness-from-within-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent SIR John Malcolm (\nGovernnor of Bombay ) met Swaminarayan in Feb, 1830 and Rothschild\u2019s media did\ngreat propaganda that this book SHIKSHAPATRI was presented to him . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">They did propaganda that this book is a\nprized item at the Bodleian Library of the University of Oxford. This book was\ntranslated by Rothschild into almost all major languages of this planet including\nHebrew .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">JEW Rothschild built the nine mandirs in\nGujarat ( land donated ) : Ahmedabad, Mooli, Bhuj, Vadtal, Jetalpur, Dholera,\nDholka, Junagadh and Gadhada. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Now agent PM Modi wants to spread this\nbullshit BHAKTI movement &nbsp;sect \u2013which does\nNOT belong to Sanatana Dharma . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">At &nbsp;Sanagpur\nRothschild built a Hanuman temple. Hanuman is just a monkey in Ramayana-&nbsp; Ram is the god.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">IN ALL HINDU TEMPLES MEN AND WOMEN WORSHIP\nTOGETHER.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN SWAMINARAYAN TEMPLES MEN AND WOMEN ARE\nSEGREGATED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">SANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW OPULENCE IN\nTEMPLES.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TEMPLES MUST NECESSARILY BE\nA SIMPLE STRUCTURE OF STONE . font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN I RUSHED OUT OF\nTHE LOUNGE, MY CREW THOUGHT- OH CAPTAIN MUST HAVE REMEMBERED SOME IMPORTANT\nWORK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I JUST RAN TO MY CABIN\nTO SHUT THE DOOR AND HAVE A HUGE LOUD BELLY LAUGH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHIVANI VERMAs ROCKET\nSCIENCE NEVER FAILED TO GIVE ME A HUGE BELLY LAUGH--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HER SMUG FACE WHILE SHE\nDISHED OUT HER ROCKET SCIENCE --AND THE EAGER \" I NEED MORE OF THIS\"\nGAAAY FACE OF SURESH OBEROI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD DIVIDED\nINDIA EVERY WHICH WAY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE NOT EVEN TOLD 2%\nOF IT. I HAVE TO ADMIT , ROTHSCHILD SUCCEEDED IN HIS UNDERWEAR--NAY--ENDEAVOUR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 13, 2018 at 7:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain,<br />\ngood post. i wanted to ask you about this temple in UAE when I saw it in TOI. people were going ga ga ga.<br />\nBut it is a Swaminarayan temple, which is a sect not mainstream/classical. mainstream temples simply do not have that kind of money or political muscle to build lavish temples world wide. mainstream gurus don't have the money to build posh 'ashrams' like triple sri and jaggi.<br />\nthanks for jumping on this so quick. i have been to Swaminarayan temples where you even leave your footwear in segregated men and women areas. that is more like a Islaminarayan temple.<br />\nDid Modi spend time in Himalayas or in a Swaminarayan abode? , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">India is named Bharata after the son of Rishabha \u2013NOT the FAKE Bharat , son of FAKE Shaktuntala cooked up by Jew Rothschild\u2014written by FAKE Kalidasa .</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; / TAla )&nbsp;</b></div>\n</span><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kalidasa-did-not-exist-jainism-is.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html?showComment=1518520077989#c5743212353985020340\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 13, 2018 at 4:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_78MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHERE IS THE RSS CHIEFS LIST<br />\n<br />\nSEE THEIR FACE CLOSEUPS--CHECK CLOSEUP VIDEOS OF THE DEAD ONES<br />\n<br />\nFIND OUT HOW MANY HAVE PALE EYES ????<br />\n<br />\nFIND OUT HOW MANY HAVE MARRIED ????<br />\n<br />\nThe individuals who have held the post of Sarsanghchalak in this organisation are:<br />\n<br />\nK. B. Hedgewar (1925\u20131930. ...<br />\nLaxman Vaman Paranjpe (1930\u20131931)<br />\nM. S. Sudarshan (2000\u20132009)<br />\nMohan Bhagwat (incumbent since 21 March 2009)<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/rss-rashtriya-swayamsevak-sangh-brief.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_79b+seed9gCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_79b+seed9gCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\nMS GOLVALKAR KNEW MY DAD BY NAME WHEN HE WAS IN RSS .&nbsp; <br />\n<br />\nMY DAD VOUCHES THAT HE WAS A PATRIOT.<br />\n<br />\nSOMETIMES WHEN MY DAD WAS IN VERY HIGH SPIRITS --HE WOULD IMITATE THE BROKEN MALAYALAM OF GOLWALKAR&nbsp; ( WHEN HE CAME TO CALICUT )<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">KAIKE VAASTE KAIYYUM KAALUM&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b>( WHAT IS THE USE OF YOUR FUCKIN' HANDS AND LEGS )<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ERANJIPAALAM INDINJU POLINJU KADAL LEKKU JAAYANEGA&nbsp;</span></b> ( PEP TALK-- ERANJI BRIDGE SHALL SHAKE AND FALL INTO THE FUCKIN'&nbsp; SEA )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human ear has a\nvery limited range of perception. &nbsp;Dogs ,\ncats, dolphins, bats etcs have such an acute sense of hearing that they can\nperceive frequencies inaudible to the human ear. As the frequency becomes\nhigher, our ears fail to pick up the vibrations, although the sound is still\nthere. &nbsp;In the same way, although we do\nnot hear the subtler sound of the breath, it creates sound waves in the deeper\nrealms of our consciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the breath becomes\nfiner, the sound frequencies become more intense and subtle. &nbsp;&nbsp;They are heard internally from the\nsubconscious realm, then the unconscious and finally the superconscious where\nsound becomes transcendental. &nbsp;Normally\nwe are unable to perceive the existence of sound in those realms because we are\nunaware of those parts of our mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those centres of our brain are not active.\nBut when we can experience the subconscious area of the mind with awareness,\nthen the sounds manifesting in that realm also become audible. The same\nprinciple applies in regard to unconscious and transcendental vibrations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient maharishis &nbsp;who had contacted deeper layers of the mind\nthrough meditation perceived the sounds of subtler vibrations. Before entering\nthe transcendental state, they heard the sound of the outgoing and ingoing breath,\nthe sound of HAM SO. . . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound also exists in\nthe dimension of turiya, but then there is no individual mind to perceive it.\nThat is the sound of the vibration of the universe, the vibration of OM. In the\nunconscious realm there is the sound of HAM SO.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you remove the\nindividuality of the finite mind, the 'veil' between HAM &nbsp;(Shakti - the individual jiva) and SO (Shiva -\ncosmic consciousness) is lifted. The sound of the breath is the direct link\nbetween the lower and higher experience.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the transcendental\nsound of the breath is repeatedly perceived, the consciousness becomes\nliberated or freed from the Finite mind. &nbsp;The mantra of the breath releases the inherent\nenergies required for this liberation. This is not superstition , it is purely\nscientific.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every experience of the\nfive organs of sense and the five organs of action is stored in the\nsubconscious and unconscious mind in a particular geometrical form known as a\nyantra or archetype. When you see an object or smell an odour, when something\nmakes you happy or sad, the memory of that experience is stored in symbolic\nform, which represents the Whole experience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concentrating on the\nmantra or yantra of the breath is one of the most powerful methods of\nintroverting the restless mind. The process of concentration has four stages: introversion\n(pratyahara), concentration (dharana), meditation (dhyana) and finally\ntranscendence (samadhi). These four distinct stages represent the distances\nbetween the two aspects or poles of the mind and perception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During pratyahara the\ntwo poles of time and space begin to separate from normal conscious perception.\nIn dharana they reach their opposite position. In dhyana they begin to move\ncloser together and in samadhi they meet again at the nucleus. Then the\nexplosion takes place and awareness of the mantra is left behind in the reality\nof the finite mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus consciousness\nbreaks out of the limited, individual experience represented by HAM SO into the\ncosmic experience of OM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/shambhavi-mudra-bypassing-amygdala-by.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/shambhavi-mudra-bypassing-amygdala-by.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The techniques of yoga\nrestructure the internal body system so that prana can flow freely without\nblockages. The quantum of prana has to be increased so that it becomes powerful\nand vital. Only in this way can we awaken the dormant areas of the brain. This\nis where swara yoga becomes essential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5370034252099418829\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_115M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html?showComment=1518568245831#c618820442491589405\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 14, 2018 at 6:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_141MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE SAID--&nbsp; THERE IS A LATEST FAD OF BILLIONAIRES GIVING AWAY THEIR WEALTH ( MENTIONED IN THEIR WILLS ) LEAVING ASIDE A SMALL PERCENTAGE FOR THEIR CHILDREN TO TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES AND THE IMMEDIATE FIRST GENERATION CHILDREN THEY PRODUCE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS ALL THIS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ANSWER?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE BILLIONAIRES UNDERSTAND THE PHILOSOPHY OF SANATANA DHARMA -- OR REBIRTH</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LISTEN UP&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR-- WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT \"YOU\"&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU ARE ARE SEEING A HUMAN CADAVER IN WHICH YOU HAVE TAKEN SHELTER FOR THIS BIRTH ON PLANET EARTH&nbsp; -- LIKE A HAT OR A SHIRT&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE DAY YOU WILL DIE AND YOUR SOUL ( YOU- A BALL OF ENERGY&nbsp; ) WILL EXIT -- AND PARK IN ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAITING NEXT RE-INDUCTION ON PLANET EARTH IN THE BODY OF A BABY IN SOME MOTHERs WOMB --COULD BE SOMALIA / JAPAN / AFRICA / ALASKA --WHATEVER</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW UNDERSTAND THE WISDOM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU ARE ON A RAFT FLOATING ON A RIVER.&nbsp; &nbsp;THIS RAFT IF SWIFTLY GOING DOWN STREAM PROPELLED BY THE RIVER CURRENT TOWARDS A WATERFALL -- FOR THE FINAL PLUNGE( DEATH )...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOU CANT STOP THIS PLUNGE TO DEATH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHILE ON THE RAFT , YOU ARE FISHING ..&nbsp; YOU CANT EAT MORE THAN 3 FISHES A DAY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YET SOME GREEDY CRIMINALS , THEY STEAL FISH FROM OTHER RAFTS .. THEY OVERFISH AND STORE THESE FISHES IN A FISH BANK ASHORE --THE BANKS ( CALL IT A COMPUTER )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RICH CRIMINALS CAN NEVER SEE ALL THE FISH ( MONEY ) THEY HAVE STASHED AWAY ASHORE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS THE USE OF ALL THIS HOARDED FISH ( MONEY -LAND -GOLD ) ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FOR ALL YOUR KNOW,&nbsp; YOUR GRANDCHILD MAY BE THE PERSON ( SOUL ) FROM WHOSE RAFT YOU STOLE FISH --IN HIS NEXT BIRTH</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHERE IS THE WISDOM IN STEALING AND HOARDING FISH FOR NEXT 100 GENERATIONS?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD HAS CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH ON THIS PLANET</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN HIS NEXT LIFE HE COULD BE SOME PIRATE IN SOMALIA OR SOME ROHINGYA REFUGEE IN SOME CAMP</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER DEATH -- THE KING AND THE PAWN GOES INTO THE SAME BOX ( ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS ALL THIS BULLSHIT ONE-UP-MANSHIP WHILE ALIVE ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE HAPPY WHILE ALIVE-- DONT OVERFISH -- FISH ENOUGH TO PROVIDE FOR YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN ( WHO WILL TAKE CARE OF THEIR OWN CHILDREN WITH SOME LEFT OVER FISH --IF REQUIRED )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />YOUR WORST ENEMY TODAY COULD BE YOUR GREAT GRANDSON</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">REMEMBER-- WE WERE ALL BORN WITH THE STARS --AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.. YOU GREAT GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WERE BORN AT THE SAME INSTANT.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHO AM I ?<br /><br />IF YOU UNDERSTAND THIS --AND LIVE IN THE MOMENT --YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE WILL REDUCE --BECAUSE YOU WILL NOT BE A SON OF A BITCH AFTER THAT</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br />DEATH IS A GREAT LEVELLER</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE PURPOSE OF LIFE IS TO BE HAPPY ( NOT BY SCREWING SOMEBODY ELSEs HAPPINESS ) -AND BEING CREATIVE -- AND GRACEFUL.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">IF YOU HAVE UNDERSTOOD WHAT I WROTE ABOVE - YOU HAVE UNDERSTOOD SANATANA DHARMA&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: xx-large;\">ALL TEN SIKH GURUS WERE KHATRIS WITH KHATRI WIVES</b></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE THEM MONOPOLY IN TRADING AND MONEY LENDING TILL 1947-- THE KAPOORS, THE MEHROTRAS, THE KHANNAS, THE TANDONS, THE MEHRAS, THE SETHS , THE BHASINS, THE BEDIS, THE SODHIS - NEXT TIME LOOK INTO THEIR EYES</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HERE IS TERRIFIC BULL BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUOTE: Parashurama (Rama, 6th incarnation of Vishnu) wanted to massacre the Kshatriyas and caused every Kshatriya woman to miscarry. However, some women escaped and took shelter in Brahmin (highest priestly caste) houses. The Brahmin declared them to be Brahmin and even ate with them in order to show Parashurama that the Kshatriya women were from their caste, and thus saved them. According to this story, the children born of these women became the Khatri. UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In Punjab (where they are largely concentrated in the districts of Amritsar, Jalandhar, Ludhiana, Gurdaspur, and Patiala), the Khatri have four subgroups, namely, Bahri, Bunjahi, Sariu and Khokhrar, which are further divided into a large number of clans.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIKE IS SAID-- SIKHS ARE NOT READY FOR ANY FURTHER REVELATIONS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , serif;\">I NEVER GAVE A LINK OF MY OLD POSTS --DELIBERATELY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INSTEAD OF THAT I WROTE \"PUNCH INTO GOOGLE SEARCH \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HUNDREDS OF MY READERS WARNED ME THAT THIS FELLOW RAMANAN IS JUST COPYING AND PASTING THE WHOLE BLOG INCLUDING PICTURES AND JUST DELEING MY NAMES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY READERS THEN WARNED THIS FELLOW RAMANAN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE THEN DELETED HIS WHOLE BLOG AND CAME IN THE WORDPRESS FORMAT--WHERE EVRYTHING IS STILL THE SAME-- EXCEPT THAT HE JUMBLED THE WORDS IN THE SENTENCES --SO THAT HE CANT BE CAUGHT&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I DID NOT BOTHER--AS HE WAS SPREADING SANATANA DHARMA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUT THEN THIS BASTARD STARTED MAKING MONEY FROM WHAT HE STOLE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HIS BEST FRIEND TELLS ME-- RAMANAN DOES NOT KNOW SANSKRIT AT ALL --HE IS LYING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I VERIFIED THIS FROM TWO OF HIS COLLEAGUES IN HIS PAST WORK PLACE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE THEN BREAKS ANOTHER BOMBSHELL- THAT HE IS AN EXPERT IN VEDAS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAALA HUM CHOOTIYA HAI KYA ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; Hindus are being fooled in a most slimy manner.<br />\nRegards<br />\n################<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 21, 2016 at 11:24 AM<br />\nhi is,<br />\n<br />\nSAI BABA OF SHIRDI WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD USING HIS CHITPAVAN JEW AND PARSI STOOGES.<br />\n<br />\nShirdi Sai baba died only 98 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nHe wandered out of the kingdom of hyderabad ( ruled by Crypto JEW Nizam ) and landed up at Shirdi.<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu goldsmith who first saw him called him \" Sai baba\"- as he was dressed like a sufi saint.<br />\n<br />\nThis young Muslim stranger surviving by begging for alms.<br />\n<br />\nI have seen several black and white photos of his shown to me by a Muslim quarter master whose grandfather took care of Sai Baba while he stayed under a neem tree .<br />\n<br />\nHis close up photos showed Sai baba had light eyes and he whispered to me that Muslims in Shirdi knew that he was a Jew masquerading as a Muslim\u2014 that is why their family rejected him.<br />\n<br />\nInitially Shirdi Sai Baba stayed under a neem tree for 4 years. Women used to be afraid of him, as he used to wear torn clothes, smoke hashish and mutter under his breath, when he saw them approaching. He often used to take his intestines out of his anus to dry it-- yogis usually wash it in the river..<br />\n<br />\nSince he often uttered \"allah malik\" ( allah is supreme ) and did namaz daily, and was dressed like a sufi singer, he was directed to stay in a dilapidated mosque where he stayed for the next 50 years.<br />\n<br />\nIn the disused broken down mosque he maintained a fire for warming himself which he referred to as a dhuni, from which he gave sacred ashes ('Udhi') to his guests before they left \u2013 always with the words ALLAH MALIK ( allah is supreme ) . He was illiterate and did NOT know how to read or write.<br />\n<br />\nA Haji Abdul Baba appeared from nowhere and gave company to Sai Baba when he became too old.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild converted him to an avatar of Hindu god Shiva after he died . Sorry, Lord Shiva has NO avatars. Till he died he was a local man and the local muslims created a dargah. Today NO muslim goes there .<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as he died the white invader created a Hindu temple at Bhivpuri, Karjat , Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nA myth was perpetrated that \" He who cometh to My Mazaar(tomb), his sorrow and suffering shall cease\".<br />\n<br />\nShirdi was a small farming village consisting of a few dilapidated houses in 1918 , when shirdi sai baba died.<br />\n<br />\nToday the town survives on a \"money spinning \" industry.... Shirdi Sai baba industry. It is estimated they milk more than hundreds of crores every year.<br />\n<br />\nThey splashed in Parsi/ Chitpavan Brahmin controlled media about miracles such as invisibilty, astral travel, bilocation, levitation, mindreading, materialisation, exorcisms, making the river Yamuna, entering a state of Samadhi at will ( this takes the cake ) , lighting lamps with water, removing his limbs or intestines and sticking them back to his body (khandana yoga if you pleaJJe ), curing the incurably sick, appearing beaten when another was beaten, after death rising on third day ( resurrection like Jesus Christ ), preventing a mosque from falling down on people, and helping his devotees in miraculous ways, creating ad stopping rain BLAH BLAH .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_100BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Lord Khandoba was tom tommed as an avatar of Lord Shiva while Vithoda is Lord of Vishnu and Vaishnav caste<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE FOREIGN FUNDED MEDIA IS DESPERATE TO CONVERT SHIRDI SAI BABA INTO A HINDU GOD.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAVE THEIR STOOGE JUDGES, SAI BABA BHAKT LAWYERS WHO BECAME JUDGES BASED ON OBC QUOTA, \u2014 WHO WILL PUNISH ANYBODY WHO DARES TO SAY THAT SAI BABA IS NOT A HINDU GOD.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE SORRY STATE OF HINDUS -- A MUSLIM DRIFTER WHO CAME FROM THE ISLAMIC NIZAM STATE OF HYDERABAD WHO DIED 98 YEARS AGO , AND WAS BURIED WITH MUSLIM RITES --<br />\n<br />\nIS NOW AT PAR WITH LORD SHIVA AND LORD VISHNU--<br />\n<br />\nBUT MIND YOU THESE COLLEGIUM JUDGES WILL NOT DARE TO DELIVER SUCH VERDICTS WITH SIKHS OR MUSLIMS - THEY WONT LIVE TO SEE ANOTHER SUNRISE .<br />\n<br />\nNowadays Sai Baba movement and temples are expanding faster than ISKCON not just in India but also abroad, with mysterious foreign funds . The methodology followed by the priests in the Sai Baba temples is suspicious.<br />\n<br />\nThey sing vedic chants and Sai Baba praises \u2013and then then instruct temple visitors to sing along (This practice of singing along is NEVER done in usual Hindu temples).<br />\n<br />\nApart from this Sai Baba followers have made it a habit to gift status and large framed portraits of Sai Baba to friends and relatives.<br />\n<br />\nStories are being told that the diseases and ailments (esp couples who are not able to conceive) which was not cured by deities in traditional Hindu temples(like Garbharakshambigai amman) were cured after turning to Sai Baba. It is apparent that there is a foreign effort is being made to rapidly spread this new branch-out faith.<br />\n<br />\nSome funding to Trojan Horse NGOs have been traced to JOSHUA PROJECT TWO.<br />\n<br />\nMost such cults today CAN SWING THE VOTES IN POLITICS .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_98MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_98BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_98B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2349338650448333040\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Khandoba has many wives who are women from many communities, who serve as cultural links between the god and the communities ( sic !) .<br />\n<br />\nThe initiation ritual included a \u201cdeflowering ceremony\u201d, known as \u201cuditambuvadu\u201d in some parts, whereby the FAKE priests would have intercourse with every girl enrolled at his temple as part of his religious perks.<br />\n<br />\nA Marathi saying, \u201cDevdaasi devachi bayako, sarya gavachi\u201d (\u201cServant of god, but wife of the whole town\u201d).<br />\n<br />\nThe youngest and the best among these unfortunate girls would land up in the COMFORT brothels in Mumbai for the British troops.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br />\n<br />\nThe British did propaganda that Mogul Emperor Aurangzeb tried to abolish the Devadasi tradition by demolishing the temple of God Khandoba at Jejuri in Maharashtra.<br />\n<br />\nSorry, he did NOT do that.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Aurangzeb did NOT have COMFORT whorehouses for his troops.<br />\n<br />\nOn 15th Jan 2014, the Indian Supreme court allowed women to be priests at the Lord Vittala temple of Pandharpur. See the Indian judiciary will now decide all this\u2014 they have HIMMAT only against Hinduism .<br />\n<br />\nWhy don\u2019t they try it for the Golden Temple\u2014 and see how the Sikhs run after them with swords !\u2014 or for the matter Islam.<br />\n<br />\nRecently Shankaracharya of Dwaraka Peeth Swaroopananda Saraswati for his alleged remarks against Saibaba of Shirdi under sections 295 A (deliberately hurting religious sentiments) and 298 (statement given with an intention to hurt religious feelings) of the Indian Penal Code by a 23 year old law student, Abhishek Bhargava (23) -- see it is a way to quick fame<br />\n<br />\n--- ALL FOR SAYING THAT SHIRDI SAI BABA IS NOT A HINDU GOD AND HINDUS SHOULD NOT WORSHIP HIM..<br />\n<br />\nThe job of a Shankaracharya ( of a original MUTT created in 2000 BC by Adi Skankaracharya ) is to warn Hindus of mortals becoming Hindu gods .<br />\n<br />\nSo what is wrong in this ? font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">QUOTE The Markandeya Purana reports that Dattatreya, to free himself of all attachments, dove into a lake where he stayed for many years. By doing so, he also hoped to evade an assembly of Munis who remained on the banks of the lake awaiting his return. Datta emerged from the water naked in the company of a beautiful woman. The text relates that he made love with her (maithuna), drank liquor, and enjoyed singing and music. Empty space AKASHA is a PLENUM.<br />\n<br />\nThe home lizard ( gecko ) can walk on roofs and vertical smooth walls ..<br />\n<br />\nThe Casimir effect is a small attractive force that acts between two close parallel uncharged conducting plates. It is due to quantum vacuum fluctuations of the electromagnetic field.<br />\n<br />\nOn its feet, the gecko has many microscopic hairs, that increase the Van der Waals forces between its feet and the surface.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum effects and can be seen experimentally by placing two opposing plates very close to each other in a vacuum. At close range, the plates repel each other.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy could be tapped, when two non magnetic plates were placed close together they started to attract and the attraction got exponentially stronger the closer the plates were from each other.<br />\n<br />\nZPF ( brahman ) was causing this effect<br />\n<br />\nSpace is literally efflorescing with virtual photons and electron-positron pair production.<br />\n<br />\nIt is not dead, empty or inert but radiant and shimmering with energetic potential and INFORMATION ( they have lifted this CLOUD thingy ).<br />\n<br />\nZero Point Field\u2014 the mother of all fields BRAHMAN \u2014provides the ultimate holographic blueprint of the world for all time, past and future<br />\n<br />\nIt is this PLENUM that our ancient seers tapped to give SRUTIS of the Vedas-- god's word. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJuly 8, 2014 at 10:46 AM<br />\n<br />\nhi n,<br />\n<br />\nthe BHAKTI movement was basically to DRIVE WEDGES , DIVIDE AND RULE and MAKE THE HINDUS SELF LOATHING .<br />\n<br />\nthey cut the strength from under the feet of sanskrit mantras and brahmins who knew sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\ntemple priests were encourages to sing hymns ( not mantras ) in local language --using the FAKE mutts and various sects and samaj.<br />\n<br />\none samaj will say temples are good but vedas aint no good.<br />\nanother samaj will say vedas are all balls and shiva is good.<br />\nanother samaj will say that idol worship is no good but vedas are good.<br />\nanother will say that vishnu is good but shiva aint no good.<br />\nanother will say --that vishnu worshipers who sing vernacular hymns are good and the ones chanting sanskrit mantras aint no good.<br />\n<br />\nexample: what did the renaissance movement , brahmo samaj say?<br />\n<br />\nBrahmo samaj was started at Calcutta on 20 August 1828 by Raja Ram Mohan Roy and Debendranath Tagore<br />\n<br />\nBrahmo Samajists have no faith in any scripture as an authority.-- so screw the vedas and the mutts .<br />\nBrahmo Samajists have no faith in Avatars.--so there goes ram and krishna<br />\nBrahmo Samajists denounce polytheism and idol-worship.-- so screw them temples<br />\nBrahmo Samajists are against caste restrictions-- illiterate shudras can be priests ( almost like nurses can be brain surgeons ).<br />\nBrahmo Samajists make faith in the doctrines of Karma and Rebirth optional--concept of karma/ moksha is thrown into the dustbin.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nthen we have all these FAKE DASA series TOTALLY SUBVERTING HINDUISM, GIVING IMMORAL BULL.<br />\n<br />\nthe white invader used their Indian stooges to good effect. they gave a list of POISON INJECTED AREAS in our scriptures and made BR Ambedkar who did NOT know sanskrit, write a book called RIDDLES IN HINDUSIM.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN IF I KNEW SANSKRIT-- I WILL TAKE 50 YEARS WORKING 18 HOURS A DAY , TO GLEAN AND PING THE STUFF BR AMBEDKAR WROTE IN \"RIDDLES IN HINDUISM\".<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS ASSUMING ALL THE ORIGINALS SANSKRIT MANUSCRIPTS ARE IN MY BED ROOM STACKED AWAY IN HUNDREDS OF CUPBOARDS -- AND AN ATTENDANT GIVES ME THE PAGE WHEN I WISH FOR IT..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU THERE IS NO INTERNET GOOGLE , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fibres are extremely\nrich and sensitive innervation on the nasal membranes.&nbsp;&nbsp; There are&nbsp;\ntwenty times more autonomic nerve fibers within this membrane than are\nto be found in the cerebrospinal (central nervous) system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The autonomic nervous\nsystem, and its two complementary components- the excitatory sympathetic\nnervous system (pingala nadi) and the relaxatory parasympathetic nervous system\n(ida nadi) are centrally activated from the nasal mucus membrane region as well\nas from the sympathetic and parasympathetic nuclei lying within the brain\nitself.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes of electrical\npotential happen continiously within the mucus membrane of each nostril\u2014the\nbasis of Swara Yoga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is always a\ndominant nostril.&nbsp; This is due to the\npsycho physiological state, as reflected in a man\u2019s breathing.&nbsp; This nasal potential is constantly changing\nin the same way that the human \"aura\" has been seen to change\ncontinually, when photographed using high voltage Kirlian techniques.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\n\"aura\" has been observed to be in a state of constant flux,\nresponding instantaneously to the ever changing thoughts, emotions and\nphysiological functions of the individual\u2014a&nbsp;\nreflection of the pranic body in an electric field.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara Yogis always\ncarried a Yoga dada \u2013which is a short walking stick with a double arm grip.\nWhen the yogi wants to shift his predominant nostril or go to sushumna ( both\nnostrils free ) &nbsp;in a hurry, he\nhyperventilates at the same time using pressure of this stick uder his armpit.\nSometimes he may pour cold water from his copper ota on his head ( murdhavu )</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the average person,\nthe whole brain functions optimally only for the few moments when sushumna\nawakens every 1\u00bd hours of the automatic breathing cycle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proper use of the yoga\ndanda, however, induces a continuing balance of both nostrils, enabling the\nyogis who follow the paths of tantra and swara yoga to maintain the flow of\nsushumna nadi and thereby experience meditative awareness for hours or days\ncontinually ( some hang upside down on tree branch ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the horse\nBucephalus of Alexander the Great saw these &nbsp;hanging yogis\u2014 it got very nervous.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally this great spirited horse was psychologically traumatised by the infra sounds of the Tibetan Mastiff dogs and war elephants -- the horse failed to function--&nbsp; it was put to sleep by a heavy hearted Alexander<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-21pUO5klSIM/Wn2t6tybf0I/AAAAAAABYeY/_s4BEwrVkxsER7rjHgwiIBvBsp6u4MFHACLcBGAs/s1600/330px-Seleucoes_I_Bucephalos_coin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 10, 2018 at 5:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_26MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW TO BREATHE WHILE SWIMMING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT FOLLOWS IS A REVELATION --SO LISTEN UP</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Every swimming manual and coach trains you wrong\u2014 that you have to INHALE through the mouth and EXHALE through the nose.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is wrong.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You must INHALE through the nose and EXHALE through the nose with a MMMMM sound.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This may not be entirely possible when doing long distance swimming in choppy seas.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">My revelations now jump to </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>53.40 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Breathing in/ out through the nose while swimming has to do with NITRIC OXIDE while affects performance. This is the first time it is being told on this planet</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The paranasal sinuses are major producers of nitric oxide (NO). Oscillating airflow produced by humming ( MMMMMM ) enhances sinus ventilation and thus increases nasal NO levels.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nasal NO has been scientifically measured by a chemiluminescence technique..this is no bullshit .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO increases more than 16 fold during humming compared with quiet exhalation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nitric oxide dilates blood vessels, raising blood supply and lowering blood pressure.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If you don't breathe through your nose, in a sense you're only half alive-- If we breathe through the nose, we breathe in nasal nitric oxide</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nose breathing reduces the volume of Carbon Dioxide (CO2) released during exhalation. The sinuses trap CO2 at the end of exhalation. CO2 helps to reduce constriction in the airways and blood vessels and facilitates the release of oxygen from the red blood cells and oxygen delivery to the other cells of the body by helping to balance the pH of the blood.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nose breathing adds a huge reservoir of sensation to tap into to deepen your connection to yourself and bring your attention to the present moment</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nose breathing helps increase the fluctuations of the cerebral-spinal fluid by activation and movement of the sphenobasilar joint thereby nourishing the central nervous system. Nitric oxide is a potent vasodilator, meaning that it widens your blood vessels and thus promotes good blood circulation</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NASALLY DERIVED NO HAS BEEN SHOWN TO INCREASE ARTERIAL OXYGEN TENSION AND REDUCE PULMONARY VASCULAR RESISTANCE, THEREBY ACTING AS AN AIRBORNE MESSENGER.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE DISCOVERY OF SURPRISINGLY HIGH CONCENTRATIONS OF NO IN THE NASAL AIRWAY AND PARANASAL SINUSES HAS IMPORTANT IMPLICATIONS FOR THE UNDERSTANDING OF AIRWAY PHYSIOLOGY.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SURPRISINGLY HIGH CONCENTRATIONS OF NO IN THE NASAL AIRWAY AND PARANASAL SINUSES HAS IMPORTANT IMPLICATIONS FOR THE FIELD OF OTORHINOLARYNGOLOGY.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODERN SCIENCE HAS NOT COME TO TERMS WITH IT, THOUGH MENTIONED IN OUR AYURVEDA TEXTS 6200 YEARS AGO</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The 1998 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine was awarded for discovering ( SIC- RE-INVENTING THE WHEEL ) nitric oxide's role as a cardiovascular signalling molecule.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOTH SWARA YOGA AND TANTRA YOGIS WERE MASTERS IN NITRIC OXIDE MOLECULE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html?showComment=1518216191616#c456441120057990766\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 10, 2018 at 4:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_26MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\ntim drake<br />\nDecember 6, 2017 at 1:04 PM<br />\n<br />\nCould you tell us about the origins of the legendary cult thugee, aamir khan is making a movie on it :P<br />\n<br />\n####<br />\n<br />\nA COOKED UP STORY TO SHOW HINDUS AND TEMPLES IN POOR LIGHT<br />\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nhi td,<br />\n<br />\nTHUGS OF HINDOSTAN , is about the life of the killer mob (sic ) in India THUGGEE ..<br />\n<br />\nThe film is based on 19th century novel 'Confession of a Thug'. The book describes about a cult in India which killed people for money \u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confessions_of_a_Thug_(novel)<br />\n<br />\nTHUGGEEs WERE GREAT PATRIOTS , HARDCORE DESH BHAKTS WHO WOULD NOT TOLERATE THE WHITE INVADER CARTING AWAY INDIAs NATURAL PRODUCE AND CUTTING DOWN HUGE TREES ....<br />\n<br />\nTHESE GANGS ATTACKED ONLY THE WHITE INVADER AND HIS INDIAN TRAITOR STOOGES....<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ARE NOT THUGS -- BUT BRAVE AND HONOURABLE CHILDREN OF BHARATMATA ..WE ARE PROUD OF THEM..<br />\n<br />\nTHUGGEE CULT DID NOT EXIST DURING ISLAM INVADER RULE , AS THEY DID NOT CUT DOWN LARGE TREES...<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF THE GANG MEMBERS WERE MUSLIMS...<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER COOKED UP STORIES ABOUT HOW THUGGEEs SACRIFICED HUMANS EVEN BEFORE THE ISLAMIC INVADER CAME TO INDIA..THEY INJECTED FAKE STORIES THAT EVEN CHINESE TRAVELLER HUIEN TSANG WAS ERALY SACRIFICED IN A HINDU TEMPLE\u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br />\n<br />\nLET ME QUOTE WIKIPEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thuggee<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE--- Estimates of the total number of victims vary widely, since no reliable source confirms the length of the Thugs' existence. According to the Guinness Book of Records, the Thuggee cult was responsible for approximately two million deaths; British historian Mike Dash said that they killed a total of 50,000 people over an estimated 150 years. Political scientist David C. Rapoport estimated that 500,000 people were killed by the Thugs, making them the most destructive terrorist group in history.[10] According to other estimates, they murdered one million people.[11]--UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nLIES !..<br />\n<br />\nCOWARDLY WHITE BASTARDS TELLING FOUL LIES --<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE THEY HAD NOT GUTS FOR REAL HAND TO HAND GUERILLA FIGHTS WHICH SPILL BLOOD IN DEEP FORESTS !!<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/murder-of-pazhassi-raja-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER SAID THAT ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACK DATED CREATION BHASARVAJNA WROTE ABOUT THUGGEEs \u2013 SORRY THIS FELLOW NEVER EXISTED ..NYAYASARA ATTRIBUED TO BHASARVAJNA IS A POISON INJECTED BOOK ON EPISTEMOLOGY..<br />\nFAKE Bhasarvajna wrote eight FAKE karikas , called Ganakarika dealing with the FAKE Pashupata doctrines.<br />\n<br />\nPashupata bhakti movement never existed.. Pashupata Mantra of chanting \u2014 \"Agni is ashes, Vayu is ashes, Sky is ashes, all this is ashes, the mind, these eyes are ashes.\" was cooked up by the white invader.. FAKE \u201cSpiritiual practices \u201c included ridiculous actions such as, snoring or showing signs of being asleep while awake, limping, wooing or gestures of an inamorato on seeing a young and pretty woman, talking nonsensically etc.. ..Lying in cremation yard ashes singing bhajans of Shiva was never done..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nFAKE and backdated KabirDASA used the word THUG as a metaphor of the divine deceit of God\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader LIED that the goddess of Thuggees was \u2018cali or Mariatta\u2019 (sic) and the thugees shout KALI name while strangling a man to death ..<br />\n<br />\nThuggees killed only British East India company WHITE men..they just scared the Indian traitors..<br />\n<br />\nUnable to steal India\u2019s forest produce Rothschild in 1810 passed Regulation VI demanding that Indians must become informers or DIE. .<br />\n<br />\nOn October 13, 1830, the British Governor authorised Captain Sleeman to destroy the system of Thuggee. A total of 1574 thugs were tried; 402 sentenced to death, 935 to transportation , 83 to imprisonment for life.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1840, Sleeman declared that thuggee cult was finally snuffed out...<br />\n<br />\nWE WILL NOT ALLOW PATRIOTS WHO PROTECTED BHARATMATA TO BE CONVERTED TO PETTY THEIVES AND CRIMINAL MURDERERS<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_26BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
