, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In modern times , Swara\nyoga is a direct way of learning more about ourselves. &nbsp;Everyone can become aware of the state of his\nbreath in relation to his various ' daily activities, states of mind and feelings,\nno matter how busy he is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the flow of energy\nin ida and pingala is in harmony with each other, a third channel opens within\nthe spinal canal in the centre of the spinal cord, called sushumna nadi,\nmanifesting as an equal flow in both nostrils. An active sushumna expresses\nitself as a state of deep harmony in body, mind and spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire universe is\ncomprised of two forces, consciousness ( purusha -shiva) &nbsp;and energy ( prakriti \u2013shakti ) , which are\ninterdependent and opposite, yet complementary. This is the second template (\nSamkhya ) &nbsp;on the field of Brahman<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe hangs as a\nkind of web of interacting energies, suspended and functioning within the\nframework of tensions developed by this fundamental polarity. Wherever one\nlooks, within nature, within the body and within the mind, this polarity can be\nseen as light and dark, positive and negative, male and female and so on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis the first template( Dvaita ) on the field of Brahman<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This absolutely amazing\ndance of polarities was reduced by white men ( holding Monier Williams Sanskrit\ndictionary ) and shallow minds to what is written in Wikipedia below-&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"> CHOOTIYA nonsense&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dvaita Vedanta is 400\nceturies old.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAKE Madhavacharya who\nfounded Dvaita Vedanta ( sic ) is cooked up by Jew Rothschild and backdated to\n1317 AD ( 7 centuries ago )</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At every level, &nbsp;two great principles are at work, creating and\nmotivating the universe. . . When this cosmic polarity of prana and\nconsciousness manifests in the microcosmic unit of the human body, it takes the\nform of chitta Shakti and prana shakti, which correspond to ida nadi and\npingala nadi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gxaUjE4wkPg/Wn7cZKmWrlI/AAAAAAABYgk/xypf7a5MwpovgKGe4RcoSH2JRaOIJYqwgCLcBGAs/s1600/left_brain_objeective_right_90brain_subjective.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"403\" data-original-width=\"598\" height=\"430\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gxaUjE4wkPg/Wn7cZKmWrlI/AAAAAAABYgk/xypf7a5MwpovgKGe4RcoSH2JRaOIJYqwgCLcBGAs/s640/left_brain_objeective_right_90brain_subjective.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These two mental and\nphysical channels within the body apply to all levels of being from gross to\nsubtle, forming the basis for every perception, activity and experience. They\nrepresent two distinct forces within the human environment - the ebb and flow\nof human existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala regulates\nenergy in the body, and ida regulates consciousness. These two nadis nourish\nthe two hemispheres ( lobes ) of our brain, which then control each and every\nactivity of the body and mind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril\nflows more freely, representing the activity of pingala, our left hemisphere is\ndominant and we are extroverted, active, physically fitter and we feel warmer\nbecause our metabolism is in a dynamic state - exhibiting the solar qualities\nof our nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the left nostril flows more freely, representing the\nactivity of ida, our right hemisphere is dominant and we become more\nintroverted, passive, fitter for mental and artistic work, and we feel colder\nbecause our metabolism slows down - exhibiting the lunar side of our nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of yoga is to awaken and balance ida and pingala, to enable pranic\nenergy to flow and illumine the dark and sleepy areas of consciousness so that\nwe wake up and realize our full potential as human beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/rape-of-subconscious-mind-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/rape-of-subconscious-mind-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our brain is composed\nof two hemispheres, the right and the left, and together they are responsible\nfor thousands of functions in the body. Most of these functions are the same\nand symmetrical in both hemispheres, but some are specific to or predominant in\none hemisphere only.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When our pingala is\nsluggish, we slide deeper into the introversion of ida and encounter\ndifficulties in communication with other people, not being able to express our\nthoughts clearly, though they may seem very clear to us. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, the\nright hemisphere in the majority of the population is responsible for\nperceiving the emotional connotation of words and language, an ida activity. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, when we are too\npingala or extroverted, we tend to miss fine aspects of non-verbal\ncommunication, not giving importance to the waysome things are said and just\npaying attention to what has been said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS PLANET HAS NOT YET\nWOKEN UP TO THE ASTOUNDING SECRETS OF YOGA..</span></span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp; ITS AMAZING EFFECTS ON VAGUS NERVE AND AMYGDALA</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9OV3O8HJrng/Wn7etVb0L9I/AAAAAAABYgw/0cq6IjggRLIlgHjQ7zKN_5ck7OVBVlgjACLcBGAs/s1600/brain-hem6ispheres.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"454\" data-original-width=\"456\" height=\"635\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9OV3O8HJrng/Wn7etVb0L9I/AAAAAAABYgw/0cq6IjggRLIlgHjQ7zKN_5ck7OVBVlgjACLcBGAs/s640/brain-hem6ispheres.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the left nostril (\nright brain lobe for right hander ) is PREDOMINANT it is the lunar energy or\nIda Nadi which is flowing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril ( left brain lobe )\nDOMINATES, the solar energy or Pingala Nadi is flowing. When we breathe in\nthrough the left nostril, ida nadi or the parasympathetic nervous system as\nwell as the right hemisphere of the brain are stimulated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we breathe in\nthrough the right nostril, pingala nadi or the sympathetic nervous system as\nwell as the left hemisphere of the brain are stimulated. The right brain lobe\ncontrols the left side of the body and vice versa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SW5laNS6Qn4/Wn7fs0AcTzI/AAAAAAABYg4/OKjZKyi8PnEP0kxi5ya4Ivl5rBuBV0-6QCLcBGAs/s1600/7becf79596a18a947b29552154bc823aed--yoga-school-school-images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"546\" data-original-width=\"728\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SW5laNS6Qn4/Wn7fs0AcTzI/AAAAAAABYg4/OKjZKyi8PnEP0kxi5ya4Ivl5rBuBV0-6QCLcBGAs/s640/7becf79596a18a947b29552154bc823aed--yoga-school-school-images.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wrLqq10PWhw/Wn7gR4snwfI/AAAAAAABYhA/tsHpQtAN3kwXrGEEtMrcVeDhsAPHaaPKQCLcBGAs/s1600/4a2b8ba0724R0144b81de72e99bce2cde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"521\" data-original-width=\"500\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wrLqq10PWhw/Wn7gR4snwfI/AAAAAAABYhA/tsHpQtAN3kwXrGEEtMrcVeDhsAPHaaPKQCLcBGAs/s640/4a2b8ba0724R0144b81de72e99bce2cde.jpg\" width=\"614\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z86M55WFNd8/Wn7gmn2tuCI/AAAAAAABYhE/rdQa2a7o7kgNpAD7xo3E5e2f4ac4emKGgCLcBGAs/s1600/The%252BNe4rvous%252BSystem%252BCentral%252BSomatic%252BPeripheral%252BAutonomic%252BSympathetic.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z86M55WFNd8/Wn7gmn2tuCI/AAAAAAABYhE/rdQa2a7o7kgNpAD7xo3E5e2f4ac4emKGgCLcBGAs/s640/The%252BNe4rvous%252BSystem%252BCentral%252BSomatic%252BPeripheral%252BAutonomic%252BSympathetic.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right\nhemisphere&nbsp; ( right lobe \u2013subconscious\nfor right handers ) is dominant in perceiving the space around us, the patterns\nwithin it, the notion of direction and distance, depth and position . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positive, relaxed,\nfriendly, supportive situations activate the left hemisphere, while negative,\nanxious, dangerous, threatening situations activate the right hemisphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In positive and\nfriendly circumstances, we embrace the world through pingala, and in times of\nanxiety or threat we withdraw into the inner world of ida.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recognition of facial\nexpressions is the function of the right hemisphere exclusively.The left\nhemisphere predominantly deals with logical, verbal, mathematical and\nanalytical thinking, guiding our actions in the outer world of pingala, while\nthe right hemisphere governs intuitive, integrative thinking that recognizes\npatterns in the world around us, leading us into the inner world and deeper\nunderstanding of ida. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EEG studies done during\naptitude testing of volunteers showed increased activity of the left hemisphere\n(pingala) during verbal tasks, and increased activity of the right hemisphere\n(ida) during spatial tasks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the integrated\nevolution of human beings, the right hemisphere or ida, the mental energy\ndomain, takes care of music and art awareness, three-dimensional perception,\ncreativity and imagination, insight and intuition. The left side, the domain of\nvital energy or pingala, takes care of written and spoken language, dealing with\nnumbers and abstract problems, rational decision-making, accurate judgement and\ndiscrimination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To live life fully and\nevolve in a harmonious way we need both kinds of abilities. Therefore,\nachieving and maintaining balance between the right and left brain, between ida\nand pingala, has very real implications in our daily life, in the way we\nfunction, interact, grow and evolve. And here swara yoga does come in the\npicture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogis investigating the\nscience of swara yoga milliniums ago&nbsp;\nhave discovered that the activity of ida nadi, the right brain,\ncorrelates to the airflow in the left nostril, and that pingala activity\ncorrelates to the airflow in the right nostril.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also found that for most of\nthe time one nostril flows more freely than the other and that this alternate\ndominance of one nostril over the other and the switch between the two happens\nin regular cycles of approximately 90 minutes, throughout the day and\nthroughout life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only during the brief periods of change do both nostrils flow\nequally, indicating the flow of prana through sushumna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In scientific terms,\nthe nasal cycle is defined as a side-to-side fluctuation in nasal engorgement\nand airflow, or as alternating congestion and decongestion of the nasal\nturbinates, the bony prominences within the nasal cavity covered with mucosal\nlining, very rich in blood and nerve supply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The nasal cycle is of considerable interest to\nENT specialists and neurobiologists and it has been found to strongly correlate\nwith a number of modifications of bodily functions, such as the relative EEG\npredominance of the contra lateral brain hemisphere,rapid eye movement (REM)\nand non-REM sleep patterns , verbal and spatial cognitive processing and the\nrelease of endocrine agents such as noradrenalin, a potent stimulator of the\nsympathetic nervous system.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pacemaker for this cycle is located at the base\nof the hypothalamus, in a densely packed cellular structure called the\nsuprachiasmatic nucleus, which is involved in the control of a number of\ncircardian and ultradian rhythms in the body, and is often referred to as `the\nprincipal biological clock' or `the mind's clock'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sBNG9rDxMRo/Wn7jJa_BJTI/AAAAAAABYhU/NJBbqj9piGgnzJMmW-tzrAP_nbPT7D1YACLcBGAs/s1600/dodwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sBNG9rDxMRo/Wn7jJa_BJTI/AAAAAAABYhU/NJBbqj9piGgnzJMmW-tzrAP_nbPT7D1YACLcBGAs/s400/dodwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>YOGA CAN HARNESS ALL BIOLOGICAL RHYTHMS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xgmg08Mkz0M/Wn7jo8IbfcI/AAAAAAABYhc/588TnGXO2SchoMaBiAnad7nnfKirsKtuQCLcBGAs/s1600/Biological%252BRshythms%252BUltradian_%252Bcycles%252Blasts%252Bshorter%252Bthan%252Ba%252Bday.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xgmg08Mkz0M/Wn7jo8IbfcI/AAAAAAABYhc/588TnGXO2SchoMaBiAnad7nnfKirsKtuQCLcBGAs/s640/Biological%252BRshythms%252BUltradian_%252Bcycles%252Blasts%252Bshorter%252Bthan%252Ba%252Bday.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The medium through\nwhich the nasal cycle affects numerous bodily functions is the autonomic\nnervous system (ANS), which has a direct influence on all sense organs as well\nas inner organs and systems, including the brain and the cortex.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is composed\nof two divisions, and most of the organs in our body receive fibres from both\ndivisions exhibiting opposing effects.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One division is the sympathetic nervous\nsystem (SNS) which prepares us for an increased level of activity and the fight\nor flight response, which includes an increase in heart rate, blood pressure,\ncardiac output, a diversion of blood flow from the skin and splanchnic vessels\nof the internal organs to those supplying the skeletal muscles, increased pupil\nsize, bronchiolar dilation, contraction of sphincters in the digestive system,\nand metabolic changes utilizing fat and glycogen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, the sum total\nof these changes is to enable us to be maximally physically fit, to see and\nperceive most clearly and be ready for an explosive muscular action with a\nreduced tendency to bleeding in case of injury, with one purpose in mind - to\nfight or to flee, and save our skin.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast, the\ninfluences of the other division, the parasympathetic nervous system (PNS),\nlead to rest, conservation and restoration of energy and thus to a reduction in\nheart rate (HR) and blood pressure, a facilitation of digestive processes and\nthe elimination of waste products.&nbsp; It is\nan opportunity to rest, repair and consolidate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a whole, the autonomic\nnervous system is understood as a `housekeeping' system which ensures our\nsmooth functioning and adaptative responses to different situations in the\nouter and inner environment, and it is controlled primarily by the\nhypothalamus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A unique feature of the\nANS, which is often overlooked, is that it shows an ultradian rhythm, the\nregular pattern that repeats itself several times within the period of 24\nhours. The sympathetic nervous system, for example, dominates one side of the\nbody and at the same time the parasympathetic nervous system dominates the\nopposite side.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After approximately\nevery 90 minutes these systems switch dominance. This process is mediated by\nthe biological clock in the hypothalamus, and affects all the organs that receive\nfibres from the SNS and PNS, including the cerebral hemispheres.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nasal breathing pattern correlates to\nthe alternating cerebral hemispheric activity, both in the waking state and in\nsleep&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This alternating endogenous rhythm\nwithin the autonomic nervous system and its two divisions, the SNS and PNS, is\nclearly connected to the daily rhythms of the neuroendocrine, cardiovascular\nand insulin systems,as well as to the secretion of stress hormones,\ncateholamines, which also show an alternate dominance in the left and right\nside of the body, and that this left-right pattern is tightly coupled with the\nnatural rhythm of the nasal cycle<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BLfwZ1NPNKY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BLfwZ1NPNKY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern scientists have\nverified the science of breathing mentioned in Yoga.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have verified, using\nthe EEG device, that alternate nostril breathing, as it is used in nadi\nshodhana, stimulates the contra-lateral brain hemisphere, i.e. that breathing\nthrough the left nostril stimulates the right hemisphere, and breathing through\nthe right nostril stimulates the left hemisphere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In nadi shodhana breathing\npattern increased EEG power in the opposite hemisphere regardless of the phase\nof the nasal cycle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnetoencephalography, explored the effects of exclusive\nleft or right nostril breathing that correspond to chandra and surya bheda\npranayamas, at one breath per minute for 31 minutes, and showed similar\npatterns of contra-lateral brain activation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zs_CC1-FK-0/Wn7mQVTbbKI/AAAAAAABYho/raZVGwo7m80r_Poa0BaIlQeeGMlV2yf9QCLcBGAs/s1600/slwide_3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zs_CC1-FK-0/Wn7mQVTbbKI/AAAAAAABYho/raZVGwo7m80r_Poa0BaIlQeeGMlV2yf9QCLcBGAs/s640/slwide_3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OCpYdSN_kts/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OCpYdSN_kts?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increased EEG activity\nin the brain, specifically in the limbic system, is generated by a neural\nmechanism in the superior nasal meatus, the upper nasal canal located in the\nnasal cavity and which is connected to the sympathetic and parasympathetic\nbranches of the maxillary nerve.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LpBEEausV-A/Wn7oBJcCWHI/AAAAAAABYh0/_FMr77vR9gI9qwtZP2xSPMvz6LeI4Y0wgCLcBGAs/s1600/dow3nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"186\" data-original-width=\"271\" height=\"274\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LpBEEausV-A/Wn7oBJcCWHI/AAAAAAABYh0/_FMr77vR9gI9qwtZP2xSPMvz6LeI4Y0wgCLcBGAs/s400/dow3nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also evoked the same kind of EEG response\nby gently blowing air directly into the upper nasal cavity, without inflating\nthe lungs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Local anaesthesia of\nthe nasal mucosal membrane suppressed the EEG changes in the opposite\nhemisphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the psychological\nlevel, there are studies that show a correlation between breathing\npredominantly through one nostril and the corresponding increase in brain activity\nin the opposite hemisphere, leading to increased cognitive performance specific\nto that hemisphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right-nasal dominance\nrelated to relatively greater verbal performance, stimulating pingala, left\nbrain activity. Left-nasal dominance was coupled to relatively greater spatial\nskills, stimulating ida, right brain activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Autism and early\nlanguage impairment is associated with left-handedness, left-eyedness and left\nnasal dominance . . . Patients with autism had no normal nasal cycle\u2014they have\nalmost continuous left nasal breathing.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Go to any autism\nhospital \u2013you will find that the worst affected are all left handers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma gave\ngreat emphasis on using right hand \u2013leaving left hand for washing the ass after\na shit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SEX DURING PREGNANCY\nINCREASES THE CHANCES OF THE BABY BEING BORN&nbsp;\nLEFT HANDED . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF THERE ARE TWINS&nbsp;&nbsp; ( WITH IVF PREGNANCIES WE KNOW-- 3 FROZEN\nEGGS ARE INSERTED ) ONE CANNIBALISES THE OTHER</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Left-handed people tend\nto be more vulnerable to negative emotions such as depression and anger,\npossibly because southpaws, as they\u2019re known, engage the right sides of their\nbrains more actively<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In yoga physiology,\nautism is understood as a state of imbalance in which ida nadi is far too\noveractive and children become overly introverted. The state of imbalance\npresents itself as the predominant airflow through the left nostril.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Implications of these scientific findings point to yogic measures that can\ninduce the state of balance in the ida-pingala system:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surya bheda pranayama\nactivates the breathing pattern through the right nostril, pingala. By\nactivating the extrovert human nature, this gradually brings about a state of\nharmony.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matsya kridasana on the left side of the body with the right knee bent\nwould further benefit those children.&nbsp; This&nbsp; asana stimulates pingala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/L77zTVUu0Gg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/L77zTVUu0Gg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vagus, as the principal\npart of the parasympathetic nervous system, is controlled by ida nadi.&nbsp;&nbsp; Use of chandra bheda pranayama to gently\nstimulate the vagal nerve in a natural way, without any side effects of\nsurgery, may help in difficult cases of epilepsy.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Following surya bheda, there is a significant\nincrease in systolic, diastolic and mean pressure. In contrast, the systolic\nand diastolic pressure decreased after nadi shodhana and the systolic and mean\npressure were lower after chandra bheda.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadi shodhana is&nbsp; the best choice for long-term management of\nhigh blood pressure (HBP), and surya bheda as a tool to rectify a tendency\ntowards low blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matsyakridasana leads\nto significant changes in the nasal airflow, resulting in decongestion and\nconsequent increased airflow through the upper nostril and at the same time to\ncongestion and decreased airflow through the lower nostril.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Chudamani\nUpanishad (V. 31-33) 5000 BC &nbsp;says&nbsp; : \"The breath goes out making the sound\nHAM and comes in producing the sound of SO.&nbsp;\nThe jiva is therefore repeating the mantra HAMSO continually 21,000\ntimes, twenty four hours a day. This is called ajapa japa.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one listens\ncarefully to his breath he may hear the sound of HAMSO ( or Soham ). &nbsp;&nbsp;The Upanishads declare that constant\nawareness of this japa of the breath can reduce a man\u2019s karmic baggage as he\nwill remain IN THE MOMENT as behave accordingly. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the philosophical significance of the\npower of swara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above is the HAMSO&nbsp; breathing which Sri Sri Ravishankar has\npatented in his own name ( SOHAM Sudarshan Kriya )&nbsp; .&nbsp; Only a fake\nROGUE guru patents Yoga.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ion is an atom or\nmolecule that has a non-zero net electrical charge (its total number of\nelectrons is not equal to its total number of protons). &nbsp;A cation is a positively-charged ion, while an\nanion is negatively charged. Because of their opposite electric charges,\ncations and anions attract each other and readily form ionic compounds, such as\nsalts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All ions are charged, which means that like all charged objects they\nare:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-attracted to opposite\nelectric charges (positive to negative, and vice versa),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-repelled by like\ncharges<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-when moving, their\ntrajectories can be deflected by a magnetic field.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the electric\ncharge on a proton is equal in magnitude to the charge on an electron, the net\nelectric charge on an ion is equal to the number of protons in the ion minus\nthe number of electrons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An anion is an ion with\nmore electrons than protons, giving it a net negative charge (since electrons\nare negatively charged and protons are positively charged).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cation &nbsp;is an ion with fewer electrons than protons, giving\nit a positive charge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ions are ubiquitous in\nnature and are responsible for diverse phenomena from the luminescence of the\nSun to the existence of the Earth's ionosphere.. In both inorganic and organic\nchemistry (including biochemistry), the interaction of water and ions is\nextremely important; an example is the energy that drives breakdown of\nadenosine triphosphate (ATP)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any waterfall generates\nnegative ions. All viruses have a positive dipole charge. Negative ions\nattached itself to it and enlarges the virus.&nbsp;\nViruses are so tiny that our lungs cant pull them out, unless they are\nenlarged. Negative ions create an alkaline environment. Cancer cells survive\nonly in an acidic environment, which is an oxygen impoverished environment. Ozone\nkills virus and bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Free radicals are\npositive ions in your body, which shuts down your immune system and causes\ncells to become weak. This makes you fall sick faster and age faster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ion is an\noxygen atom with an extra electron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When positive ions\npermeate into your skin, your sweat pores contract. Reticuloendothelial system a network of\ncells and tissues found throughout the body, especially in the blood, general\nconnective tissue, spleen, liver, lungs, bone marrow, and lymph nodes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These cells are concerned with blood cell\nformation and destruction, storage of fatty materials, and metabolism of iron\nand pigment, and they play a role in inflammation and immunity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the cells are\nmotile\u2014that is, capable of spontaneous motion\u2014and phagocytic\u2014they can ingest\nand destroy unwanted foreign material. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By stimulating the\nreticuloendothelial system negative ions spark the defense cells in this system\nin order to bolster and increase our resistance to disease. In addition to\nbolstering our disease defense system, negative ions increase the amplitude of\nour brain waves, which contributes to an overall higher awareness level\nthroughout our body.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions promote\nalpha brain waves and increased brain wave amplitude which results in a higher\nawareness level. The body is better able to absorb oxygen into the blood cells,\noxidize serotonin and filter airborne contaminants.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sea water sits a\nrock and sprays hydrogen negative ions are released, purifying the air around\nus, killing bacteria, and increasing our energy level, especially in the\npresence of the sun.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best place to do\nSURYANAMASKAR is at&nbsp; seashore with feet\nin wet sand .&nbsp;&nbsp; Negative ions improve our\nability to absorb oxygen by neutralizing damaging free radicals (positive\nions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positive and negative\nions are the components of the air one breathes.&nbsp; When one inhales negative ions, they increase\nthe level of prana in the body. The opposite happens when we inhale positive\nions.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pollution created by\nmodern technology destroys essential negative ions, thus unnaturally\noverbalancing positive ionization, causing an ever rising rate of physical and\nmental depression.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today in western\nnations they have understood this and every weekend the people take off to\nserene natural places where there is an abundance of negative ions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The west ridiculed\nIndians for doing Pranayama.&nbsp;&nbsp; Today they\nrespect Pranayama. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nose is very\nsignificant, for at the root of the nasal cavity is a uniquely designed\nprana-detecting device.&nbsp; This is a thin,\nperforated bone, known in medical terminology as the cribriform plate of the\nethmoid bone. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cribriform plate of\nthe ethmoid bone is received into the ethmoidal notch of the frontal bone and\nroofs in the nasal cavities.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within these\nperforations the minute filaments of the olfactory nerve reside. They relay\ninformation to the brain concerning the constituents of the air. When\nelectrically charged ions contact these filaments, the brain and main nervous\nsystem automatically become energized. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This charging travels\nto the limbic system of the brain, in which perception is transformed into\nexperience.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing directly affects\nour emotional responses to life, and conversely the arousal of different\nemotions is reflected in the breath.&nbsp;&nbsp; If\none breathes through the mouth, the entire air mass and prana travel straight\ndown the trachea without stimulating the brain and nervous system.&nbsp; Therefore the activation of the entire\nnervous system is dependent on nasal breathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions can\naffect the levels of serotonin, a hormone which is manufactured in our brains.\nIt is a neurotransmitter involved in the transmission of nerve impulses.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During inhalation, the\nbody registers and adapts itself to the conditions of the universe, and during\nexhalation information is sent back into the cosmos describing the state of the\ninternal environment.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the messages\ntransmitted between the two realms are in a code.&nbsp; The swara yogi knows how to decipher this\ncode by sharpening his awareness and gaining control over the incoming cosmic\nforce. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin helps\nmaintain a \u201chappy feeling\u201d and helps keep our moods under control by helping us\nto&nbsp; sleep. Low serotonin levels in our\nbrains are believed to be the reason for cases of mild to moderate depression\nwhich can lead to symptoms of anxiety, apathy, fear, insomnia and fatigue. When\nthe brain produces serotonin, tension is eased.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.During the Amavasya there are many more\nnegative ions in the atmosphere, which is good for neutralizing free radicals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD MADE\nCHOOTS OUT OF INDIANS BY MAKING THEM FAST ON WRONG DAYS.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Yoga says that,\nthe upper part of the body corresponds to the positive, northern pole and the\nlower part to the negative, southern pole. The right side and back portions are\nalso positive poles and the left and frontal portions are negative poles... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These positive and\nnegative charges of energy are the basis of swara yoga. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient rishis\ncalled the negative flow ida and the positive flow pingala.&nbsp; The maharishis&nbsp; of yore knew the techniques to channelize\nbio-energy or prana throughout the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as electrical\npower is at our disposal by connecting a switch to the main power line, so the\nrishis knew how to connect the switches and circuits of energy in the\nbody.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They understood that\nthe flow of energy, whether internal or external, is constantly being\ncirculated from the more highly charged to the lesser charged centres in order\nto create a balance between the positive and negative poles.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions&nbsp; help people sleep better . With quality\nsleep, cells are repaired, the immune system is strengthened and mental\nfunctions are sharpened. Quality sleep can also help reduce the occurrence of\ncommon pains such as backache, and increase your resistance to illness.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions play a\nrole in causing blood flow to increase through dilation of the capillaries,\nthus causing greater oxygenation to occur. The oxygen level in hemoglobin is\nincreased, helping to maintain good health and well being. This promotes cell\nrespiration, helping us heal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is by balancing\nthese two poles of energy that the ancient yogi brings about the awakening of\nkundalini, the high powered generator which illumines the fabulous, hitherto\nunexplored areas of the brain responsible for all of man's ingenuity, higher\nknowledge and self-realization</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranayama creates\nstatic electricity in the body which helps to recharge the positive ions\nbreathed in from the environment and convert them into negative ions.&nbsp;&nbsp; The effect is the same as that created by\nrain and thunderstorm</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hatha Yoga Pradipika\nstates: \"If the air is inhaled through the&nbsp;\nleft nostril, it should be expelled again through the right.&nbsp; Then breathing in through the right and\nretaining, it should&nbsp; be expelled through\nthe left. \"(2: 10) .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
