, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions have been\ndubbed \u201cthe happy element\u201d because they help to increase the oxygen-carrying\ncapacity of the blood \u2014 especially to the brain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions also\nspeed up the oxidation of serotonin (5-hydroxtryptamine), which has positive\neffects on mood, pain relief and sexual drive. They also counteract free\nradicals \u2014 known as positive ions \u2014 which are created through exposure to\nenvironmental toxins \u2014 like chemicals, electronic equipment, cellphones and\nradiation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, negative ions\nencourage proper pH and hormonal balance in the body, while also strengthening\nmetabolism and the immune system.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern technology is\nrecklessly&nbsp; destroying the natural\nbalance of ions in the atmosphere,&nbsp; especially\nin more populated areas. Deficiency of negative&nbsp;\nions is a major contributing factor to the rise of physical and&nbsp; mental depression people are suffering today</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exposure to WiFi can\nresult in a buildup of positive ions in your body.&nbsp;&nbsp; In&nbsp; my\nchildhood I used to see and run after THUMBIs ( small dragon flies) and\nbutterflies \u2014all have disappeared.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara yoga equates\nShakti and Shiva with prana and&nbsp; chitta,\nwhich manifest in the body as the two nadis, pingala&nbsp; and ida.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIn Samkhya philosophy they are known as prakriti and purusha, which\ncreated the cosmos .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions are\nproduced by solar radiations in the upper layers of the atmosphere and are\nattracted towards the earth by positive ions. During their descent they become\ntrapped by oxygen or nitrogen particles and thereby unite with them. As we\nbreathe, our cells are automatically energised by the electrical charges of\nthese ions in the air.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this way we can\nvisualise the earth as an enormous magnet, generating electromagnetic fields\nfrom its opposite poles. The northern and eastern hemispheres are positively\ncharged while the southern and western hemispheres are negatively charged.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These fields both attract and repulse ions, causing a current of movement\naround the terrestrial plane. Only recently these fields were found to vibrate\nthrough the physical body also, creating a flow of energy from one organ to the\nother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body also assumes\nelectromagnetic properties and can be divided into opposite poles. According to\nyogic texts, the upper part of the body corresponds to the positive, northern\npole and the lower part to the negative, southern pole. The right side and back\nportions are also positive poles and the left and frontal portions are negative\npoles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These positive and\nnegative charges of energy are the basis of swara yoga. The ancient rishis\ncalled the negative flow ida and the positive flow pingala. By controlling\nthese currents, modern technology has developed the means of generating\nenormous amounts of electrical energy and even the ability to artificially\nionise the air.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly, the rishis of\nyore knew the techniques to channelize bio-energy or prana throughout the body.\nJust as electrical power is at our disposal by connecting a switch to the main\npower line, so the rishis knew how to connect the switches and circuits of\nenergy in the body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They understood that the flow of energy, whether internal\nor external, is constantly being circulated from the more highly charged to the\nlesser charged centres in order to create a balance between the positive and\nnegative poles.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara yoga teaches us to manipulate the flow of breath through\nthe nostrils, thereby controlling the energy switches in our own body which\nregulate the flow of positive and negative currents.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is by balancing these\ntwo poles of energy that the yogi brings about the awakening of kundalini, the\nhigh powered generator which illumines the fabulous, hitherto unexplored areas\nof the brain responsible for all of man's ingenuity, higher knowledge and\nself-realization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The specific functions\nof the cerebral region of the brain correlate with the activities of ida and\npingala.&nbsp; The&nbsp; cerebrum is symmetrical, consisting of the\nright and left&nbsp; hemispheres.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right\nbrainlobe&nbsp; governs the left side of&nbsp; the body and the left brainlobe governs the\nright side of the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ida is\nconnected to the right hemisphere and&nbsp;\npingala to the left.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala emerges on the\nright hand side of mooladhara,&nbsp; exactly\nopposite to ida. It spirals up the spinal column,&nbsp; crossing ida at the four major energy\ncentres, and terminates&nbsp; at the root of\nthe right nostril. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala governs the\nwhole&nbsp; right side of the body.&nbsp; To control pingala the breath in the&nbsp; right nostril is manipulated by the Swara\nYogi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An electrical circuit,\nhas&nbsp; three specific wires-- one positive,\none negative and one neutral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise, within the\nbody there are three specific nadis for conducting energy. In yoga&nbsp; the negative line is ida, the channel of\nmanas shakti&nbsp; or mental force .The\npositive&nbsp; line is pingala, which channels\nthe dynamic energy of prana&nbsp; shakti.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to avoid\nshort-circuiting of these lines there&nbsp; is\na third channel, sushumna , which functions as an earth&nbsp; wire, being rooted in mooladhara chakra, when\nit is in its&nbsp; dormant state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the real purpose of\nsushumna is to&nbsp; provide a channel for the\nspiritual energy, which is a greater force than either manas or prana shakti.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The swara yogi&nbsp; manipulates the flow of air in the left\nnostril in order to control ida directly and either bring about its influence\nat will or suppress it when necessary.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to swara\nyoga, left nostril breathing influences the activities of manas shakti, and\nindicates that introversion and mental creativity predominate so that any\nextremely dynamic or extrovert activity should be avoided. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida nadi, the negative\nchannel, brings consciousness into every part of the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; Shiva Swarodaya likens its nature to the energy\ncreated by the moon; therefore, it is also&nbsp;\nknown as the chandra or lunar nadi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida is associated\nwith&nbsp; the parasympathetic nervous system\n(PNS), which sends impulses to the visceral organs to stimulate the\ninternal&nbsp; processes. This creates a\ngeneral state of relaxation in the&nbsp;\nsuperficial muscles, thus lowering the outer body temperature.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ida is cooling, relaxing and introverting.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala is the\ntransmitter of prana shakti.&nbsp; It is the\npositive&nbsp; aspect, also known as the surya\nor solar nadi because its&nbsp; energy is as\ninvigorating as the sun's rays. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala energy&nbsp; activates the physical body and externalizes\nawareness. It is&nbsp; associated with the\nsympathetic nervous system (SNS), which&nbsp; releases\nadrenaline to stimulate the superficial muscles.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SNS prepares the\nbody to cope with stress and external&nbsp;\nactivity; for example, it makes the heart beat rapidly and&nbsp; heats the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; Pingala is energizing,&nbsp; heating and extroverting.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The negative ion\nconcentration in ida nadi quickly increases from its rest or basal\nconcentration during left nostril inhalation.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIt then reaches a maximum and begins to fall off gradually, because the\nconcentration of ions is greater in the regions of low pranic density and less\nin regions of high pranic density.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The negative ion\nconcentration in ida nadi quickly increases from its rest or basal\nconcentration during left nostril inhalation.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIt then reaches a maximum and begins to fall off gradually, because the\nconcentration of ions is greater in the regions of low pranic density and less\nin regions of high pranic density.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the ionoplasmic\ncentres (chakras) where ida and pingala are in the closest proximity, one being\nin front of sushumna and the other behind, there is an effect called ionic\nmigration and annihilation. When the negative ions from ida migrate towards\npingala, attracted by its positive ions, many are annihilated as they merge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We find two types of\nions in the atmosphere:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Small negative ions or\nnormal ions.--- They possess high electric activity, being tiny portions of\nenergy in almost pure look. In the air inhaled by us they are provided by the\nseparate oxygen atoms or nitrogen bearing the charge equal to charge of one\nelectron. Small negative ions introduce vitality in organism and correspond to\natmospheric prana in its active form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big or slow ions.---\nThey consist of polymolecular kernel and as if this kernel of normal negative\nion which has got to trap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Small negative ions\npossess high speed, are very mobile while slow ions are something like the\nflycatchers which are catching and sticking together small ions. Availability\nof considerable number of the big slow ions formed as a result of capture of\nmobile ions reduces conductivity of air. It occurs when air is polluted, for\nexample, by dust, smoke or fog.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally it is\npossible to tell that concentration of small ions in the atmosphere decreases\nwith increase in concentration of big ions in the atmosphere and vice versa,\nthat is concentration of one is inversely proportional concentration of others.\nThat is why in the polluted atmosphere of the cities there is surplus of big\nions.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In view of that\nnegative ions are \"workers of intracellular life\"-- it is obvious how\ncity atmosphere is poor in prana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana can be explained\nin terms of ions. When enough energy acts upon a gaseous molecule, the&nbsp; electron is ejected and can be attached to an\nadjacent molecule. When the displaced electron attaches itself to an adjacent\nmolecule, it becomes a negative ion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original molecule then becomes a\npositive ion. Positive and negative ions are the components of the air one\nbreathes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one inhales negative ions, they increase the level of prana in\nthe body. The opposite happens when we inhale positive ions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a mountain or\nby the beach, there are about 6,000 negative ions per square foot while in the\ncity or in a stuffy room we may have less than 40 negative ions per square\nfoot.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been proven that being in a an environment with an abundance of\nnegative ions improves mood and overall energy levels. Negative ions are not\nprana, but when one inhales them the level of prana in the body increases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis because air is a vehicle for prana to enter the body. It has also been\nobserved that the ability to assimilate negative ions goes up during yogic\npractices such as pranayama.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions are\noxygen atoms charged with an extra electron. They are created in nature by the\neffects of water, air, sunlight and the Earth\u2019s inherent radiation.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negatively charged ions\nare most prevalent in natural places and particularly around moving water or\nafter a thunderstorm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That taste in the air\nand feeling you get at the beach, near a waterfall or after a storm is your\nbody being saturated in the benefits of negative ions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions enhance\nour mood, stimulate our senses, improve appetite and sexual drive, provide\nrelief from hay fever, sinusitis, bronchial asthma, allergies, migraines, even\npost operative pain and burns.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions stimulate the reticuloendothelial\nsystem which is a group of defense cells in our bodies which marshal our\nresistance to disease. Negative ions promote alpha brain waves and increased\nbrain wave amplitude which results in a higher awareness level. The body is\nbetter able to absorb oxygen into the blood cells, oxidize serotonin and filter\nairborne contaminants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You might have noticed\nthat you feel more refreshed near the ocean, a waterfall or even taking a\nshower. This is because all of these areas have a higher concentration of\nnegative ions to positive ones. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Static can also come\nfrom synthetic building materials, synthetic carpets, synthetic furniture,\nsynthetic fabrics and clothing, plastics, urethane finishes, as well as EMF\u2019s.\nAll of these synthetic materials and objects will greatly upset the normal ion\nbalance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indoor air that has a\nhigher concentration of positive ions can lead to Sick Building Syndrome. In\nsuch room people do NOT get proper REM sleep and they see POOCHANDI&nbsp; ( sinister ghosts ) at night. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A big percentage of people in cities have this\u2014but\nthey are ashmaed to tell.&nbsp;&nbsp; Suryanamaskar\nis the only way out</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We generate a type of\nstatic electricity within the body which attracts negative ions from the\nenvironment into our system, therefore even in a confined space, in a closed\nroom where there are not many negative ions per square centimetre, after the\npractice of pranayama, we will still feel vibrant, energetic and light, because\nwe have built up this form of static energy which is attracting the negative\nions from the environment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quality of air we\nbreath in, is the quality of Prana we take on. The exhilaration and vitality\nexperienced near a waterfall or high in the mountains is due to the Prana\nquantum present in the air.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the dullness we experience in air polluted or\nair recycled area is due to the poor Prana quantum in the air. Science has\nattempted to explain this phenomenon in terms of positive and negative ions..\nAreas with excellent air quality have high levels of energy, negative ions,and\nPrana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ion is a molecule\nthat has lost or gained an electron through various atmospheric forces or\nenvironmental influences. Positive ions are&nbsp;\nmolecules that have been stripped of an electron positive ions are so\nsmall they can be absorbed directly into your bloodstream from the air you\nbreathe.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An excess of positively charged ions in your environment is believed to\ncontribute to tiredness and a lack of energy, tension, anxiety and\nirritability.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positive ions in the air have even been investigated as a\ncontributing factor for asthma and depression. Negative ions are created when a\nmolecule gains a negatively charged electron. Due to this nature, they are\nstatically attracted to airborne particles like dust, mold and other pollutants\nand potential allergens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By attaching to these\npollutants and allergens they give them a negative charge and, rather than\ndrifting in the air, they are grounded and fall to the floor or nearest\nsurface. Even bacteria and viruses circling in a room can be cleared by\nnegatively charged ions attaching to them and removing them from the air.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the natural world,\nnegative ions are in abundance, particularly in forests, at the beach and most\nintensely near waterfalls. This is a good part of the reason why you usually\nfeel so great in these places and find it difficult to be tired or depressed The\nmost powerful demonstration of the energizing and refreshing effects of\nnegatively charged ions can be tasted in the air after a thunderstorm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative\nions are odorless, tasteless, and invisible molecules that we inhale in\nabundance in certain environments. Think mountains, waterfalls, and beaches.\nOnce they reach our bloodstream, negative ions are believed to produce\nbiochemical reactions that increase levels of the mood chemical serotonin,\nhelping to alleviate depression, relieve stress, and boost our daytime energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.Normally only1/10th\nof the human brain is in use because an enormous amount of energy is required\nto recruit the entire brain to function as a whole. However, Pranayama helps\nsupply the required energy necessary to stimulate the dormant areas of the\nbrain, awakening the genius within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The advent of outer\nspace exploration has brought science's attention to electromagnetic fields in\nthe atmosphere which are conducted by the earth. These fields consist of\npositively and negatively charged fragments of molecules known as ions, upon\nwhich life is dependent for producing energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A negative ion has the charge of\none electron, and a positive ion the charge of one proton. Of the two, negative\nions are the most active electrically.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In chemistry, FREE\nRADICALS radicals are atoms with unpaired electrons on an otherwise open shell\nconfiguration. These unpaired electrons are usually highly reactive. Free\nradical damage within cells has been linked to a range of disorders including\ncancer, arthritis, atherosclerosis, Alzheimer's disease, and Cell suicide, or\napoptosis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Free radicals are very unstable and react quickly with other\ncompounds, trying to capture the needed electron to gain stability. Generally,\nfree radicals attack the nearest stable molecule, \"stealing\" its\nelectron. When the \"attacked\" molecule loses its electron, it becomes\na free radical itself, beginning a chain reaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the process is\nstarted, it can cascade, finally resulting in the disruption of a living cell.\nEnvironmental factors such as pollution, radiation, cigarette smoke and\nherbicides can also spawn free radicals. Antioxidants neutralize free radicals\nby donating one of their own electrons, ending the\nelectron-\"stealing\" reaction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Colloidal silver has an electrical\nNEGATIVE ionic charge ( anion ) , which disables certain enzymes. Silver\ninvades diseased cells to destroy pathogens and immediately flush it out . It\nneutralises free radicals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silver can remove dust\nwhich are positively sharged. Positive ions are \u201c takers\u201d and have a exhausting\nand draing effect on the human body. A water fall mist or seashore spray\nemanates \u201c givers\u201d negative ions, drawing mystics and creative people for the Alpha\nstate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions in the blood stream accelerate the delivery of blood to\nthe cells. Remember, broad band antibiotics are effective against a dozen\norganisms ( till they become resistant super bugs ), while silver is effective\nagainst about 700. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO MICRO ORGANISM CEN\nEVER STAY ALIVE AGAINST COLLOIDAL SILVER.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is safe for pregnant women, being\nan electromagnetic process. It is a very old vedic tradition in India to use\nsilver foil to cover hard diary sweets , and to use negative ions of colloidal\nsilver for antimicrobial action, to improve metabolism ( to prevent obesity ) ,\nto speed up oxidation of Serotonin ( an ancent Viagra for sexual drive ). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do a simple experiment. Take two glass\ncontainers of milk, put a silver coin in one of them only and see which\ncontainer becomes curd first. After all seeing is believing. Use your sense of\nsmell and taste too.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kings when they set out\non long war campaigns used silver containers to prevent algae in their potable\nwater .
