IT IS SO SORDID THAT MY HONOUR DOES NOT ALLOW ME TO REVEAL THIS --UNLESS HE PROVOKES ME..<br />\n<br />\nAIYYOOOOOOOOOOOOOO<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; text-align: left; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3934132810452958214\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative; text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_104M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_16.html?showComment=1518860513104#c3934132810452958214\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2018 at 3:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDiamond traders have a modus operandi. They file false cases against select customers and agencies to smother them mentally. They have help from judges/ lawyers. All of them operate dozens of SHELL companies<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING in diamonds (or repeated export and import of same polished diamonds) is wherein traders undertake a series of exports and imports of the same goods for the purpose of receiving greater bank financing.<br />\n<br />\nHypothetically, if a parcel made five round trips it means that for every $1 million worth of polished goods, the exporter got $5 million in financing.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is DELIBERATELY allowed for big corporate businesses ( who donate to the ruling party ) which bring back their black money through bogus shell companies . These funds are invested in the economy as FDI.<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping ( phudia ghumao ) of diamond consignments from one market to another is practised among the diamond trading circle in Mumbai. The bogus trade enables a diamond trading company to artificially inflate balance sheets for raising loans.<br />\n<br />\nBank managers get bribes in foreign accounts or get paid in Bitocin for services rendered . This is why maximum Bitcoin acitivity happens in Surat\u2014the ADDA of crypto Jew diamond traders<br />\n<br />\nThere is a clear link between round-tripping and bank financing.This is NO big secret. When you donate to both ruling and opposition parties you can get away with anything.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is a phenomenon by which Indian individuals and companies avoid tax by sending funds abroad and then bringing them back on to home soil via Mauritius-based companies. Much of the investment into India via Mauritius over the last 15 years is believed to have been by CORRUPT Indian residents\u2014all BIG FISH<br />\n<br />\nSigned in 1983, the Double Taxation Avoidance treaty between the two countries made Mauritius, which taxes capital gains at near-zero rates, an attractive \u201cpost box address\u201d for foreign investors to route investments into India Indians who evaded taxes set up shell companies in Mauritius, concealing identities and channeling cash or stock market investments through \u201cround tripping\u201d and \u201cparticipatory notes\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) tightened the norms for participatory notes (P-notes) in order to check misuse of these instruments in round-tripping and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nMauritius had become the top source of FDI into the country only due to ROUND TRIPPING.<br />\n<br />\nMauritius had been the source of more than 37% of all foreign direct investment inflows into India between 2000 and 2015.<br />\n<br />\nFew months ago, India and Singapore signed a pact for amendment of the Double Taxation Avoidance Agreement (DTAA), in a bid to curb illegal hoarding of money and to prevent round-tripping of funds, misused for tax evasion. This was done for Mauritius and Cyprus earlier<br />\n<br />\nA special-purpose entity (SPE; or, in Europe and India, special-purpose vehicle/SPV, or, in some cases in each EU jurisdiction \u2013 FVC, financial vehicle corporation) is a legal entity (usually a limited company of some type or, sometimes, a limited partnership) created to fulfill narrow, specific or temporary objectives.<br />\n<br />\nSPEs are typically used by companies to isolate the firm from financial risk. They are also commonly used to hide debt (inflating profits), hide ownership, and obscure relationships between different entities which are in fact related to each other.<br />\n<br />\nNormally a company will transfer assets to the SPE for management or use the SPE to finance a large project thereby achieving a narrow set of goals without putting the entire firm at risk.<br />\n<br />\nSPEs are also commonly used in complex financings to separate different layers of equity infusion. Commonly created and registered in tax havens, SPEs allow tax avoidance strategies unavailable in the home district.<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping is one such strategy. In addition, they are commonly used to own a single asset and associated permits and contract rights (such as an apartment building or a power plant), to allow for easier transfer of that asset.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_104BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_102TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_102TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedBSscD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_102TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_102TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedBSscD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_102TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_102TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_102TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedBSscD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_102B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5534687230680852345\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_102M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_16.html?showComment=1518860559509#c5534687230680852345\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2018 at 3:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_102MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s diamond export figures are false and manipulative. An export of 40 billion USD worth of polished diamonds and the import of $30 billion worth of polished diamonds \u2013 is classic example of round-tripping.<br />\n<br />\nIndia is a POLISHED diamond exporter and there is no need for importing POLISHED diamonds. Sab mil bhaantke khate hein.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of nipping round tripping in the bud \u2013 the Indian govt just imposed a miniscule import duty.<br />\n<br />\nHow did the practice of round-tripping start? It all started as an unexpected CRYPTO JEW GUJARATI arm of the diamond industry\u2019s request to the government to change the way it was taxed. Instead of being taxed on profit, like most other industries, it sought to be taxed on turnover, like the diamond trade in Israel.<br />\n<br />\nThe govt promptly scrapped three duties on POLISHED diamond imports<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping became an economical practice since then, a completely new way to make money from diamonds.<br />\n<br />\nThe KAHAAANI was that that our enterprising CRYPTO JEW Gujarati diamond processors who had mining licenses in African countries where they mined, processed and wanted to bring back polished diamonds to India.<br />\n<br />\nSee they love Bharatmata so much\u2014these crypto Jew Gujarati desh bhakts ( SIC ) must be given ZERO percent 0% duty right?<br />\n<br />\nThe message from the Indian Govt was\u2014HAPPY KOSHER ROUND TRIPPING !<br />\n<br />\nPOLITICAL DONNASSANN BHOOLNA MATH !<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s gross polished diamond export was at least 15 billion USD MORE than the value of diamonds sold by retailers worldwide .. The export figures is clearly inflated.<br />\n<br />\nWhere did the diamonds disappear? Dubai. The UAE, India\u2019s top export destination, kept only 6.8 per cent of the BILLONS of polished diamonds it imported from India. Rest of the consignment went back and forth between India and the UAE, four to five times before they went down the pipeline.<br />\n<br />\nNow let\u2019s see the nexus between round-tripping and bank financing. If a parcel made four round trips for the sake of financing, it meant that for every $1 million worth of goods, the exporter got $5 million in financing. A good arrangement only as long as you could pay it back.<br />\n<br />\nSince this heavy financing is borrowed without matching collateral ( on pressure from politicians ), the diamond-financing banks in India are jittery. The bank managers are convenient scapegoats<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK CRYPTO JEW GUJARATI DIAMOND TRADERS HAVE OFFICES IN DUBAI\u2014IN DUBAI PEOPLE BUY PEARLS-NEVER DIAMONDS !<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK DUBAI HAS SUCH A HUGE HAWALA MARKET ?<br />\n<br />\nDubai is a safe haven for the Indian traders who indulged in \u2018round tripping\u2019. Dubai does not impose any tax on either import or export of diamonds. It merely acted as a \u2018trading ground\u2019 as consumption of polished goods in Dubai was minimal.<br />\n<br />\nBlack money is sent to Dubai through hawala transaction (an illegal banking system). Here money is deposited there in the bank account of a diamond dealer. A parcel of diamonds is then sold by that company, that\u2019s paid for with the hawala money.<br />\n<br />\nThe parcel is then re-imported and traded several times. This is done to bring the black money into the system. And once it is done, it is brought back into the country and deployed in the markets in the form of overseas investments, sub-accounts or portfolio investments<br />\n<br />\nCrypto Jew Gujarati diamond company has branches all over the world, it doesn\u2019t really mean that they are supplying diamonds in every country. It could just be a \u2018pit stop\u2019 for a diamond parcel that travels from one branch office to another in different countries ... at times to three or four branch offices in the guise of \u2018export\u2019.<br />\n<br />\nSo, in each country the value of the polished goods is inflated to cover the borrowing rate in the previous country. So, a single consignment of diamonds can generate five times its value in loans.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_102MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_102BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_102B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_103B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7011116652235957486\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_103M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This was a classic example of \u2018round tripping\u2019 for a country like India, which is a processor and exporter of polished diamonds - all done to misuse bank finance.<br />\n<br />\nIn Kerala round tripping happens with GOLD ! Everybdy knows this.<br />\n<br />\nWHAT HAPPENED TO OUR THINK TANKS\u2014OF I FORGOT\u2014THEY HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS.<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES INDIA HAVE A LAWYER AS OUR FINANCE MINISTER?<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE NEED A KENYAN GUJARATI AS OUR RBI GOVERNOR?<br />\n<br />\nTRY PUTTING ABOVE COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF INDIAN MINISTERS WHO PROTECT PM MODI MORE THAN THEY PROTECT BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WILL SPAM YOU.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE SORRY STATE OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPU ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR<br />\nSBI CHARIRMAN<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nMEA<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCOMMERCE MINISTER<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nYOGI AITYANATH<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS<br />\nSPREAD ON SACIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_103B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; Thousands of Enron employees lost not only their jobs, but also their savings and pensions, which were tied up in company stock.<br />\n<br />\nRemarkably, bribed KOSHER US judges found that Enrons criminal auditors could not be held legally responsible for what was clearly criminal negligence and dereliction of duty over a prolonged period.<br />\n<br />\nInstead, the only charge that could be brought against it was obstruction of justice, for shredding documents relating to its audit of Enron. And even that was overturned by the Supreme Court in 2005, on grounds of flaws in the instructions to the jury! However, because the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission did not allow it to audit public companies, the company could not retain viable business and eventually collapsed.<br />\n<br />\nEnron CEO Rebecca Mark came to India regularly in MINI SKIRT and flashed her hairy blonde pussy at India Maratha manoos politicians to soften them up and prevent them from driving a hard bargain...<br />\n<br />\nread all 33 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering.html<br />\n<br />\nAND MIND YOU , OUR CJI, JS KHEHAR WANTED FOREIGN JEW LAWYER FIRMS IN INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.news18.com/news/india/open-indian-legal-sector-to-foreign-players-says-cji-js-khehar-1455525.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_218BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; YOU SEE THEY ARE ALICE IN WONDERLAND AND LITTLE BO-PEEP COMBINE ( LIKE DILTON AND MOOSE )<br />\n<br />\nFOR THESE BIG FISH ARE BJPs POLITICAL DONORS...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1273716714988576163\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_184M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_8.html?showComment=1520735802685#c1273716714988576163\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 11, 2018 at 8:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_184MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHackers are sneaking cryptocurrency transaction processing software onto corporate networks, personal computers, and other devices.<br />\n<br />\nthe implications of illicit cryptomining are profoundly frightening. Because this type of cyberattack is \u2018relatively\u2019 benign \u2013 for certain definitions of \u2018relatively\u2019 \u2013 it\u2019s positioned to run amuck, taking over computers, networks, data centers, and cloud environments around the world.<br />\n<br />\nPrevention and mitigation technologies will never work well enough. There\u2019s only one way to slay this beast. We must make all cryptocurrency as we know it today illegal.<br />\n<br />\nThe problem with permissionless, public blockchains is that anybody can sign up as a miner \u2013 which means that there\u2019s nothing stopping criminals from doing so.<br />\n<br />\nThere are many different criminal pursuits that can leverage mining.<br />\n<br />\nMINING IS NOW CONTROLLED BY MAFIA POOLS<br />\n<br />\nInfiltrating our computers and networks is dead simple \u2013 all it takes is one phishing victim, one visit to a malicious web page, or one person downloading a fake app from an app store, and bam! The hacker is inside.<br />\n<br />\nInfiltration is a familiar first step to most corporate cyberattacks, which follow the Cyber Kill Chain \u2013 infiltrate, install malware, move laterally to a valuable target, establish a command and control (C&amp;C) link back to the hacker, and then exfiltrate the data or funds that are the target of the attack.<br />\n<br />\nThe most devious aspect of illicit cryptomining, is the fact that it can run undetected indefinitely. After all, nothing\u2019s being stolen except excess processor cycles and a bit of electricity.<br />\n<br />\nThe most pernicious aspect of illicit cryptomining is how well it flies under the radar of its victims.. Illicit cryptomining is rapidly replacing ransomware as the attack vector of choice, especially as cybersecurity vendors bring ransomware protection to marke<br />\n<br />\nHackers follow this pattern when their goal is to steal something (in other words, \u2018exfiltrate data\u2019),<br />\n<br />\nCybersecurity vendors can detecting and disrupting the steps in the Kill Chain- but in India we don\u2019t have the technical wherewithal.<br />\n<br />\nMonero mining botnet is extremely large, made up mostly of Microsoft Windows servers spread around the globe.. More than half a million machines have been hijacked by a cryptocurrency miner botnet, forcing them to mine more than 9,000 monero tokens (worth roughly $ 4 million),<br />\n<br />\nChina is hacking into India\u2014what have we done ? NOTHING !<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.cyberscoop.com/monero-mining-botnet-earns-suspected-chinese-hacker-25000-per-month/<br />\n<br />\nTHE MODI GOVT IS ALLOWING BJPs BIG FISH POLITICAL DONORS TO FLY CAPITAL AWAY FROM INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\nARUN JAITLEY PRAISED BLOACKCHAIN IN HIS BUDGET SPEECH..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK HIM \u2013 NAME THE ACHIEVEMENTS OF BLOCKCHAIN TILL TODAY IN NINE YEARS OF ITS EXISTENCE \u2014 LEAVE OUT THE BULLSHIT YOU GET ON THE INTERNET..<br />\n<br />\nALL IT HAS DONE IS TO REGULARISE LAND GRABBED BY JEWS IN GEORGIA AND ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/02/blockchain-bitcoin-value-skyrocketed.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4265279547036492645\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_125M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Bitcoin is PROPERTY and must have capital gain implications. Anything purchased using Bitcoin must be liable to be taxed as a capital gain.. capt ajit vadakayil .. text-decoration-line: none;\">March 26, 2018 at 1:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY IS PRESIDENT XI SUPPORTING BLOCKCHAIN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL--<br />\n<br />\nNOW THAT HE IS PRESIDENT FOR LIFE--<br />\n<br />\nTHE COMMIE PARTY IS BUSY BURYING ALL THEIR PAST FINANCIAL CRIMES --AFTER WHITEWASHING IT WITH \"LOOP HOLE DESIGNED\" SMART CONTRACTS..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/02/blockchain-bitcoin-value-skyrocketed.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6516525983836331194\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_96M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html?showComment=1522068945089#c6516525983836331194\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 26, 2018 at 6:25 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_96MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/dark-net-bitcoin-new-conduits-for-drug-peddling/articleshow/63466111.cms<br />\n<br />\nLast year, a group of students were arrested in Hyderabad on charges of purchasing LSD (also called \u2018acid\u2019) on the dark web. But they weren\u2019t arrested because they had made the transaction on the dark web<br />\n<br />\nIn 2002, the U.S. Naval Laboratory released one of the earliest versions of The Onion Router (TOR), a software that would allow anonymous communication between American intelligence agents and operatives on foreign soil.<br />\n<br />\nTor was soon appropriated by cyberpunks, who began using the protocol to give access to websites that would host, share, and trade illicit goods. Today, the dark web is a sub-section of the deep web, accessed using specialised software like Tor that ensures absolute anonymity ( SIC )<br />\n<br />\nSORRY-- ALL THOSE YOU HAVE ACCESSED CHILD PORNOGRAPHY HAS BEEN PROFILED.. THEIR PHONES AND EMAILS ARE TAPPED..<br />\n<br />\nThe Deep Web contains a number of Darknets, that cannot also be indexed by conventional search engines, and special types of browsers , such as the Tor browser, or dedicated proxy servers are required to access them.<br />\n<br />\nThe Tor network, or the Onion Router, is by far the most popular Darknet and is associated with activities that are considered illegal under many jurisdictions.<br />\n<br />\nMore than 71% of live websites on the dark web hosted illicit material.<br />\n<br />\nOnce a transaction is finalised, the payment is held \u2018in escrow\u2019 \u2014 a third party arbitration system which ensures the buyer is paid only after they have met their end of the bargain.<br />\n<br />\nAs if taken straight out of a dystopian novel, the dark web, initially created by the US government to permit anonymous communication between DEEP STATE OPERATIVE , is essentially a kind of parallel universe, concealed within the masked depths of the Internet.<br />\n<br />\nIt exploits a particular technology known as \u2018Tor\u2019 (The Onion Router, the name derived from an encryption technique which makes websites untraceable) to form a network of undetectable online material, accessed solely by using particular software or with sanction.<br />\n<br />\nThe dark web is a mirror image of the regular surface web, albeit 400 to 550 times larger, with clones of social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter.<br />\n<br />\nDue to its anonymous nature, it also serves as a hub of crime, from child porn to black markets to hiring KILL/ KIDNAP mercenaries to buying drugs to fake passports to how to cook and eat humans-- business is done with BITCOIN<br />\n<br />\nA recent development on the dark web involved the drugging, kidnapping and consequent auctioning of 20 year old British model, Chloe Ayling. The sex trafficking gang, the \u2018Black Death Group\u2019, led the model to Milan under the misconception that she would attend a photo shoot.<br />\n<br />\nThe dark web makes it very easy for people to master the tricks of hacking. There are sites that will give you a step by step tutorial on hacking. Many hackers even provide hacking services and groups even recruit hackers based on their skills.<br />\n<br />\nARUN JAITLEY HAS SPONSORED BLOCKCHAIN.. THIS INDIRECTLY MEANS HE SPONSORS CHILD PORNOGRAPHY.<br />\n<br />\nThe researchers at RWTH Aachen University in Germany claim to have uncovered the 274 links while investigating the non-financial data that's been stashed into Bitcoin's blockchain. This all could theoretically make the blockchain illegal to possess in almost ALL countries<br />\n<br />\nAlthough the Bitcoin blockchain is designed to record every transaction with the cryptocurrency, you can also adds snippets of non-financial data too. This has benefits. For instance, a notary service can tie a Bitcoin transaction to a digital document.<br />\n<br />\nThe blockchain network is decentralized, which helps make the data recorded practically immutable.<br />\n<br />\nBut this also introduces a problem: potentially anyone can anonymously insert controversial data on the blockchain.<br />\n<br />\nPoor AJIT DOVAL is ALICE IN WONDERLAND when it comes to technical issues .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_96MN\" kind=\"m\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" kind=\"i\" o=\"r\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522595769534#c6112774300140138912\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 1, 2018 at 8:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_27MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIllegal trading practices, like \u201cwash trading and spoofing,\u201d are being used on Bitfinex cryptocurrency exchange to manipulate Bitcoin\u2019s price<br />\n<br />\nWash trading is an epidemic in the Bitcoin / Bitfinex markets. A wash trade is where a person buys and sells to their own order.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNNjTaHpYd4<br />\n<br />\nWash trading is an illegal trading activity that artificially pumps up trading volume in a stock without the stock ever changing hands<br />\n.<br />\nWash trading involves acquiring shares of a stock through one broker while simultaneously selling the same shares of stock through another broker. A key component of wash trading is that the investor never actually takes ownership, and thus risk, in the stock.<br />\n<br />\nWithout assuming any risk, wash trading simply pumps up the trading volume of the stock artificially, creating the illusion that there is activity and demand for the stock. Wash trading is illegal because it is a way to manipulate market activity.<br />\n<br />\nWhere people successfully wash traded tens of millions of dollars of Bitcoin, and these numbers helped artificially inflate trade volumes on Bitfinex.<br />\n<br />\nBitfinex is a crypto-currency exchange trading and currency-storage platform.. Since 2014, Bitfinex has been the largest Bitcoin exchange platform, with over 10% of the exchanges' trading<br />\n<br />\nBitfinex ran arbitrage with other exchanges, and displayed orders from other exchanges as their own, as if it was their own order book.<br />\n<br />\n\u2018Spoofing\u2019 is displaying orders on your exchange which in reality are foreign orders to buy or sell Bitcoin, in an attempt to claim that your exchange has more liquidity than your competition. The \u2018Chief Strategy Officer\u2019 of Bitfinex, Phil Potter runs a Bitcoin arbitrage hedge fund.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA MUST KILL BITCOIN TOMORROW ON MONDAY 2ND APRIL 2018<br />\n<br />\nThe time to deliver the COUP DE GRACE is now !<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/02/blockchain-bitcoin-value-skyrocketed.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF \u2013<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR<br />\nSBI CHAIRMAN<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SBHA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nTRADE MINISTER<br />\nHOME MINISTRY\u2019<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">..</span></b></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 18, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the root of vata,\npitta and kapha are its subtle counterparts called prana, tejas and ojas.&nbsp;&nbsp; Unlike the doshas, which in excess create\ndiseases, these promote health, creativity and well-being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Prana is our life\nforce and is the healing energy of vata (air)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Tejas is our inner\nradiance and is the healing energy of pitta (fire)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Ojas is the ultimate\nenergy reserve of the body derived from kapha (water)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is our subtle\nenergy, &nbsp;that revitalizes every organ and\nkeeps us flexible and happily moving. Tejas\nis our inner radiance and creativity, our \u00e9lan vital, jivana. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas is the vital\ncushion that protects us and these two other energies. It helps them grow\nsafely.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kapha is the water principle relates to mucous, lubrication and is the\nnutrient carrier. Its main working locations are the mucous-producing tissues\nand organs such as those in the chest and gastric regions, palate, joints,\nplasma and lymph.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Kapha dosha\nbecomes aggravated, mucus increases, leading to sinus congestion, and loss of Nitric\nOxide production<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The myelin sheaths\nwhich are composed of ojas (water element) are burned by high tejas (fire\nelement).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without ojas, every\nlittle stimulus can bug us, each change can rattle our mood. With ojas, we\ndevelop equanimity and a deeper trust in who we are and what we are here to\nmanifest.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas strengthens our immunity and equanimity. Brain\nwaves are one way that the nervous system manifests ojas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tejas and prana cannot\nflourish without ojas and may even harm us. If ojas shrinks from exhaustion or\nexcess Vata or sheer overload, it cannot provide the healthy container that\nprana and tejas need. &nbsp;Auto-immune\ndiseases or mental disturbances may result. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With insufficient ojas,\nprana can become hyper and tejas can manifest as manic. When someone is at risk\nof nervous exhaustion or in an auto-immune depleted state, here is when ojas\nneeds to be built, rather than prana or tejas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana-rich foods are\nthose that have grown up humus laden top soils teeming with earthworms and good\nmicrobes -- with love and respect. &nbsp;There\nis no GM food ( grown on chemical fertilizer / pesticide laden soil ) which is\nrich in prana.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increased prana gives\nus more enthusiasm, adaptability and creativity, all necessary when pursuing\nour spiritual path, in yoga this force is necessary to enable us to perform.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tejas provides us with courage, fearlessness and insight, important when taking\ndecisions.&nbsp; Ojas gives us peace, confidence\nand patience to keep our development consistent and avoiding that we give up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Ayurveda,\neverything that exists in the universe is made up of the five elements; earth,\nwater, fire, air and space (ether). All that exists in the universe, exists\nwithin us. We all contain these same five elements in different amounts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nprana, the energetic equivalent of breath, mixes with the five elements, the\ndoshas are formed. There are three doshas or constitutions: Vata( gas), Pitta (\nbile ) and Kapha ( mucous ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marma are places in our body where currents of\nlife-energies ( prana) cross over. They are serving as gates between body\u2019s\nphysical and energetic levels. They are widely used is healing bodywork to\neliminate toxins from the body, allowing healing and restoration of the tissues,\nchannels, digestion and mental functions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As long as prana flows\nin the body, one is alive. Prana comes from universal sources of energy and\nflow through everything. The way prana is received, flowing and used supports\nour wellness. If prana is weakened in our physiology, either by our choice in\ndiet or lifestyle activities, nature or season changes, we begin to experience\ndisease.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Revitalizing prana is the\nultimate rejuvenator.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana flows through our\nphysical body via energy channels called Nadis.&nbsp;\nThere are 72,000 nadis &nbsp;which\nbranch out to feed prana to all our different systems, tissues, and\norgans.&nbsp; At these branches, gaps exist\nbetween them and prana is transformed to support the branches' destinations.&nbsp; This tranformational gap is a marma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowledge of Marma was\nnot separate between Kalari and Ayurveda.&nbsp;\nDiscussion of the Marma points is found in most of the great texts of\nAyurveda but the most famous text to explore the subject is the Sushruta\nSamhita.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the context of\nAyurveda, the Dhatu is interpreted as a substance which supports the Sharira\n(body), Manasa (psyche or mind), and Prana (elan vital or life). Sharira Vayu\nin its fivefold division such as Prana, Udana, Vyana, Samana, and Apana is a\nforce rather than a corporeal substance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Upanishads, Agni is spoken of as\nPrana. The concept of Agni in Ayurveda is given utmost importance as life or\notherwise depends surely on it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kundalini Yoga is the\nYoga of prana. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is the\nlife-energy or life-principle of the universe. There are three principal\nchannels through which this life-energy flows. These channels are Ida, Pingala\nand Sushumna.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit these channels are called nadis. Ida, Pingala and\nSushumna are inside our subtle physical body, not inside the gross physical.\nIda carries the current of life-energy in the left side of the body.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Pingala carries the current in the right side\nof the body. Sushumna carries the current in the middle of the spinal column. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sushumna is the most\nimportant of the three nadis. It receives a ceaseless stream of life-energy\nfrom the universal Consciousness-Light. There is an inner connection between\nIda and Pingala and the zodiac and planets.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida has a special connection with\nthe moon and the planet Mercury; hence its main quality is coolness and mildness.\nPingala is connected with the sun and Mars; hence its quality is powerful and\ndynamic heat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An electrical circuit,\nhas&nbsp; three specific wires-- one positive,\none negative and one neutral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise, within the\nbody there are three specific nadis for conducting energy. In yoga&nbsp; the negative line is ida, the channel of\nmanas shakti&nbsp; or mental force .The\npositive&nbsp; line is pingala, which channels\nthe dynamic energy of prana&nbsp; shakti.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to avoid\nshort-circuiting of these lines there&nbsp; is\na third channel, sushumna , which functions as an earth&nbsp; wire, being rooted in mooladhara chakra, when\nit is in its&nbsp; dormant state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the real purpose of\nsushumna is to&nbsp; provide a channel for the\nspiritual energy, which is a greater force than either manas or prana shakti.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida rules the left\nnostril. Pingala rules the right nostril. When we breathe in and out primarily\nthrough our left nostril we have to know that it is Ida that is functioning.\nWhen we breathe in and out through our right nostril it is Pingala that is\nfunctioning.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And when both of the nostrils are functioning satisfactorily we\nhave to know that it is Sushumna that is playing its role. It also happens at\ntimes that Ida breathes in and Pingala breathes out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida, Pingala and\nSushumna meet together at six different places. Each meeting place forms a\ncentre. Each centre is round like a wheel. Indian spiritual philosophy calls\nthese centres chakras. They are also called lotuses, because they look like\nlotuses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The six centres, as perhaps you know, are Muladhara, Svadhisthana,\nManipura, Anahata, Vishuddha and Ajna. There is also another chakra that is\ninside the brain, called Sahasrara. Because it is in the brain, and not along\nthe spinal column, it is not counted with the other six centres<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marmas are the seats of\nJeeva or life. This means to tell that marmas are important points where life\nelement exists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among all the\ndefinitions of Marma, Acharya Sushruta gives the most comprehensive and\ncomplete one 6200 years ago---.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Marma is the\nconglomeration (meeting place) of the five elements of the body namely \u2013 Mamsa\n(muscles, flesh), Sira (blood vessels, arteries, and veins), Snayu (ligaments,\ntendons, and nerves), Asthi (bones) and Sandhi (joints). As a natural\nphenomenon, the Pranas (life element) are seated at these places of\nconglomeration. Therefore, any injury to these places leads to serious\nconsequences depending on the structure or structures predominantly involved in\nthe marma\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\ncomposition (predominant tissue present) of the Marmas---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mamsa Marmas\n(predominant in muscle tissue) \u2013 11 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sira Marmas\n(predominant in blood vessels) \u2013 41 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Snayu Marmas\n(predominant in ligaments, tendons) \u2013 27 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asthi Marmas\n(predominant in bone tissue) \u2013 08 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sandhi Marmas\n(predominant in bone joints) \u2013 20 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the effect\nof injury on the Marmas---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sadhyo Pranahara Marmas\n(cause immediate death on getting injured) \u2013 19 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalantara Pranahara Marmas\n(cause gradual death on getting injured) \u2013 33 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishalyaghna Marmas\n(cause death when the impacted foreign body is removed from the Marma) \u2013 3 in\nnumber<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaikalyakara Marmas\n(cause deformity on getting injured) \u2013 44 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rujakara Marmas (cause\nsevere pain on getting injured) \u2013 8 in number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Varaha Upanishad (\n5000 bc) further describes it as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The n\u0101\u1e0dis\npenetrate the body from the soles of the feet to the crown of the head. In them\nis pr\u0101\u1e47a, the breath of life and in that life abides \u0100tman, which is the abode\nof Shakti, creatrix of the animate and inanimate worlds.\" (VU 54/5)[6]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the physical body we\nhave two types of energies. One is&nbsp; prana\nand the other is consciousness. That means, in every organ of the body there\nshould be two channels supplying energy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Modern physiology describes two types\nof nervous systems - the sympathetic and the parasympathetic, and these two\nnervous systems are interconnected in each and every organ of the body. In the\nsame way, every organ is supplied with the energy of prana and the energy of\nmind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala nadi is the\ndistributing channel for prana in the body, and from each chakra the pranas are\ndisseminated to every organ of the body. From swadhisthana the pranic energy is\ndistributed to the genito-urinary system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manipura chakra supplies prana to the\ndigestive system and anahata supplies the respiratory and cardiovascular\nsystems. From vishuddhi, distribution takes place to the ears, eyes, nose and\nthroat, and ajna chakra is the distributor of energy through which man's brain\nis fed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is not merely a\nphilosophical concept; it is in every sense a physical substance. Just as\nradioactive or electromagnetic waves exist even though we can't see them, in\nthe same way, in this physical body, there are pranic waves and a pranic field.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, each of us has a certain quantity of prana in our physical body and we\nutilize this in the course of our day to day activities throughout life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nour prana diminishes, sickness sets in, and when we have plenty of prana, every\npart of the body is in perfect health. If we have an excess of prana, it can be\ntransmitted to others for healing or magnetism.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The inner prana can be\nstimulated by the practice of pranayama and thereby increased to a greater\nquantum. The brain requires maximum prana, and for the practice of meditation,\nit needs an increased supply.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is for this reason that we practise pranayama\nbefore commencing our meditation practice. If we are not able to supply plenty\nof pranic fuel to the brain, the mind becomes very restless and disturbed.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the brain is\nreceiving a deficient supply of prana, you suffer from nervous depression or\nnervous breakdown. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women know what is\nthe meaning of hot flashes &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole\nbody perspires, there is trembling in every organ, you can't stand, your mind\nis unsteady and you are constantly thinking negative thoughts. You can't even\nsleep and you don't want to talk or think. This state indicates that the brain\nis only receiving a very small quantity of prana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain is a subtle\ninstrument and it can only be enriched by the subtle form of prana and not the\ngross form. Therefore, when you practise pranayama, you will have to convert\nthe prana into a subtle force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep breathing alone is\nnot enough to stimulate prana. By breathing deeply, you stimulate your\nrespiratory system and the blood circulation.&nbsp;\nWhen you practise pranayama with concentration, as shown by scientific\nstudies, the brainwaves undergo a significant change and the limbic system is\nalso positively influenced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to swara\nyoga, left nostril breathing influences the activities of manas shakti, and\nindicates that introversion and mental creativity predominate so that any\nextremely dynamic or extrovert activity should be avoided. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida nadi, the negative\nchannel, brings consciousness into every part of the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; Shiva Swarodaya likens its nature to the\nenergy created by the moon; therefore, it is also&nbsp; known as the chandra or lunar nadi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida is associated\nwith&nbsp; the parasympathetic nervous system\n(PNS), which sends impulses to the visceral organs to stimulate the\ninternal&nbsp; processes. This creates a\ngeneral state of relaxation in the&nbsp;\nsuperficial muscles, thus lowering the outer body temperature.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ida is cooling, relaxing and introverting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala is the\ntransmitter of prana shakti.&nbsp; It is the\npositive&nbsp; aspect, also known as the surya\nor solar nadi because its&nbsp; energy is as\ninvigorating as the sun's rays. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala energy&nbsp; activates the physical body and externalizes\nawareness. It is&nbsp; associated with the\nsympathetic nervous system (SNS), which&nbsp;\nreleases adrenaline to stimulate the superficial muscles.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SNS prepares the\nbody to cope with stress and external&nbsp;\nactivity; for example, it makes the heart beat rapidly and&nbsp; heats the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; Pingala is energizing,&nbsp; heating and extroverting.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uq4afxEFmtM/WnXFD69_F-I/AAAAAAABYXs/NtvdxoWuAzQNgZ7CTbZs5B25LyfBK5R0gCLcBGAs/s1600/drugs-actinegg-on-pns-5-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"479\" data-original-width=\"638\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uq4afxEFmtM/WnXFD69_F-I/AAAAAAABYXs/NtvdxoWuAzQNgZ7CTbZs5B25LyfBK5R0gCLcBGAs/s640/drugs-actinegg-on-pns-5-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara yoga explains\nthat the two major energy circuits, ida&nbsp;\nand pingala, can be regulated and controlled by means of&nbsp; the breath. If these currents are not flowing\nproperly, it&nbsp; becomes quite evident in\nthe breath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digestion is nothing\nmore than a slow form of burning that produces PRANA for your body to live on.\nDeath itself is defined as the absence of electrical activity in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar waves generated\nin the body via mobiius coils provide an energetic communication system that\nconnects all cells. In the Hindu system four\nstages of life have been prescribed: brahmacharya (celibacy), grihastha (family\nlife), vanaprastha (literally, living in a forest), sanyasa (total\nrenunciation). <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In the first stage,\nbrahmacharya, a person leads the life of a student as a celibate. After\nfinishing the studies, he enters the married life of a grihastha. Having fulfilled\nthe obligations to children and the society, both husband and wife follow\nspiritual pursuits.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In sanyasa, a person\ncompletely renounces all worldly belongings and becomes a mendicant. Again, in\nSanatana Dharma a unmarried man or a widower cant perform a yajna or homam. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The word \u2018virya\u2019\nmentioned means power of knowledge or action, vigor in body\u2019s organs and the\nmind, spiritual power or the attainment of siddhis. Senses in control, the mind\ngains in strength of its faculties. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharyam is the\n\u201con the path to Brahman\u201d and this has nothing to do with semen the way JEW\nRothschild injected into our scriptures and used his agents like Gandhi to\npropagate. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Gandhi kicked out his\nwife from his bed room and took in a German Jew \u2013 a Rothschild\u2019s agent who\nintroduced him to drug laced ( Khat leaves ) enema for instant gratification.\nLater this Jew was replaced by two teenaged naked girls , till he dies.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Gandhi\nneeded variety and these girls would be replaced often.
