Girls don\u2019t lose semen. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayil</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">March 18, 2017 at 8:57 AM<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Attachment to sensual\npleasures, ( of which excessive sex and infidelity is just one part ) is seen\nas an obstacle to spiritual knowledge. External denial and internal hankering\nafter sensual pleasures is no form of discipline. Not strenuously objecting to\nindulgences but gently and naturally developing an indifference is what is\nrecommended. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In the context of yoga\npractice, driving Prakriti back to its unmanifest state is the object.\nPrasadham ( tranquility) is the reward. The sign of attainment of this reward\nis the natural ( not forced) settling down of the senses away from chaotic\npursuits. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya asks an\naspirant to think about where he is putting his energy \u2013 sexual or otherwise.\nBrahmacharya is about allocation: using your resources effectively to achieve\nyour aspiration. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">To hone our practice of\nthis principle, we must learn to conserve and not waste energy on things that\ndo not serve our purpose. In other words, we always have a choice between\nfrittering away our energy on not-so-purposeful actions (and thoughts and\nworries), and directing them towards those that will serve us better and lead\nto more happiness, purpose, sense of union. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya, is as\nsimple as that. Brahmacharya means not misusing sex. Brahmacharya means \u2018to\nrespect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others\nsexually. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The sex you have with\nyour wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is a way\nto get to God\u2026 When sexual energy is directed wisely, it becomes a means to\ntranscend separation, or otherness. When sexual energy is used to exploit,\nmanipulate, or humiliate another, however, it propels us into deeper separation\nand ignorance (avidya). <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Like the other yamas,\nbrahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use or \u201cinvest\u201d our\nresources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of energy. Some\nthoughts and actions offer beneficial dividends, while others simply drain our\nresources. In the name of continence, we are asked to be wise investors. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The yamas all center\naround intuitive ways of being, and of treating ourselves and others, so that\nwe can be more connected internally and externally. The yamas are about how to\ntreat others \u2013 to achieve the aim of dissolving otherness. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When brahmacharya becomes\nstable then the yogi gains great energy and power. In a very traditional sense\nBrahmacharya was a description for the early part of life, on average up to\nabout the age of 25, before marriage, time focused on studies. Here all energy\nwas devoted to learning of which much of that was gaining the tools to practice\nthe ways to self-realisation. It was typically a time of sexual abstinence. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Later one entered\nfamily life and naturally sex was part of it. This was the system and culture\naround the time of Patanjali. The yogic process is one of channeling and\nmanaging energy within, where as in average daily life this life energy, or\nprana, is wasted, drained out the senses. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The thought of sex and\nthe force of the sex drive is a huge component in this. One of the biggest\ndrainers of energy is the sex impulse. Very often it plays a large distraction\njust in the mind even though no physical engagement has occurred. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It is very difficult\nfor that individual to find peace when the mind is continually distracted and\ndesirous of sexual activity. It draws the energy down and keeps it low. The\nflip side is some people totally suppress the sexual urge which leads to an\nunnatural repressed state and block. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sex is a need, both for\nsociety and for our personal well-being. Abstinence should never be forced. It\nshould come naturally. One might find at a point in life that time in sex is\ncomplete. This aspect of Brahmacharya has arisen from within. Brahmacharya is\nabout harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead\nto greater personal understanding- not withholding semen. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">CONTINUED TO 3--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Capt. The self control as meant by\nBrahmacharya brings a healthy relationship into your life and, being so\nchanneled, gives great strength and energy, as Patanjali has explained.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">If complete celibacy\narises then it is as a natural result of the focus and practices engaged in\nover the years of rigorous penance and yoga practice. Transmutation of\nsex-desire is a very potent, efficacious and satisfactory way to realise\neternal Bliss. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The technical meaning\nof Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over\nthe senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA&nbsp; alone. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I repeat again , forget\nthe bull given by fake TATTUS who cant get it up / homosexual gurus \u2013 The word\nbrahmacharya literally means a lifestyle adopted to seek and understand Brahman\n\u2013 the Ultimate Reality. It means \"devoting oneself to Brahman\".<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is the\nvirtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married. It represents a\nvirtuous lifestyle that also includes simple living, meditation and other\nbehaviors. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharyam means an\noverall lifestyle conducive to the pursuit of sacred knowledge and spiritual\nliberation. Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes\ncleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary\nrestraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual\nbehavior.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">QUOTE : Now what people\ncall yajna (sacrifice) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of\nBrahmacharya does the knower attain that world (of Brahman). And what people\ncall Ishta (worship) is really Brahmacharya, for only worshipping by means of\nBrahmacarya does one attain the Atman (the liberated Self). <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Now, what people call\nthe Sattrayana (sacrificial session) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means\nof Brahmacharya does one obtain one's salvation from Sat (Being). And what\npeople call the Mauna (vow of silence) is really Brahmacharya for only through\nBrahmacharya does one understand the Atman and then meditate. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Now, what people call a\nAnasakayana (vow of fasting) is really Brahmacharya, for this Atman never\nperishes which one attains by means of Brahmacharya.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">And what people call the\nAranyayana (life of a hermit) is really Brahmacharya, for the world of Brahman\nbelongs to those who by means of Brahmacharya attain the seas Ara and Nya in\nthe world of Brahman. For them there is freedom in all the worlds.\u201d \u2014\u2009<b>Chandogya\nUpanishad, VIII.5.1 - VIII.5. 5000 BC. </b>UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Vedas and\nUpanishadic SRUTI texts of Hinduism in their discussion of Brahmacharya, make\nno mention of any restraint on sexual activity. Now we have the FAKE\nBrahmakumari cult peddling celibacy for women.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">IF ANYBODY CAN WRITE A\nBETTER EXLANATION, I WILL STOP WRITING .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>HINDUISM IS NOT\nCATHOLIC CHRISTIANITY WERE PRIESTS DO NOT MARRY.&nbsp; &nbsp;IN HINDUISM A PRIEST MUST\nMARRY AND HAVE CHILDREN .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Patanjali Maharshi, the\nexponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues should be\npractised by all men. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya\n(truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya\n(non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or\nself-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external\npurity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of\nscriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the\nfruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious\nobservance.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The most foul thing\ndone was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice Brahmacharya by\nsexual continence. Gandhi used this lame lie , to discard his wife from his\nbedroom and take in a homosexual JEW with an enema kit .Later this German Jew\nwas discarded to take in teenaged naked girls who would sleep with him under the\nsame blanket.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>AFTER ALL BRAHMACHARIS\nARE SUPPOSED TO RETAIN THEIR FUCKIN\u2019 SEMEN AND BECOME HOLY RIGHT?</b></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THE WHOLE WORLD KNEW\nTHAT GANDHI WAS SLEEPING WITH TEENAGED GIRLS NAKED UNDER THE BLANKET AND GIVING\nENEMAS TO EACH OTHER \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">-&nbsp; AND GANDHI WIFE KASTURBA WAS ARMTWISTED AND\nBEATEN BLACK AND&nbsp; BLUE , TO EMPTY THE\nCHAMBER POT FULL OF ENEMA OUSTED LIQUID SHIT IN THE MORNING .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">BUT GANDHI IS A\nBRAHMACHARI, RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">HOW CAN GANDHI BE A BAD\nMAN ?<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">AKIN TO HOW CAN THERE BE SHIT LYING ON OXFORD STREET ?</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">YEAH, HE TOOK VOWS OF\nBRAHMACHARYA IN FRONT OF ROTHSCHILDs JOURNALISTS \u2013 YEAH , HE SURELY DID.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">YOU SEE,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THERE IS DIRECT OBJECTIVE EVIDENCE OF\nGANDHI BEING A BRAHMACHARI WHO RETAINED HIS SEMEN AND DERIVED DIVINE FUCKIN'\nOJAS OUT OF IT, RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\"One who conserves\nhis vital fluid acquires unfailing power,\" -Gandhi <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">BALLS !</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/books/features/thrill-of-the-chaste-the-truth-about-gandhis-sex-life-1937411.html\">http://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/books/features/thrill-of-the-chaste-the-truth-about-gandhis-sex-life-1937411.html</a>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/ghandi-slept-grandniece-historian-tells-uk-government-1460499\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/ghandi-slept-grandniece-historian-tells-uk-government-1460499</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">BELOW IN BLUE FONT IS\nNOT PART OF SANATANA DHARMA -- <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I AM PUTTING IT SO THAT\nHINDUS KNOW HOW THIS GREAT NATION WAS WOUNDED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs BRAHMACHARI\nAGENTS <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">On 1st Jan 1947,\nGandhi\u2019s secretary RP Parashuram resigned because of Gandhi\u2019s immoral sex habits\n\u2013 here is a part of his 16 page letter<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.dialogueindia.in/magazine/%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%A3/gandhi-used-his-position-to-sexually-exploit-young-women.-the-way-we-react-to-this-matters-even-today-5009\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.dialogueindia.in/magazine/%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%A3/gandhi-used-his-position-to-sexually-exploit-young-women.-the-way-we-react-to-this-matters-even-today-5009</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">1 January, 1947<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Srirampur<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Revered Bapu,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I write these lines in\nsorrow and pain\u2026You know how shy and unforward I have been these two years. You\nmust imagine to what depths I must have been agitated then to overcome my\nshyness and become bold and that too with a man who is considered by many to be\nthe greatest man living\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">You must also ponder\nover the fact as to what it is that has made me bold and say things so boldly.\nIt is because I feel I am so clearly in the right and you so clearly in the\nwrong. It is the cause that gives me the courage.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">It is not that I did\nnot know these before. I knew and kept quiet. I thought \u201cWhy should I bring\nthese to him?\u201d There are men like Kanu [Gandhi], Kishorilal-bhai [Mashruwala],\netc., experienced men and men knowing you fully. And then I had not the courage.\nI have come over my shyness with you\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">When first I came to\nthe ashram I came with high respect for the ashram and its inmates and its way\nof life. All that was knocked off in 24 hours\u2026After coming here I must confess\nto having lost a portion of the respect I had for you\u2026.You are the Father of\nour Nation\u2026You have taken us so far along the path of freedom and\nindependence\u2026You must see the hand of God\u2026in the fact that I have overcome my\nshyness.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I object to your\nsleeping in the same bed with members of the opposite sex. In February 1945 or\nso I was given the draft of a statement to type. I was shocked by the\ncontents\u2026I must tell you that even before I know of this. One day Amin-bhai\ncame and told me that he was shocked to see Manu [Manu Gandhi \u2014 Gandhi\u2019s own grand\nniece] getting into your bed.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">In those days I was\nmore shy than I am now. My only friend in the ashram was Amin. Even then I came\nto know of the discussions about this affair because the ashram people are so\ncareless and can\u2019t keep their mouth shut. Everybody objected to your doing\nthis\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Apart from the question\nof any affect on you what about the effect on girls?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">There is something of\nother wrong with them [the women who sleep naked with Gandhi]. [The] Punjabi\ngirl who lived opposite my room in Matunga\u2026She used to weep unrestrainedly and\nthat not caring whether others saw her or not. She laughed also\nunrestrainedly\u2026And then here is Dr. Sushila-behn [The 24-year-old in-house\nphysician at the ashram who Gandhi also used for his \u2018experiments\u2019]. How many are\nthe days when she has not wept? She is a doctor and yet she is always a\npatient, always is ill. Who has heard of a doctor who cries out at night?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Even then the whole\nthing is considered wrong by the world. I do not like it. Nirmal babu [Bose]\ndoes not. Sucheta-behn [Kriplani] did not like it and said \u201cHowever great he\nmay be, he cannot do such things. What is this?\u201d You must admit that there is\nsomething in our objection. You cannot waive it aside.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">As for blood relations\n[This is reference to Manu Gandhi]. The world is sceptic even there. There have\nbeen cases of immorality between father and daughter, brother and sister\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I object to your having\nmassage done by girls. When I was studying in college I read a report saying\nyou were being massaged by Dr. Sushila-behn\u2026And now I find you do get yourself\nmassaged by girls.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Those people who know\nthat you are naked during massage time say that you could at least put a cover\nover it [his genitals]\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The same objection I\nhold against girls coming to the bathroom when you go there. Ramachandran saw\nyou like that and said you had fallen a little from his estimation. However\ngreat you may be, you cannot do these things.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Your placing your hands\non shoulders of girls. You had written once that you gave up this practice because\nothers intimated you with evil intention. I have not come across any other\nwriting saying you could resume it. So it was strange to me why you resumed\nit\u2026During the two years I have been with you, about 50 letters or so objecting\nto this practice from admirers and calumniators came. None of them got any\nreply\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Your being seen naked\n[during his bath and massage] jars on the mind of strangers, admirers though\nthey might be. Ramachandran did not like it. He said it was the limit\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Ever since the 17th\nDecember [1946] when in the small hours of the morning you made those dreadful\nsounds, dreadful because it came from you man of such eminence, even otherwise\nunbecoming for any wise or old man, my head has not been at peace. I have heard\nof another such instance from Mr. Ramachandran of the API [Associated Press of\nIndia] when you told Sushila-behn to leave you. I have seen such another\ninstance at Delhi\u2026But this event shook me to my depths. I said to myself that\nGod and the nation would not forgive me if I kept quiet\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">You commit Himalyan\nblunders. But you refuse to see these things and when told, you are irritated\u2026I\nsay you are conceited and constitute yourself to be the repository of all the\nwisdom in the world\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">And now to my charges.\nUnless [my demands] are fulfilled I depart\u2026I beg to differ and go away\u2026Your\nactions to which I object:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">1. Your sleeping with\nany member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">2. Being massaged by\nany member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">3. Allowing yourself to\nbe seen naked by any member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">4. Allowing yourself to\nbe seen naked by strangers and even by people who are of your party who are not\nso intimate.</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5. Placing your hands\non the shoulders of girls when walking.</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">REGARDING\n\"DREADFUL SOUNDS\" MADE BY GANDHI IN THE EARLY HOURS OF THE MORNING -\nI HAVE SPOKEN TO A MAN WHO HAS HEARD IT&nbsp;\nSEVERAL TIMES ( MY SHIP&nbsp; IN\nCAPETOWN IN 1977 WHEN I WAS A SECOND OFFICER -- I VISITED THIS MANs HOME&nbsp; ).&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is\nSanskrit and Malayalam does NOT mean sexual abstinence.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma does\nNOT allow a married man in grihasta ashrama to engage in sexual abstinence<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It is a LIE that\nAyurveda says that preserving semen leads to improvement in immunity.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Swamiy Vivekananda gave\nBULL that he was&nbsp; able to memorize\nwhatever he used to glance, in a book. By reading a few lines of a paragraph,\nhe used to get the meaning of the rest of the paragraph. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">He used to say that if\none practices absolute abstinence for a period of 12 years, continuous, a\nspecial Nadi (nerve power) called Medha Nadi (Medha / intelligence) develops in\none\u2019s brain, which leads to tremendous memory and concentration. QUOTE :\neficiency of Ojas in human body leads to unhealthy and abnormal life and many\ndiseases such as Vibheti (i.e. Fear complex), Durbala Abhikshanam (Symptoms of\n(physical and mental) weakness), Durmana (abnormal mental functionalities),\nAbhighatat (trauma), Kopat (anger), Shokat (grief)( etc. :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THIS IS NONSENSE !<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">RATHER IT IS THE OTHER\nWAY AROUND<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WE ALL KNOW THE MIND\nBOGGLING SADISM OF THE SEXUALLY REPRESSED CATHOLIC CLERGY SINCE AGES.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Here is the BULLSHIT Swami\nVivekananda wrote \u2013</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">QUOTE: \u201cThe\n\"Ojas\" is that which makes the difference between man and man. The\nman who has much Ojas is the leader of men. It gives a tremendous power of\nattraction. Ojas is manufactured from the nerve-currents. It has this\npeculiarity: it is most easily made from that force which manifests itself in\nthe sexual powers. If the powers of the sexual centres are not frittered away\nand their energies wasted (action is only thought in a grosser state), they can\nbe manufactured into Ojas.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The two great nerve currents of the body start from\nthe brain, go down on each side of the spinal cord, but they cross in the shape\nof the figure 8 at the back of the head. Thus the left side of the body is\ngoverned by the right side of the head. At the lowest point of the circuit is\nthe sexual centre, the Sacral Plexus. The energy conveyed by these two currents\nof nerves comes down, and a large amount is continually being stored in the\nSacral Plexus. The last bone in the spine is over the Sacral Plexus and is\ndescribed in symbolic language as a triangle; and as the energy is stored up\nbeside it, this energy is symbolised by a serpent.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Consciousness and\nsubconsciousness work through these two nerve-currents. But superconsciousness\ntakes off the nerve-current when it reaches the lower end of the circuit, and\ninstead of allowing it to go up and complete the circuit, stops and forces it\nup the spinal cord as Ojas from the Sacral Plexus. The spinal cord is naturally\nclosed, but it can be opened to form a passage for this Ojas. As the current\ntravels from one centre of the spinal cord to another, you can travel from one\nplane of existence to another. This is why the human being is greater than\nothers, because all planes, all experiences, are possible to the spirit in the\nhuman body. We do not need another; for man can, if he likes, finish in his\nbody his probation and can after that become pure spirit. When the Ojas has\ngone from centre to centre and reaches the Pineal Gland (a part of the brain to\nwhich science can assign no function), man then becomes neither mind nor body,\nhe is free from all bondage.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The great danger of\npsychic powers is that man stumbles, as it were, into them, and knows not how\nto use them rightly. He is without training and without knowledge of what has\nhappened to him. The danger is that in using these psychic powers, the sexual\nfeelings are abnormally roused as these powers are in fact manufactured out of\nthe sexual centre. The best and safest way is to avoid psychic manifestations,\nfor they play the most horrible pranks on their ignorant and untrained owners.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">To go back to symbols.\nBecause this movement of the Ojas up the spinal cord feels like a spiral one,\nit is called the \"snake\". The snake, therefore, or the serpent, rests\non the bone or triangle. When it is roused, it travels up the spinal cord; and\nas it goes from centre to centre, a new natural world is opened inside us\u2014the\nKundalini is roused.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Swami Vivekananda told\n(From Complete Works, Volume I, Raja Yoga)\u2014[Source]<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The \"Ojas\" is\nthat which makes the difference between man and man. The man who has much Ojas\nis the leader of men. It gives a tremendous power of attraction. \u2014Swami\nVivekananda<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\u201cThe Yogi alone has the\nSushumna open. When this Sushumna current opens, and begins to rise, we get\nbeyond the sense, our minds become supersensuous, superconscious \u2014 we get\nbeyond even the intellect, where reasoning cannot reach. To open that Sushumna\nis the prime object of the Yogi. According to him, along this Sushumna are\nranged these centres, or, in more figurative language, these lotuses, as they\nare called. The lowest one is at the lower end of the spinal cord, and is\ncalled Mul\u00e2dh\u00e2ra, the next higher is called Sv\u00e2dhishth\u00e2na, the third Manipura,\nthe fourth An\u00e2hata, the fifth Vishuddha, the sixth \u00c2jn\u00e2 and the last, which is\nin the brain, is the Sahasr\u00e2ra, or \"the thousand-petalled\". Of these\nwe have to take cognition just now of two centres only, the lowest, the\nMuladhara, and the highest, the Sahasrara.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">All energy has to be taken up from\nits seat in the Muladhara and brought to the Sahasrara. The Yogis claim that of\nall the energies that are in the human body the highest is what they call\n\"Ojas\". Now this Ojas is stored up in the brain, and the more Ojas is\nin a man's head, the more powerful he is, the more intellectual, the more\nspiritually strong. One man may speak beautiful language and beautiful\nthoughts, but they, do not impress people; another man speaks neither beautiful\nlanguage nor beautiful thoughts, yet his words charm. Every movement of his is\npowerful. That is the power of Ojas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Now in every man there\nis more or less of this Ojas stored up. All the forces that are working in the\nbody in their highest become Ojas. You must remember that it is only a question\nof transformation. The same force which is working outside as electricity or\nmagnetism will become changed into inner force; the same forces that are\nworking as muscular energy will be changed into Ojas. The Yogis say that that\npart of the human energy which is expressed as sex energy, in sexual thought,\nwhen checked and controlled, easily becomes changed into Ojas, and as the\nMuladhara guides these, the Yogi pays particular attention to that centre. He\ntries to take up all his sexual energy and convert it into Ojas.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It is only the\nchaste man or woman who can make the Ojas rise and store it in the brain; that\nis why chastity has always been considered the highest virtue. A man feels that\nif he is unchaste, spirituality goes away, he loses mental vigour and moral\nstamina. That is why in all the religious orders in the world which have\nproduced spiritual giants you will always find absolute chastity insisted upon.\nThat is why the monks came into existence, giving up marriage. There must be\nperfect chastity in thought, word, and deed; without it the practice of\nRaja-Yoga is dangerous, and may lead to insanity. If people practice Raja-Yoga\nand at the same time lead an impure life, how can they expect to become Yogis?\u201d\nUNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ABOVE IS BULLSHIT OF\nTHE FIRST ORDER.&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; astringent, and pungent. Your tongue buds\nlead you to what is to be eaten. When the gall bladder is surgically removed\nthe patient knows what it means&nbsp; to have\nimbalanced pitta .&nbsp; Kapha, Vata and Pitta\nare interconnected. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When bile is imbalanced\nthe patient will fart excessively or pass out mucous in stools ( with wrong\ndiet)<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">People with imbalanced\nPitta ( bile ) are told to keep away from fatty foods, too much of spice\netc&nbsp; and this burns out Ojas.. It is NOT\nabout impotence or lack of hard on.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Do NOT drink the milk\nof HUMPLESS western jersey cow , excessive processed white sugar etc if you\nwant Ojas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Tejas is high cell voltage\n.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/healing-by-increasing-cell-voltage-capt.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/healing-by-increasing-cell-voltage-capt.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Tejas is responsible\nfor inner radiance, glow , luster in one\u2019s eyes, clarity, fearlessness,\ncourage, intelligence etc.&nbsp;&nbsp; A man\nsuffering for jaundice with yellow skin and eyes does NOT have any Tejas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Balanced tejas is\nneeded for metabolism.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">If tejas in a person is\ntoo high it burns out the ojas (just as fire evaporates water).&nbsp; The myelin sheaths which are composed of ojas\nare burned by excessive high tejas<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Tejas gets diminished\nby:--</span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Excessive negative\nthinking and talking<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Psychological\n/emotional imbalances<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">For a healthy balance\nof tejas one should:--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Enforce positive\nthinking. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Meditate<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Chant mantras<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Practice awareness in\nthought, words and action<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prana is about vitality\nand energy . People with depleted prana fall sick fast and they die early.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/cellular-memory-complete-healing-capt.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/cellular-memory-complete-healing-capt.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prana is the vital life\nforce. When prana is depleted, your heart chakra slows down and you die. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Today modern doctors\ncan watch ECG graphs on computer screens .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Ancient Maharishis could watch the\nheart chakra . Lesser sages just dowse with a crystal.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prana is responsible\nfor vitality and energy and the processes of respiration, circulation,\ndigestion, excretion etc.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prana lives in the\nheart along with past desires and egoism. The different modifications of this\nprana, results in ten principle types of pranas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We imbibe prana when we\nbreathe.&nbsp; Hence, the reserves of prana\ncan be increased by performing pranayama which leads to good health of mind and\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">According to the Hatha\nYoga Pradipika The body of a person whose energy channels or nadis are pure\nwill be lean and glowing. Purification of nadis leads to good health.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Bhramari helps\nstrengthen prana and is good for thyroid, thymus and the parathyroid glands.\nBhramari means bee, so one makes the sound of a humming bee when performing\nthis pranayama. One should close their ears with their thumbs, inhale and upon\nexhalation, simultaneously sound MMMMM&nbsp;\nwith the mouth closed to generate Nitric oxide magic molecule..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Ojas ,tejas and prana\nare interrelated.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ojas has the capacity\nto turn into tejas , which has the capacity to turn into prana ( scalar\nenergy).</span></b></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">ALL THOSE WHO WANT TO\nPRAY TO SAFFRON ROBED TATTU GURUS WHO CANT GET IT UP,&nbsp; OR ARE GAY , OR HOLD ON TO THE SEMEN (AND\nHOLD FARTS TOO FOR GOOD MEASURE, )&nbsp; RAISE\nYOUR HANDS.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WHAAAA ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">NO HANDS ?</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I REST MY CASE ON THE\nOJAS BULLSHIT !<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_17M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_3.html?showComment=1517717306719#c7157666977628016584\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 4, 2018 at 9:38 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_17MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nYESTERDAY I SAW A MALAYALAM MOVIE MADE BY A MUSLIM DIRECTOR-<br />\n<br />\nIN WHICH HE WAS MAKING A GREAT VIRTUE OF \"WHIRLING DERVISHES\" --- THESE SUFI DANCERS WITH LONG HATS-- ROTATING<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS SO GREAT ABOUT THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA DOES NOT ALLOW ROTATING DANCING !<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=luDklth_mbM</span><br />\n<br />\nRotary vestibular input (spinning) is NOT good for the human brain.<br />\n<br />\nBecoming dizzy is the way the body tells you to be careful<br />\n<br />\nThe vestibular system senses motion- there are three semicircular canals for sensing \u00admotion, right angles to one another. They contain fluid called endolymph and hair-like sensory nerve cells.<br />\n<br />\nAs your head moves in a given direction, the endolymph lags behind because it resists a change in motion (the principle of inertia). The lagging endolymph stimulates hair cells to send nerve signals to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you spin, the endolymph slowly moves in the direction you are spinning. The movement of the endolymph signals the brain that the head is spinning.<br />\n<br />\nThe brain quickly adapts to the signal because the endolymph begins to move at the same rate that you are spinning and no longer stimulates the hair cells.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, when you stop spinning, the endolymph continues to move and stimulate hair cells in the opposite direction. These hair cells send signals to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nThe brain determines that the head is still spinning, even though you have stopped. This is where the dizzy feeling comes from. Eventually, the endolymph stops moving, no signals are sent to the brain, your brain determines that your motion has stopped, and you no longer feel dizzy.<br />\n<br />\nMAKING A DIVINE VIRTUE OUT OF THIS IS WORSE THAT SRI SRI RAVISKANKAR MAKING A VIRTUE OUT OF \"MARTIINI EFFECT \" OF STUPID SUDARSHAN KRIYA SOHUM HYPERVENTILATION<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Mundaka Upanishad-- Verse\n3.1.9\u20145000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e\u1e63o'\u1e47ur\u0101tm\u0101 cetas\u0101\nveditavyo yasminpr\u0101\u1e47a\u1e25 pa\u00f1cadh\u0101 sa\u1e43vive\u015ba | <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pr\u0101\u1e47ai\u015bcitta\u1e43 sarvamota\u1e43\npraj\u0101n\u0101\u1e43 yasminvi\u015buddhe vibhavatye\u1e63a \u0101tm\u0101 || 9 ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. This subtle Atman\nshould be known by the mind as being in the body, whose prana entered in five\ndifferent forms; the mind in all creatures is pervaded by these pranas. When it\nis purified, then the Atman shines out of itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHY DOES THE WHITE MAN\nDATE OUR VEDAS AND UPANISHADS LATER THAN 5000 BC?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BECAUSE AS PER THE COOKED\nUP BIBLE \u2014 THE BIG FUCKIN' BANG HAPPENED AT 9 AM ON 23 RD OCT, &nbsp;4004 BC .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS WAS DETERMINED AT\nTHE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD, THE DAY JESUS CHRIST WAS COOKED UP.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HOW CAN VEDAS EXIST\nBEFORE 4004 BC ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AISA KOISA \u2013 NAY\u2014 KAISA\nREEY?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>PRAY ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>PRITHEE?</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WELL VEDAS WENT ON ORAL\nROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fcPjvp4La8A/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/fcPjvp4La8A?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Below: When you do pranayama , cross your feet in meditative pose.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">This mobius coil arrangement adds value</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/t7WFq17NxWA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/t7WFq17NxWA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is a form of\nvital energy. Prana pervades each and every corner of the body, and it\nnourishes, guides and controls the functioning of the cell and systems. When\nthese marma (junctions) are affected or ruptured, the organs linked with prana\nchannels become starved with lack of prana and some organ becomes diseased,\ncrippled or paralysed or depending upon the quantum is of prana being lost, it\nmay lead to slow or sudden death.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain can be split\ninto two parts- the frontal brain and the posterior brain. The posterior brain\nis the instinctive brain which we have inherited through animal incarnations.\nThe frontal brain is the seat of total consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
