font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>This bastard Zakir Naik does NOT know that Shiva, Parvati and Ganesha are cosmic allegories .</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TLnehHUBSdI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TLnehHUBSdI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eternal and\nindestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole\nMacrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only\nis Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shakti is manifested by\nShiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of\ncreation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science repeats\nfrom our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does\nconsciousness and energy . In the highest planes they are interchangeable,\nwhich is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and\nthe external reality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">In the higher\nmetaphysical realms and subtle planes of our consciousness the physical laws of\nour universe lose their validity.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She has the form of a\nserpent, having three coils and a half. As long as she is asleep in the body,\n(finer body), the jiva is a mere animal, and true wisdom does not arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All above is in a\nnutshell. You can write a 500 page book on this subject.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas say that\nmortals eat food with apana, while the gods eat food with prana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular alternate\nnostril breathing is the most important method for keeping our pranas or\nenergies in balance.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga emphasizes\npurification of both body and mind as a means to Self-realization, and for this\nreason it emphasizes a vegetarian diet rich in prana\u2014that is, foods full of the\nlife-force\u2014and a mind rooted in ethical values such as truthfulness and\nnonviolence, and in spiritual disciplines.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This can help women in excessive\nbleeding and irregular menstrual cycle.The iron content of the seed helps to\nmaintain the haemoglobin count.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">###################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MY WIFEs RECIPE:--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Soak overnight required\nquantity of gram in water. Next day in pressure cooker , cook the gram along\nwith salt , little chillie powder , a teaspoon of coriander&nbsp;powder. Once the\nwhistle blows reduce heat and cook on low heat approx 10 - 12 mins. Switch of\nflame . After draining excess water if any add GRATED coconut and curry leaves\nand stir over flame. Season with jeera and red chillie.</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana means the\noriginal life force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is an energy\nresponsible for the body's life, heat and maintenance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LACK OF PRANA MAKES YOU\nLOSE REM SLEEP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRANA EXITS FIRST &nbsp;( LOSS OF AURA ) AND THEN THE SOUL.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">WHEN PRANA EBBS\nPSYCHICS WHO CAN SEE HUMAN AURA KNOWS.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN PRANA EBBS FROM A\nHUMAN AT A DISTANCE &nbsp;HALF WAY ACROSS THE\nGLOBE, &nbsp;MY WIFE WHO DOES DISTANT REIKI\nKNOWS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human nose is very\nsignificant, for at the root of the nasal cavity is a uniquely designed\nprana-detecting device.&nbsp; This is a thin,\nperforated bone, known in medical terminology as the cribriform plate of the\nethmoid bone. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cribriform plate of\nthe ethmoid bone is received into the ethmoidal notch of the frontal bone and\nroofs in the nasal cavities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within these\nperforations the minute filaments of the olfactory nerve reside. They relay\ninformation to the brain concerning the constituents of the air. When\nelectrically charged ions contact these filaments, the brain and main nervous\nsystem automatically become energized. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This charging travels\nto the limbic system of the brain, in which perception is transformed into\nexperience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing directly\naffects our emotional responses to life, and conversely the arousal of\ndifferent emotions is reflected in the breath.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one breathes through\nthe mouth, the entire air mass and prana travel straight down the trachea\nwithout stimulating the brain and nervous system.&nbsp; Therefore the activation of the entire\nnervous system is dependent on nasal breathing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the MD of a\nshipping company employed me with one request \u2013 take my nephew as your Chief\nOfficer and make a sailor- man out of him.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWithin 24 hours of contact with this boy&nbsp;\nI send the MD an email&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201c It\nwill be a waste of my time.&nbsp; He breathes\nin and out through his mouth.&nbsp; First he\nhas to do surgery and correct this \u201c</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solely due to prana,\nthe whole universe exists and without its presence no creature can live.&nbsp;&nbsp; Although prana exists in the air and in all\nforms of matter, it is neither of the two.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nor is prana the\nbreath, but it is contained within the breath, being a part of the swara.&nbsp; Prana maintains all organic life. Just as a\nbattery stores electrical energy, so it is essential for every organism to\nstore prana in order to enable activity and mobility.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By practising swara\nyoga, the store of prana can be increased, thereby activating the latent areas\nof the brain.&nbsp; Swara yoga directly\ncontrols the input and output of prana, enabling us to regulate our whole\nphysiological system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Yoga says that,\nthe upper part of the body corresponds to the positive, northern pole and the\nlower part to the negative, southern pole. The right side and back portions are\nalso positive poles and the left and frontal portions are negative poles...</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These positive and\nnegative charges of energy are the basis of swara yoga. This is quantum physics</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient rishis\ncalled the negative flow ida and the positive flow pingala.&nbsp; The maharishis&nbsp; of yore knew the techniques to channelize\nbio-energy or prana throughout the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as electrical\npower is at our disposal by connecting a switch to the main power line, so the\nrishis knew how to connect the switches and circuits of energy in the\nbody.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They understood that\nthe flow of energy, whether internal or external, is constantly being\ncirculated from the more highly charged to the lesser charged centres in order\nto create a balance between the positive and negative poles.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara yoga teaches us\nto manipulate the flow of breath through the nostrils, thereby controlling the\nenergy switches in our own body which regulate the flow of positive and\nnegative currents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the human\nbody are secret Marma points that are used for healing. Marma translates from\nSanskrit as \u201csecret, hidden, or mystical\u201d.&nbsp;\nThese sacred points are like switches, when gently stimulated, bring\ndivine energy directly into our bodies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This divine energy, or Prana, is the\nlife force which sustains us, which keeps us alive. Prana must constantly be\nflowing through our Nadis, or energy channels/meridians. When this prana\nbecomes stuck due to poor breathing,&nbsp;\ntoxins, emotional stress, poor diet, lack of sleep, age, etc, our health\nsuffers and we become ill.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marma points are located along these Nadis, so that\nwhen they are activated, they clear any stagnation of prana, and immediately\nbring healing to that organ or that part of the body. Marmas literally are\ncontrol points, where prana can enter and be directed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physically, marma point\nlocations are where tendons, bones, muscles, joints, veins, nerves, and other\ntissues meet anatomically. Energetically, marmas are extremely subtle points\nwhere the physical and divine energetic realms intersect in the human body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\u2019re also identified\nas neurolymphatic points, stimulating the removal of lymph and enhancing the\nefficiency of the body\u2019s organs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are where vata,\npitta and kapha doshas come together. There are 108 marma points in Kalari and\nAyurveda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similar healing\nmodalities such as acupuncture, acupressure, reflexology, and polarity therapy\nhave their origins in the ancient science of Ayurveda/ kalari. The famous\nAyurvedic surgeonr, Sushruta, mapped out the location of these vital points\n6200 years ago in his texts on surgery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He emphasized the\nextreme sensitivity of these points that hold our prana, and wrote in Susruta\nSamhita that the marmas should never be cut during surgery. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowledge of marma\npoints was used by the Kalari, Indian martial art masters. They studied which\nmarma points could inflict pain or even death to their opponents. On the other\nhand, they also knew which marmas, when pressed correctly, could quickly heal\ntheir own injuries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowledge of Marma\nallows the practitioner to influence the flow of prana through both the gross\nand subtle bodies for the purposes of restoring health and peace of mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marma therapy is the\noriginal point system of healing in the body. As it spread out of India, it\ninfluenced the development of Chinese acupuncture and Kung fu. Its origins are\nin Kerala &nbsp;martial arts tradition known\nas Kalaripayattu. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chinese Kung Fu was\ntaught by a huge hairy chested Kalari expert from Kerala name Bodhi Dharma (\nBUDDI DHARMAN ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/06/tea-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/06/tea-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A kalari warrior was\ninvincible as he used a 3 metre long flexible sword named URUMI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/urumi-invincible-kalari-sword-wootz.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/urumi-invincible-kalari-sword-wootz.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody could conquer\nthe most beautiful, &nbsp;fertile , richest, fountainhead\nof every vestige of ancient knowledge, renown land of Kerala , which ruled the\nwhole planet before 7000 BC \u2013till Rothschild gave long range rockets to Jew\nTipu Sultan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Marma Kalari master,\ncalled Gurikkal Aasan would also tend to the wounded before he let him go home\nafter a practice session.. The Gurikkal had the knowledge both of how to cause\ninjury as well as how to use the knowledge and awareness of prana for\nhealing.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cAasan\u201d was a rare prana grandmaster , who could both kill and heal a person with a touch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts\u2026\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn earlier versions of the agreement, the word SHALL in the first sentence had been SHOULD.<br />\n<br />\nThe change from should to shall introduced new but HUMONGOUS legal and financial requirements.<br />\n<br />\nParis climate deal. Article 4.4 stated: \"Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts\u2026\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, the goal of developing countries is to continue improving their efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.<br />\n<br />\nThe word should does not express a legal requirement. But shall, in the case of the climate agreement, does.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 4.4 of the Paris climate deal stated that developed countries \u201cshall continue taking the lead by undertaking economy-wide absolute emission reduction targets.\u201d<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">JOHN KERRY HELD UP THE AGREEMENT TILL THE CHANGE WAS DONE \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHALL</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" TO \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SHOULD</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\nFrench leaders told John Kerry that someone must have made a typing mistake.<br />\n<br />\nHours later, delegates from 195 countries were ARM TWISTED into signing the climate deal.<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST POTENT SENTENCES I HAVE WRITTEN IN MY BLOG TILL TODAY</span><br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF 0F--<br />\nPRAKASH JAVEDEKAR<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nCOMMERCE MINISTER<br />\nENVIRNMONENT MINISTRY<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nVENKAIH NAIDU<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL.<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\n<br />\nDO IT NOW !</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5439853829243270536\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; THEY ARE LIKE OIL AND WATER..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VERY SOON JEW DARLING MODI WILL SELL BHARATMATA IN THE WHOREHOUSE OF HEALTH INSURANCE KOSHER COMPANIES.. MARK MY WORDS...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EUTHANASIA HAS TO BE DECIDED BY THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS... NOT SOME COLLEGIUM JUDGES ...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Laws against euthanasia and assisted suicide are in place to prevent abuse and to protect people from unscrupulous doctors and others ( GRAB PROPERTY )...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Legalizing euthanasia would send a clear message: it is better to be dead than sick or disabled...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The patient is depressed and believes that his situation is worse than it really is.( OR MADE TO FEEL BY SELFISH RELATIVES )...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Faced with a doctor who both heals and kills, the patient lives with an uncertainty that adds to vulnerability...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Patients who are ill or dependent often feel worthless and a burden to their family and loved ones. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">With legalized assisted suicide, the rate of non-assisted suicide WILL increase...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Every patient has the right to refuse treatment or to request that ongoing treatment be stopped...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Life in society is based on relationships of mutual trust among all citizens. Everyone must be sure that nobody will kill him... . We are already witnessing worrisome abuse in jurisdictions where euthanasia or assisted suicide is legal...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW KOSHER HEALTH INSURANCE TO DECIDE WHO HAS THE RIGHT TO LIVE...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RIGHT TO LIVE ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO DIE ?.. TEE HEEEEEEE !..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE ?..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RIGHT TO HEAL ALSO INCLUDES RIGHT TO KILL ?..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO WONDER THE LAWYER TURNED JUDGES WERE AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE RIGHT TO LIFE DOES NOT INCLUDE A RIGHT TO DIE \u2013THIS IS UNIVERSAL\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The right to life does not create a right to choose death rather than life\u2026 It meant there was no right to die at the hands of a third person or with the assistance of a public authority\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The right to life is a moral principle based on the belief that a human being has the right to live and, in particular, should not be killed by ANOTHER human being. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">International law only allows law enforcement officers to deliberately take life (\"shooting to kill\") where absolutely necessary to defend themselves and others against an imminent threat to life. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The entitlement of a person to make the decision to end their own life through euthanasia is RIGHT TO CHOOSE\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Passive euthanasia is a condition where there is withdrawal of medical treatment with the deliberate intention to hasten the death of a terminally-ill patient\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; THE WOMEN DO IT AS THEIR BOUNDEN DUTY..<br /><br />IN PRIVATE HOSPITALS THE NURSE IS EXPECTED TO GIVE A HAND JOB ( MINIMUM ) TO MALE PATIENTS, IF HE WANTS IT .. THEY WERE PRAYING ?<br />\n<br />\nAN EXAMPLE IS TUTICORIN STERLITE PROTESTS --I HAD WARNED IN WRITING SAME DAY ITSELF..<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, the Communist Party of India (Marxist\u2013Leninist) People\u2019s War, usually called People\u2019s War Group, merged with the Maoist Communist Centre of India and formed the Communist Party of India (Maoist), pledging to the ideology of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism..The party became a member of the Coordination Committee of Maoist Parties and Organisations of South Asia.<br />\n<br />\nKobad Ghandy, who was arrested in September 2009 in New Delhi, played a major role in the preparation of this urban perspective plan\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNAXALS / MAOISTS ARE PRIMED AND READY FOR A BLOODY FOREIGN FUNDED AND CONTROLLED REVOLUTION BY INVOLVING DALITS .. He was the editor of the central organ of CPI (M), People's Democracy magazine.....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Chandra Rajeshwara Rao (1914\u20131994) was THE top leader of the Telengana Rebellion (1946\u20131951). ..He also worked as Communist Party of India (CPI) general secretary for 28 years... and a part time journalist..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Key universities like Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), Jadavpur University (JU), Osmania University, Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) work as R&amp;D centres of urban naxalism.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Do a NARCO test on naxalite Varavara Rao all truths will spill out. He will tell you which are the human rights NGOs and commie journalists involved in Naxalism..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you this DANGEROUS BLACK MAMBA Varavara Rao has white JEW support.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COCKY Varavara Rao ( he has DEEP STATE collegium judiciary support ) said at a news conference in JU on 26 Feburary 2010, \u201cOur support is growing among students of Kolkata. Though these students don\u2019t come from tribal areas, they understand the situation.\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The urban naxalite ( they are educated --not illiterate tribals ) activists take up genuine issues \u2014 not with the aim to solve them but to create unrest and anger against the system, and make people believe in armed struggle.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES FORGET THAT OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT ANYBODY WHO POINTS A FOREIGN GUN AT BHARATMATA..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHENEVER MUNCIPALITY SANITATION WORKERS GO ON STRIKE-- YOU CAN SEE A NAXAL HAND.. WHEN GARBAGE MOUNTS THE WORLD NOTICES.. IF INDIA CANNOT CLEAN UP ITS OWN GARBAGE HOW CAN INDIA BE A MEMBER OF UNSC ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The urban movement has attracted students towards the Maoist fold in various parts of the country. ..The bait of FUTURE power is dangled in front..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ITALIAN WAITRESS encourages unrest ( MAOISTS / DALITS/ ISLAMIST SEPARATISTS JOINING HANDS ) so that she can make her half breed son the PM of India\u2026</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">WARNING: PAKISTANI ISI IS NOW INVOLVED IN THE CONSPIRACY TO KILL MODI.. ALL IT TAKES IS A LOBBED GRENADE !!</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DURING THE KARNATAKA ELECTION CAMPAIGN MODI WAS NOT PROTECTED .. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT IT MORE THAN A MONTH AGO..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE EVR PERIYAR STUDENTS UNIONS AND BR AMBEDKAR STUDENTS UNIONS ARE FUNDED BY JESUIT CHRISTIANS AND WHITE COMMIE JEWS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS AND STUDENTS HELD A JOINT PARTY WHEN 76 CRPF MEN WERE MASSACRED BY NAXALS.. WHY DID WE ALLOW THIS? . WHY WAS THERE NO RETRIBUTION.. THESE DESH DROHI JNU STUDENTS ARE NOW DEEP STATE LUTYENS BABUS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Many university campuses have been witnessing student unrest in the last few years. The common thread in all these institutes-turned-battlefields is a protest against the union government in the name of constitutional principles and democratic values. Students involved are mainly commies from SOCIAL SCIENCES group. Shut down social sciences groups in JNU/ JU/ TISS etc&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some faculty members too tried to escalate these protests through their active participation or supportive roles. These traitor foreign funded commie professors give more marks to students who agitate and vandalise\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line\u2026 Such organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces.. \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We see the same faces in all CANDLE LIGHT VIGILS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From these mass organisations, AGGRESSIVE individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party. They get foreign funds ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Has anybody ever found out who foots the travel / hotel bills of Umar Khaid , Snehla Rashid and Umar Khalid ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 3--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9050446933952586098\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456639658#c9050446933952586098\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nOne important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology.<br />\n<br />\nThe Maoist movement wants nothing short of a break-up of the Indian state. Its most insidious and dangerous arm is urban Naxalism.<br />\n<br />\nThe GURU of Fourth Generation Warfare, William Lind observes that \u201cif nation-states are going to survive, people in power must earn and keep the trust of the governed\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nThis fourth generation war is complex and long-term. It is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy\u2019s (in this case, the Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2014 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with NGOs. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where all the actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2004, the Communist Party of India (Marxist\u2013Leninist) People\u2019s War, usually called People\u2019s War Group, merged with the Maoist Communist Centre of India and formed the Communist Party of India (Maoist), pledging to the ideology of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism. The party became a member of the Coordination Committee of Maoist Parties and Organisations of South Asia.<br />\n<br />\nThis new entity drafted a blueprint for their urban movement/activities. It is believed that Kobad Ghandy, who was arrested in September 2009 in New Delhi, played a major role in the preparation of this urban perspective plan.<br />\n<br />\nThe document admits that the enemy is very strong in urban areas and therefore should never be engaged with until the conditions are favourable. And to make them favourable, it suggests the exploring and opening of opportunities, and organising people through front organisations.<br />\n<br />\nTarget the \u201cvulnerable group\u201d of minorities, women, Dalits, labourers and students through influencers who work undercover for a long time and accumulate strength. The document stresses on uniting industrial proletariats and students, and using them as vanguards who can play a direct role in revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe city becomes the money source, shelter for cadre as transit points, source of weaponry and legal protection, medical aid, media attention and intelligentsia network.<br />\n<br />\nThe stronger the movement becomes in urban areas, the more likely it is to contribute to the agrarian revolution, in terms of providing leaders, men and material to the people\u2019s war.<br />\n<br />\nThe majority of the people in Maoist-affected areas and even their supporters and cadres have little to do with Maoism at the ideological level. They are only alienated and angry people with a sense of injustice, oppression and indignity.<br />\n<br />\nMaoists cleverly exploit this sentiment to their advantage \u2014 caste conflicts in Bihar, resentment against landlords in Andhra Pradesh, discontent against forest laws in tribal areas, unemployment amongst youth, radicalism among Muslims are all given the prescription of capture of power through the gun.<br />\n<br />\nWhile local grievances need to be effectively addressed through improved governance and ruthless accountability, there is an urgent need for creating mass awareness of the ultimate designs and consequences of what the extremists stand for.<br />\n<br />\nThe forest-based rebellion survives mostly on what Maoist ideologue Varavara Rao calls the \u201cmovement in urban areas\u201d. The network is in many cities, and sympathisers occupy prominent positions.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2251280051978801314\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456775181#c2251280051978801314\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nConsider logistics support. In 2006, the police seized empty rocket shells and rocket launchers in Mahabubnagar district, Andhra Pradesh. The kingpin, \u201cTech Madhu\u201d, later surrendered to the police, which led to the detection of an elaborate network the Maoists had built.<br />\n<br />\nThe network originated in the industrial centre of Ambattur, a Chennai suburb, where rocket parts were fabricated, and stealthily transported in private commercial carriers to different parts of the country. The network is spread across five states: Tamil Nadu, Andhra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh and Odisha.<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, an invisible naxal-intelligentsia-media-academia-NGO-activist nexus works as strategic fortification with the ultimate aim of taking over the Indian state to achieve Maoist rule. The Maoists have identified Pune-Mumbai-Ahmadabad as the \u201cGolden Corridor\u201d, Delhi-Kanpur-Patna-Kolkata as the \u201cGanga Corridor\u201d. And Chennai-Coimbatore-Bengaluru as \u201cTri-junction\u201d.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Key universities like Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), Jadavpur University (JU), Osmania University, Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) would work as R&amp;D centres of urban naxalism.</span></div>\n<br />\nMaoist documents mention three kinds of urban mass organisations: secret, open and semi-open, and legal \u201cdemocratic\u201d organisations.<br />\n<br />\nThe legal organisations are the most dangerous for national security, as they try to subvert constitutional authority surreptitiously by building mass support through subtle manipulation of grievances against the state.<br />\n<br />\nThough government can ban the other two types of organisations, it is almost impossible to ban these legal organisations as civil society, human rights and other vigilante groups rush forth and create a hue and cry that the rights of the common man are being denied.<br />\n<br />\nThese organisations work closely with disgruntled groups of trade unions, student bodies, women\u2019s fronts, caste abolition organisations, nationality organisations, writers\u2019 associations, lawyers\u2019 organisations, teachers\u2019 associations, cultural bodies etc.<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are operating under the garb of human rights NGOs. These are manned by ideologues, including academicians and activists..<br />\n<br />\nThe tactics employed are extremely effective and media attention-grabbing. These range from using aggressive agitations and propaganda, provoking Dalits to take up arms, to programmes on anti-capitalist policies, to defunct/ fake controversies in history..<br />\n<br />\nThe activists take up genuine issues \u2014 not with the aim to solve them but to create unrest and anger against the system, and make people believe in armed struggle.<br />\n<br />\nAny activist working under banners with hints of revolution, like \u2018sangharsh\u2019 and \u2018kranti\u2019 must be profiled\u2026<br />\n<br />\nVaravara Rao said at a news conference in JU on 26 Feburary 2010, \u201cOur support is growing among students of Kolkata. Though these students don\u2019t come from tribal areas, they understand the situation.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMany university campuses have been witnessing student unrest in the last few years. The common thread in all these institutes-turned-battlefields is a protest against the union government in the name of constitutional principles and democratic values.<br />\n<br />\nA closer look reveals that there is no suppression of \u201cdemocratic principles\u201d by the government. However, a picture has been painted so. Some faculty members too tried to escalate these protests through their active participation or supportive roles.<br />\n<br />\nAll this left the common man wondering \u201cHow did students turn anti-India?\u201d \u201cWhat is suddenly wrong with all these institutes?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn the cities, the front \u201cmass organisations\u201d are generally manned by ideologues, who include academicians and activists, fully committed to the party line and flush with foreign funds .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_8MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_8B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6970134341533421355\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456835307#c6970134341533421355\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<br />\n<br />\nSuch organisations ostensibly pursue human rights-related issues and are adept at using the legal processes of the Indian state to undermine and emasculate enforcement action by the security forces. They also attempt to malign state institutions through propaganda and disinformation to further the cause of their \u201crevolution\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nFrom these mass organisations, individuals are selected, brainwashed for supporting and becoming members of the Maoist party.<br />\n<br />\nUrban areas are important for Maoists to get cadres who have the skill sets to perform military tasks; they are also critical for developing international networks, local intelligence, reaching medical aid to rural guerilla forces, as transit facility and for cyber warfare.<br />\n<br />\nOne more important reason for the Maoists\u2019 focus on urban areas in the last few years is the recruitment ebb they are facing in tribal areas as tribals began to understand the hollowness of Maoist ideology. Maoists are not getting recruits for their dalams (small units in their armed guerilla force). The number of surrenders has gone up manifold.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of students\u2019 and teachers\u2019 association with Maoism is as old as the movement itself. The Maoists\u2019 \u201cStrategy and Tactics of Indian Revolution\u201d document mentions the following about students\u2019 role:<br />\n<br />\nThe faces of urban naxalism are intellectuals, influencers and activists of importance. They indoctrinate the young by pretending to be concerned about social issues. However, they never make an attempt to find solutions to social problems. They only exploit the situation by organising protests and mobilising the impressionable youth.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">They COMMIE PROFESSORS encourage students to take admission in colleges and fail their examinations so that they can continue longer on the campus. ..</span></div>\n<br />\nThe students don\u2019t mind as they get a handsome salary for just rabble rousing ... They hope to become political leaders like Yechury and Daniel Raja soon.<br />\n<br />\nWanna see Daniel Raja\u2019s JNU daughter ? She hopes to be a Commie leader like her back faced father..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZTn0KTFoDs</span><br />\n<br />\nFor a student from a poor or marginalised background, a subsidised stay in a government hostel in a big city is a luxury which he laps up without questioning the ulterior motives of his mentors.<br />\n<br />\nWith the help of these students, the Maoists attract new students and organise \u201cboot study camps\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nUrban Maoists have employed multi-pronged tactics. They have infiltrated Maoist sympathisers in key public sector industries. It is not commie JNU babus anymore..<br />\n<br />\nThey have infiltrated critical departments like finance, military, police, power, IT, defence production and disrupt the activities from within by gaining control over the workers. Profile every union leader as a response..<br />\n<br />\nPassive protests and continuous grievances lead to a domino effect in an already disgruntled nation. They have infiltrates hospitals so that injured cadre can be treated in secrecy without police getting a whiff..<br />\n<br />\nUrban naxals are trained to bring a nation to its knees .<br />\n<br />\nNaxals are entrusted with the destruction of high-value targets like water/power or annihilation of individuals of importance. The identity of such members is unknown even to the local urban party structure.<br />\n<br />\nThe urban naxals have a unit for cyber warfare . The naxals are trained to use modern electronic means to infiltrate into the enemy\u2019s networks and collect vital information. These people are under the direct control of the highest party echelons. They are trained to generate cultural unrest with the help of propaganda platforms..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 6--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_9MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_9B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_10B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2974405746431847654\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_8.html?showComment=1528456867457#c2974405746431847654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2018 at 4:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 5--<br />\n<br />\nThis is covert warfare where the enemy is invisible and the battle is for the control of civil society \u2014 through coercion, controlling the hearts and minds of the people.<br />\n<br />\nFourth Generation Warfare (4GW). This war is waged by a blurring of the lines between war and politics, combatants and civilians. If they have reached this stage, we have no one but our political leaders to blame..<br />\n<br />\n4GW is decentralised, small in size and lacks hierarchy so that they cannot be stopped.<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy is to make a direct attack on the enemy's (Indian state) culture, including genocidal acts against civilians, and wage a highly sophisticated psychological and cultural warfare, especially through media manipulation and lawfare.<br />\n<br />\nAll available pressures are used \u2013 political, economic, social and military. For this purpose, legal professionals are required, media professionals are required, creative people, varied intellectuals and academicians are required, and civil society leaders are required, especially those who are connected with non-governmental organisations. It begins with low-intensity conflicts where actors attack from different platforms.<br />\n<br />\nHow did commies Kamalahassan, Prakash Raj , HardikPatel crawl out of the wood work?<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br />INDIA WILL IMPLODE FROM WITHIN SOONER THAN LATER..&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW THE BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nMODI GOVT MUST SHOW SPINE..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Urban Naxalism is India\u2019s biggest threat today.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nLet us not celebrate that we got rid of the RED CORRIDOR.<br />\n<br />\nIt can\u2019t be fought by the government alone. It has to be fought by exposing them, which is a responsibility of every citizen who wants India to succeed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRead all 8 parts of the post below\u2014<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529836889823#c5001973479494635782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1---</span></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">The&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><b>constitution</b></span><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;of JOHN DEWEY</b></span><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;( with BR Ambedkar as a front ) was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950..</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Judiciary interprets the Constitution as its final arbiter.. judiciary cant create laws.. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; LOT OF THIS MONEY WENT INTO THE FUNDS OF \" POPEs HUSH MONEY \" ( PEDOPHILE SEX OF CLERGY PAY OFFS )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</span><br />\n<br />\n95% OF THE CHILD VICTIMS PARENTS CHOSE HUSH MONEY ..<br />\n<br />\nThere has been a culture of denial and secrecy that has prevented allegations from being fully investigated.<br />\n<br />\nA 1962 Vatican document instructed bishops to observe the strictest secrecy in sexual abuse cases and to address sexual abuse, or \u201csolicitation,\u201d as an internal church matter, not as an offense that should be reported to local authorities.<br />\n<br />\nDespite establishing a commission to look into the problem and address a backlog of cases, Pope Francis has still not established any protocol for handling sex abuse allegations for the Catholic Church as a whole. The Pope is more worried about the reputation of the church..<br />\n<br />\nONCE AS A YOUNG MAN 38 YEARS AGO, I STAYED IN VATICAN FOR 3 DAYS IN A SEMINARY - CASA PAOLTTI BY THE BANKS OF THE RIVER TIBER . MY GOAN PURSER WHOSE BROTHER WAS A PRIEST IN VATICAN, HE WAS WITH ME.. WE HAD FREE FOOD AND LODGING -- NICE SPACIOUS CLEAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WORD SPREAD AND SOME EXCITED MALAYALI NUNS CAME RUNNING TO SEE ME.. ALL PRETTY.. I WAS SURPRISED AS KERALA NUNS ARE ALL FUCKIN' BALLS TO LOOK AT.<br />\n<br />\nONE NUN TOLD ME ABOUT THE RAMPANT SEXUAL ABUSE.. SHE WAS BEING ABUSED BY BOTH PRIESTS AND NUNS..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ALMOST AS IF SHE WAS A SEX SLAVE AND EXPECTED ME TO DO SOMETHING..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE DONE MY PART IN THE PRE-INTERNET DAYS USING WHITE CLERGY IN BRITAIN.. SO I DONT HAVE A GUILTY CONSCIENCE ABOUT THIS.. MY DECISION TO START BLOGGING TO EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS HAS A ROOT IN THIS UNFORTUNATE NUN..<br />\n<br />\nSHE TOLD ME THAT BISHOPS ARE CHOSEN BY POPE IN KERALA TO SNUFF OUT ANY WHISTLE BLOWERS BY CASH/ LAND OR FEAR .. IT WAS A WATER TIGHT SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nThe Vatican instructed Catholic bishops around the world to cover up cases of sexual abuse or risk being thrown out of the Church.<br />\n<br />\nIt focuses on sexual abuse initiated as part of the confessional relationship between a priest and a member of his congregation. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br />\n<br />\nThe 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br />\n<br />\nThey also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br />\n<br />\nI DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. THE TALL MAN WITH ME IS SECOND ENGINEER, A HINDU MALAYALI FROM CALICUT.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe pope has set guidelines for removing bishops who have been \u201cnegligent\u201d in addressing cases of abuse. This is all charade..<br />\n<br />\nThere has been a long history of protecting highly placed Catholic leaders from charges of sexual abuse.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
