Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686521119#c5270560851422573945\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWhen reports surfaced in 1995 that Austrian Cardinal Hans Hermann Groer had molested monks and schoolboys, the sexual abuse was dismissed by Bishop Kurt Krenn as \u201cboyish pranks.\u201d It was proved that parents of child victims were paid \u201chush money\u201d to buy their silence. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br />\n<br />\nIn another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br />\n<br />\nJoseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMaciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br />\n<br />\nThe hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br />\n<br />\nSuperiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br />\n<br />\nIt is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. You see, the Catholic Church is a divine institution necessary for salvation, then there are those who will protect its reputation at all costs.<br />\n<br />\nASRAMA BAPU HAS BEEN FRAMED TO PROVE THAT SUCH THINGS HAPPEN IN HINDUISM TOO. ALMOST ALL HIS ROOTLESS VULNERABLE FOLLOWERS ARE NOW CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere is a tipping point, however. The key moment leading to the resignation of Cardinal Law was a letter, signed by 58 priests, asking him to resign.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the priest that Cardinal Law protected, John Geoghan, was convicted of his crimes \u2013 and later killed in prison \u2013 Bernard Law himself never faced a court of justice.<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, he was effectively promoted to a venerable position as head of one of Catholicism\u2019s most famous churches, Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome.<br />\n<br />\nFor victims of sexual abuse that occurred under his tenure, Cardinal Law only offered only a general apology and a vague reference to his own \u201cshortcomings.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA BISHOP MADE LOT OF HOOO HAAA ABOUT NCW WANTING TO STOP CONFESSIONS IN CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/kerala-nun-rape-audio-clip-of-priest-trying-to-bribe-nun-surfaces-case-registered/story-46dy2OsB6YSIYJoyuuur0L.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere is an international conspiracy by the Church to hush up sexual abuse issues. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HINDUS WERE MADE TO\nBELIEVE THAT ALL OUR GODS ARE MORTALS.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUST A FEW MONTHS AGO I SAW ROGUE GURU ( WHOM MODI GAVE PADMA VIBHUSHAN ) SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TELLING ON NDTV THAT SHIVA WAS BORN 15,000 YEARS AGO AND HE IS LIKE SACHIN TENDULKAR , THE GOD OF CRICKET..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV WHO IS A DARLING OF WHITE FREE MASONS TOLD ON NDTV--&nbsp; &nbsp;IT IS OK IF HOMOSEXUAL MEN HAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS RASCAL DOES NOT KNOW THAT KARMA DEALS WITH WHAT GOES ON IN YOUR MIND--LEAVE ALONE CLOSED DOORS.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">IN REALITY ALL HINDU\nGODS ( HANDFUL OF THEM ONLY ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES \u2013 EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS\n.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUT OF THESE MORTAL\nAVATARS WE PRAY ONLY TO RAMA/ KRISHNA / AYYAPPA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DON\u2019T PRAY TO VAMANA\nAND PARASHURAMA \u2013 FEW TEMPLES EXIST IN KERALA FOR PARASHURAMA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AYYAPPA COMMANDS THIS\nPLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BENAMI MEDIA BOYCOTTS THIS NO 1 PLIGRIMAGE ON THIS\nPLANET\u2014EVEN IN 2018. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE\nBASTARD MEDIA GIVE FANTASTIC COVERAGE FOR MECCA HAJ, &nbsp;CHRISTMAS MASS IN FOREIGN LANDS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL ARE JEALOUS &nbsp;OF SABARIMALA. THE DESH DROHI COMMIES AND\nBENAMI MEDIA ARE TRYING TO SABOTAGE THIS AMAZING PILGRIMAGE , WHICH IS TWICE\nTHE SIZE OF MAHA KUMBH MELA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TO\nRECAP\u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SANATANA\nDHARMA HAS A BASE AND TWO TEMPLATES ON TOP\u2014ALL THREE ARE ON MACRO AND MICRO\nSCALE<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>1- THE\nBASE IS&nbsp; THE <span style=\"color: purple;\">MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN </span>\u2013\nTHE ORIGINAL GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA , WHICH CANNOT BE PICKED UP BY THE FIVE\nHUMAN SENSES<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS FIELD AT MACRO SCALE IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) --AT MICRO SCALE IT IS THE EMPTY SPACE WITHIN THE ATOM.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/advaita-vedanta-philosophy-adi.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/advaita-vedanta-philosophy-adi.html</a><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>2- THE\nTEMPLATE ON TOP IS THE TRINITY AND THEIR WIVES\u2014THE <span style=\"color: blue;\">DANCE OF THE OPPOSITES (\nBRAHMA &nbsp;-RAJAS / SHIVA- TAMAS &nbsp;) CONTROLLED BY A MEDIATOR ( VISHNU- SATTVA )</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TAMAS\nAND RAJAS ARE OPPOSING FIELDS ( POSITIVE / NEGATIVE ) WHILE SATTVA IS NEUTRAL. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TAMAS\nAND RAJAS ARE CONSCIOUS OF EACH OTHER &nbsp;--\nWHEN THEY WANE / WAX THEY EXCITE THE OTHER.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>EVEN\nTHE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE &nbsp;INVOLVED.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BRAHMAs\nWIFE SARASWATI IS THE QUASAR\u2014THE MOTHER LIGHT <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</a><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SHIVAs\nWIFE IN HER EXTREME DESTRUCTIVE FORM IS KALI THE BLACK HOLE WHO EATS UP\nGALAXIES . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ONLY\nSHIVA CAN STOP KALI WHEN SHE IS ON THE RAMPAGE.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IT IS\nDEPICTED BY SHIVA THROWING HIMSELF UNDER HER FEET AND WHEN WIFE KALI STEPS ON\nHER HUSBANDs CHEST\u2014SHE STOP ON HER TRACKS , WITH HER TONGUE OUT IN EMBARRASMENT<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BRAMMA\n/ VISHNU / SHIVA AND THEIR WIVES SARASWATI/ LAXMI/ PARVATI WORK IN TANDEM AND\nIN PERFECT HARMONY .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EUbejbE01M8/WmvUlD8iQvI/AAAAAAABYRk/wopS8Hr3qRgOb4cLcCS7PDAfSIRZfwj4ACLcBGAs/s1600/QuasarBlaEEckhole1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"273\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EUbejbE01M8/WmvUlD8iQvI/AAAAAAABYRk/wopS8Hr3qRgOb4cLcCS7PDAfSIRZfwj4ACLcBGAs/s400/QuasarBlaEEckhole1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>3- THE\nFINAL TEMPLATE IS THE UNION OF <span style=\"color: red;\">PURUSHA ( CONSCIOUSNESS ) AND PRAKRITI ( ENERGY\n) &nbsp;</span>AT MACRO COSMIC SCALE &nbsp;\u2014 ALSO CALLED SHIVA AND WIFE SHAKTI AT THE\nMICRO SCALE ( KUNDALINI RISE )<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE\nCREATION OF THE COSMOS IS AN ACT OF TANTRIC LOVE .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Tayor\nyad yamalam rupam sa samghatta iti smrtah---<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Ananda-saktih\nsaivokta yato visvam visrjyati,<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Na\nSivah Saktirahito na Saktih Sivavarjita.&nbsp;\n---</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>(Tantraloka-Ahnika, 3.)- 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>\"The\ncoupled form of these two (Shiva-Shakti) is called junction.&nbsp; That is called the blissful Shakti from which\ncreation arises.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SHAKTI\nIS MANIFESTED BY SHIVA ONLY DURING CREATION OF THE COMOS AND IS WITHDRWAN INTO\nHIMSELF T THE END OF CREATION.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS\nDOES NOT MAKE SHIVA A TRANSGENDER HIJRA AS THE DESH DROHIS ( COMMIES ) WHO\nATTEND LITERARY FESTS DO.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE\nUNION OF SHIVA WITH SHAKRI IS THE LIBERATION OF THE SEEKER FORM THE ENDLESS\nCYCLE OF BIRTH AND DEATH<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">To break\nthe ice, Hardy made a innocent remark that the number of the taxi , he came in\nis 1729-- looks like a boring number, to kick start a conversation-- instead of\nthe usual English weather.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Ramanujan had a cursory\nglance at the taxi number plate himself and replied casually in a knee jerk\nmanner&nbsp; &nbsp;\"Oh No, actually it is a very interesting number. .It is the\nsmallest natural number representable in two different ways as the sum of two\ncubes\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; Thartheva sevitho vayurnyartha hanthi\nsadhakam\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">Just like an elephant,\na lion or a tiger can be tamed slowly and gradually, in the same way a\npractitioner should try to tame his breath slowly, slowly or else it kills the\npractitioner himself.&nbsp; - - </span><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">Sama veda\n-5000 BC&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 150%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">6000\nyear old Ayurveda &nbsp;shuns hyperventilation\nand chest breathing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of yoga was\nINVENTED by the white invader and Kapalbhatti HYPERVENTILATION is one of these.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kapalbhati has been\nmarketed like a quick-fix pill to lose obesity and gain good health. It\u2019s a\nlazy man\u2019s yoga.. When you jerk your entire body internally, you are giving all\nyour inner organs a jolt. You force the air pressure downwards, exerting\nextreme force on your uterus ( hark ye women )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For kapalabhati, even\nto shift the predominant nostril,exhalation must be gentle NEVER not use\nexcessive force<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had Vatakrama\nkapalabhati, where exhalation is active while inhalation is passive, the\nopposite of normal breathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had Vyutkrama\nkapalabhati where water is drunk through the nose and expelled from the mouth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had Sheetkrama\nkapalabhati, the reverse of Vyutkrama kapalabhati, in which water is taken in\nthrough the mouth and expelled through the nose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOGA DOES NOT SUPPORT\nHYPERVENTILATION AT ALL &nbsp;!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Vedas caution\nagainst it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kapal bhatti shown on\nTV causes hernia and then you are up shit creek without a fuckin\u2019 paddle..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HYPER VENTILATION\nshortens your life span . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRIPLE SRI patented\nhyperventilation and is making money on it. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Martini effect ( Nitrogen narcosis destroys\nyour brain) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fake yoga gurus have\ncaused strangulated hernia among lakhs -- which is a life-threatening\ncondition. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does TRIPLE SRI know\nyoga? Where did he do his training ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A hiatal hernia occurs\nwhen the top portion of the stomach pushes through a weakened opening in the\ndiaphragm where the food pipe (esophagus) joins your stomach (called the hiatal\nopening). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inguinal hernia is due\nto weakness of the abdominal muscles which holds the organs in their original\npositions . So the organ gets protruded through inguinal canal and sometimes to\nscrotum. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An incarcerated hernia\nhappens when part of the fat or small intestine from inside the abdomen becomes\nstuck in the groin or scrotum and cannot go back into the abdomen<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aerophagia is a\ncondition where a person ingests too much air, which goes into the abdomen and\nresults in sporadic belching-- this happens when you hyperventilate .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Break Hernia is the\noutcropping of a part of the abdomen into the thoracic (chest) hole due to\ndecline or crack of the diaphragm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogic breathing is NOT\nhyperventilation like Baba Ramdev\u2019s bullshit Kapalbhatti -- or Triple Sri Ravishankar's\nSOO HUM -- &nbsp;it is deep diaphragmatic\nbreathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did Triple Sri\u2019s\nGARGANTUAL TONDH not come in between his training ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is his pathetic body a\nYoga teachers body like BKS Iyengar or Ramdev ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can TRIPLE SRI strip\ndown to his waist and show us his yogic body ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in Kerala know more\nabout Yoga. --as all Ayurvedic physicians knew yoga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kapalabhati involves\nexhaling powerfully and rapidly a number of times while sitting with the legs\ncrossed in a meditation.. Kapalabhati is non-diaphragmatic breath. When you\nexhale during kapalabhati, the abdominal muscles contract. They push the\nabdominal contents upward against the diaphragm, actively compressing the lungs\nand driving air out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You inhale not by\ncontracting the diaphragm, but by relaxing the abdominal muscles. This causes\nthe abdomen to drop. As gravity pulls the belly down, it also pulls the\ndiaphragm\u2019s central tendon and the base of the lungs down, creating the\nexpansion that brings air in. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before air reaches the\nalveoli it must pass through an extensive network of tubing, from the nose or\nmouth through the throat, the trachea, and a series of smaller and smaller\nbranching tubes within the lungs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the\nalveolar-capillary interface is the checkout line where the business of\nbreathing is transacted\u2014oxygen for carbon dioxide\u2014the airway is like the\nnetwork of highways and local streets that conduct goods to and from the\nmarket.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alveolar ventilation\nrather than total ventilation determines how much CO2 gets expelled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inhalations to happen\nbetween exhalations.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because you\u2019re\nbreathing rapidly, your next exhale begins before your diaphragm has a chance\nto descend very far. The central tendon probably doesn\u2019t even drop to where it\nwould be at the end of a normal exhale, much less to where it would be after a\nnormal diaphragmatic inhale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only that, to allow\nthe belly to move as freely as possible in kapalabhati, you need to stabilize\nthe base of ribs. You can feel this when you practice kapalabhati by placing\nyour hands on your lower ribs and noting how they don\u2019t widen as they typically\ndo when you breathe diaphragmatically.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because you\u2019re missing the lateral\nexpansion of the lungs that usually accompanies the downward pull on their base\nduring a diaphragmatic inhale, tidal volume is reduced even further.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only part of that tidal\nvolume is actually involved in gas exchange<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas exchange takes\nplace at the interface between tiny, gossamer-walled air sacs known as alveoli,\nwhich make up the bulk of the lung tissue, and the networks of capillaries that\nsurround them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capillaries are so narrow that red blood cells pass through\nsingle file, like customers funneled through a supermarket check-out line, and\nso thin-walled that oxygen and carbon dioxide can diffuse between the alveoli\nand the blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation\nnaturally promotes inflammatory health problems . Earthing (electrical\ngrounding the human body) are the key anti-inflammatory agents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During hyperventilation\nthe rate of removal of carbon dioxide from the blood is increased. As the\npartial pressure of carbon dioxide in the blood decreases, respiratory\nalkalosis, characterized by decreased acidity or increased alkalinity of the\nblood, ensues.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In turn, alkalosis causes constriction of the small blood\nvessels that supply the brain. This causes reduction of Prana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having a normal level\nof CO2 in the lungs and arterial blood (40 mm Hg or about 5.3% at sea level) is\nimperative for normal health.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; .Hypocapnia\n(CO2 deficiency) in the lungs and, in most cases, arterial blood is a normal\nfinding for chronic diseases due to prevalence of chronic hyperventilation\namong the sick.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 levels rise to a\ncertain point, it stimulates our body\u2019s chemical receptors (chemoreceptor).\nChemoreceptor send signal to the respiratory center in the brainstem which\ntrigger the breathing cycle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation is the\nmost serious form of breathing deregulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation\ndesensitize the chemo-receptors. Such desensitization can reset the\nchemoreceptor to trigger breathing cycle at lower concentration of CO2, which\ncan further increase respiratory rate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The level our\nchemoreceptors should be triggered to breathe is about 40 mm Hg of arterial\nCO2. In an asthmatic it gets triggered only at 33 mm Hg of CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation is\ncaused by increased alveolar ventilation (exhalation of CO2) relative to\nmetabolic carbon dioxide production, which results in hypocapnia (reduced CO2\nlevels in the blood). It is one of the most insidious and dangerous response to\nvarious stressors in daily lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deficit in CO2 levels\ncan immediately trigger or exacerbate system-wide symptoms that involve\nphysical and mental consequences of all kinds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God has NOT declared\nCO2 as a BAAAAAD gas .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 increases cerebral\nblood flow (CBF) by 1 to 2 ml/100 g/minute per 1 mmHg of partial pressure of\nCO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reduction of co2 levels\nto 20- 25 mmHg decreases CBF by 40 to 50% as a result of one minute of over\nbreathing. This is mainly mediated by vasoconstriction of brain blood vessels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasoconstriction not\nonly reduces oxygen availability (hypoxia) but also reduces glucose levels\n(hypoglycemia). This can exacerbate deficits in cognitive, perceptual and motor\nfunctioning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tissue hypoxia along\nwith hypoglycemia can affect our attention, concentration, imagination,\nperformance and ability to perform complex tasks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long-term\nvasoconstriction can result in reduced neurotransmitter synthesis and\npredisposes an individual to depression and other psychological problems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deficit in CO2 leads to\nreduction of carbonic acid and elevation of blood ph above 7.4 leading to\nrespiratory alkalosis. Paradoxically, it can reduce oxygen availability\n(hypoxia) to the cells as hemoglobin doesn\u2019t release its oxygen readily in\nalkaline ph.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alkalosis can increase\ncellular excitability, increases oxygen demand, induces anaerobic metabolism\nand leads to antioxidant depletion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When cells get less\noxygen they undergo anaerobic respiration. Tissue Hypoxia along with anaerobic\nrespiration can enhance free radical generation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alkalosis can increase\nmigration of calcium ions from muscle tissues and increases likelihood of\nmuscle spasms, fatigue and soreness. It can also lead to platelet aggregation\nand increases risk of blood clotting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia (reduced CO2\nlevels in the blood) by increasing blood pH can significantly leads to\nmagnesium deficiency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia can affect\nmagnesium-calcium ratio critical for healthy muscle functioning, which can lead\nto muscle spasms, pain, fatigue and soreness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An illiterate rogue guru\ndoes NOT know that hyperventilation can reduce blood flow to the heart by more\nthan 50%...Increased platelet aggregation as a result of hypocapnia can\nincrease chances of blood clotting (thrombosis).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objective of YOGAs\ndeep &nbsp;diaphragmatic pranayama breathing\ntraining is to restore proper breathing biochemistry (CO2 levels), establish\nproper rhythm of breathing (reducing breath holding), lower respiratory rate,\nincrease breathing depth, transfer the focus of breathing from chest to\ndiaphragm, encourage nasal breathing, relax diaphragm during exhalation, reduce\naccessory muscle activity, and establish a high vagal tone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRANAYAMA created\nMIRACLES simply by adjusting the rate and depth of a person\u2019s breath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lot of South Americans\nhad BRAIN STROKE after doing Sri Sri Ravishankars SOHUM SUDARSHAN KRIYA\nhyperventilation .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia enhances\ncellular excitability and increases contractility of the heart, increasing\noxygen demand while oxygen availability is markedly reduced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The elevated pH brings\non calcium migration into muscle tissue, increasing the likelihood of arterial\nspasm.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Optimization of CO2 levels through correct\nbreathing techniques can instantly reduce levels of stress hormones, calm\nemotions, boost oxygen levels, gently massage internal organs, reduce\ninflammation, relax muscles, detox the body, improve pH and simply improve the\noverall efficiency of all organs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood pH is tightly\nregulated by a system of buffers that continuously maintain it in a normal\nrange of 7.35 to 7.45 (slightly alkaline). Blood pH drop below 7 can lead to a\ncoma and even death due to severe acidosis. This causes depression of the\ncentral nervous system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High blood pH (above 7.45) is called alkalosis. Severe\nalkalosis (when blood pH is more than 8) can also lead to death, as it often\nhappens during last days or hours of life in most people who are chronically\nand terminally ill.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hyperventilation is the most common cause of respiratory\nalkalosis.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note that overbreathing is exceptionally common in people with\nchronic diseases.. Changes in carbon dioxide and breathing cause immediate and\nlong-term effects of blood pH. They are not necessary the same.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immediate\neffects are simple: higher-CO2 content causes blood acidification and pH\ndecrease, while reduced carbon dioxide levels increase blood pH, often causing\ndeath in the critically ill.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 gas,\nwhen dissolved in blood, is the second largest group of negative ions of blood\nplasma. Hence, breathing directly affects blood pH.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In its turn, blood pH is\ntightly monitored within a very narrow range (from about 7.3 to 7.5) by the\ngroup of nerve cells located in the medulla oblongata in order to have\nnormal-body biochemistry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same nerve cells control breathing through\nseveral independent mechanisms, including peripheral and central CO2 and O2 chemoreceptors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, arterial CO2,\ncarbon dioxide, through several independent biochemical mechanisms, can\ninfluence blood pH and cause respiratory alkalosis in patients with chronic\ndiseases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">CO2&nbsp; influences viscosity of blood.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Acute hyperventilation and\narterial hypocapnia makes blood more viscous.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This effect is a part of the\nfight-and-flight response (an immediate reaction to stress). While useful in a\nshort run to prevent blood losses due to bleeding, increased blood viscosity\nproduces a large strain on the heart muscle and causes other negative effects\nleading to, for example, thrombosis (formation of a blood clot).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 controls\nand regulates composition and properties of all other bodily fluids, including\nsecretions of the stomach, composition and properties of saliva and mucus, pH\nof the urine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, for most people, in conditions of hyperventilation,\nstomach and urinary pH become too low (too acidic), promoting development of\ngastritis and ulcers, or urinary stones. pH of saliva can be also out of norms\nfor people with low body oxygen levels, especially with less than 20 seconds\nfor the body oxygen test.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Again, hyperventilation leads\nto an excessive elimination of carbon dioxide (CO2) whereas no significant\nadditional amounts of oxygen can be stocked in the body.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blood also becomes\nabnormally alkaline as a result of the excessive elimination of carbon dioxide;\nthis subsequent rise in blood pH is termed alkalosis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alkalosis interferes with\nnormal oxygen utilization by the brain. The symptoms of alkalosis are\nneuromuscular irritability, muscular spasms, tingling and numbness of the\nextremities and around the mouth, and a dizziness, or giddiness, often\ninterpreted as a sense of euphoria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the body alkalosis\ngenerally induces vasodilatation (widening of the blood vessels) but in the\nbrain alone it causes vasoconstriction (narrowing of the blood vessels). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This vasoconstriction\nappears to be made even worse by a sudden increase in blood pressure caused by\nsqueezing or holding the breath \"hard\". The alkalosis-induced\neuphoria can be followed rapidly by hypoxia-induced unconsciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sequence of events\nleading to unconsciousness from hyperventilation is as follows----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decrease in partial\npressure of alveolar CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decrease in partial\npressure of arterial CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increase in blood pH,\n(respiratory alkalosis).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasoconstriction of\nblood vessels supplying brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pooling of the blood\npresent in the brain at the time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain rapidly uses up\noxygen (O2) available in the pooled blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">O2 concentration in the\nbrain drops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unconsciousness from\nhypoxia of cerebral tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the brain\ncannot store reserves of oxygen and, unlike other organs, has an exceedingly\nlow tolerance of oxygen deprivation, it is highly vulnerable if\nvasoconstriction is not reversed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, if the brain is hypoxic, autonomous\nsystems in the body divert blood to the brain at the expense of other organs;\nbecause the brain is vasoconstricted this mechanism is not available. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasoconstriction is\nonly reversed by the build-up of carbon dioxide in the blood through suspension\nof breathing. Hypocapnia is a state of reduced carbon dioxide in the blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, hypocapnia\nusually results from deep or rapid breathing, known as hyperventilation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia reduces the\noxygen levels available to the brain due to the elevated affinity of oxygen to\nhemoglobin (Bohr effect) hence highly increasing the chances of blackout. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: orange; font-size: large;\">Again, hyperventilation\nleads to an excessive elimination of carbon dioxide (CO2) with&nbsp; no significant additional amounts of oxygen\nstored in the body. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDIC YOGA ALLOWS ONLY\nDEEP DIAPHRAGMATIC BREATHING \u2014NOT BULLSHIT HYPERVENTILATION OF SO HUM \u2013\nSUDARSHAN KRIYA OF SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR&nbsp; .\n. . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS CRIMINAL\nPATENTED YOGA&nbsp; TO MAKE MANDHA BUDDHIS OUT\nOF YOUNG INDIAN CHILDREN . . . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation\ndescribes excessive ventilation of the lungs, beyond what is required to\nachieve normal arterial blood gases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Again, hyperventilation,\nor over-breathing, does not add oxygen to arterial blood. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation does\nnot only reduce the total cerebral blood flow, but also changes the\ndistribution of blood flow within the brain.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood flow to the\nfrontal, occipital, and parieto-occipital cortex, as well as the hippocampus is\nreduced relative to other areas of the brain within seconds to minutes of\ncommencing hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sri Sri Ravishankar ,\nBaba Ramdev and Sadguru Jaggi Vasudev do NOT have a technical brain\u2014they are\npretenders . What is their basic technical qualification? .&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Never join a FAKE yoga\nclass where they teach PATENTED hyperventilation and this is against the tenets\nand basic principle of&nbsp; ancient Yoga.&nbsp; &nbsp;If you\nsee this report to a police station</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
