, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Swara yogi knows how\nto&nbsp; kill unnatural sexual desires like\nhomosexuality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara Yoga yokes PRANA\nwith the cosmic life force of AAKASHA ( Zero Point Field-ZPF ).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SWAR etymologically means 'the sound of\none's own breath'.&nbsp;&nbsp; YOG means 'union'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of the 108\nelements has prana within --and hence prana is within inanimate objects too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; for limelight\u2014it is NOT allowed</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; There is\nmore to MUDRA than meets the eye.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS ALL\nASTROLOGERS OF KERALA WERE SWARA YOGIS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWE STILL USE COWRY SHELLS --THEY ARE RUSTLED FOR SCALAR FIELD BEFORE USE\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra yoked with Yoga\nestablishes neurological and psychic connections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Brihadaranyaka\nUpanishad (2,1,19) penned down 7000 years ago, there is the metaphor of a\nspider sitting at the center of its web, issuing and reabsorbing its threads in\nconcentric circles, all held at one point. This image recurs constantly in\nIndian Tantric works.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the Mandala, which\nis a geometrical projection of the 'whole, universe in its essential plan, in\nits process of emanation and of re-absorption', has the same concept underlying\nit.&nbsp;&nbsp; All existence is governed by a\nsingle principle, the source from which everything is born and into which\neverything returns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the TV series HOUSE\nOF CARDS they show some Tibetan monks ( invited to the White House ) labouring\nfor weeks to make a beautiful mandala with coloured powder and then one fine\n\"minute\" they destroy their own work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of nature has a\nrhythm, a natural rhythm that it goes by at the macrocosmic level . At a microcosmic\nlevel, this is reflected in our breath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Swara Yogi knows\nSvarodaya (Swara + Udaya) Sastra - the act of breathing is called\n\"Swara\" while the switching over from one nostril to another reflects\nthe \"Rise of breath\" in that nostril or \"Udaya \" meaning\n\"rise\" .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Swara Yogi can\ncontrol the Prana through Pingala and mind through Ida.&nbsp;&nbsp; His body has a golden aura with all 7\ncolours VIBGYOR enclosed within .&nbsp;&nbsp; When\nthe left nostril is open, it is the lunar energy, Ida Nadi that is flowing and\nwhen the right nostril is flowing, the solar energy or Pingala nadi flows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern circadian rhythm\nsay that the nostrils alternate in dominance every 1 \u00bd to 2 hours.&nbsp;&nbsp; Flight fatigue ( Jet lag ) is loss of\nPrana.&nbsp;&nbsp; When one nostril is dominating\nthe opposite side brain lobe is dominant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TANTRA HAS NOTHING TO\nDO WITH PERVERTED SEX.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN PURUSHA ( SHIVA )\nCOUPLES WITH SHAKTI ( PRAKRITI ) TO FORM THE SIX POINTED STAR -- COSMIC CREATION\nHAPPENS .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE WAS SENT THERE BY\nKOTTAKKAL ARYA VAIDYA SALA IN KERALA TO INCREASE HIS PRANA BY TAKING IN\nNEGATIVE IONS ( SALT SEA SPRAY ) AT THE VIVEKANADA ROCK MIDSEA OFF\nRAMESHAWARAM.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY WAS THE WHOLE WORLD\nINTERESTED IN TAKING INCENSE FROM KERALA ?&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freemason Vivekananda\nsaid&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201c The vast majority of men are\natheists. I am glad that, in modern times, another class of atheists has come\ninto existence in the Western world \u2014 I mean the materialists. They are sincere\natheists. They are better than the religious atheists, who are insincere, who\nfight and talk about religion, and yet do not want it, never try to realise it,\nnever try to understand it.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild the\nBOSS&nbsp; was THE materialist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lightning is a sudden\nelectrostatic discharge that occurs during a thunderstorm.&nbsp;&nbsp; 97% of cloud-to-ground flashes are\n\"negative\" strikes in which a negative charge is transferred to\nearth.\u2014which is good.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swara yoga regards\nbreathing as an electrifying&nbsp;\nexperience.&nbsp;&nbsp; Swara yogis could control\nthe absorption of positive and negative ions in&nbsp;\nthe air they breathed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nreferred to negative ions as PRANA\u2014the carriers of life force.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sea water spray\ncontains an abundance of negative ions which help to reproduce and repair body\ncells,&nbsp; to have a disease-free body. They\nare transmitted into the body through the air and are circulated by the blood.\nToo many positive ions ( modern air pollution) can cause depression, and\nultimately,&nbsp; illnesses.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions stimulate\nthe reticuloendothelial system , a group of defense cells in our bodies which\nmarshal our resistance to disease. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reticuloendothelial\nsystem a network of cells and tissues found throughout the body, especially in\nthe blood, general connective tissue, spleen, liver, lungs, bone marrow, and\nlymph nodes.&nbsp; These cells are concerned with\nblood cell formation and destruction, storage of fatty materials, and\nmetabolism of iron and pigment, and they play a role in inflammation and\nimmunity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the cells are\nmotile\u2014that is, capable of spontaneous motion\u2014and phagocytic\u2014they can ingest\nand destroy unwanted foreign material. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By stimulating the\nreticuloendothelial system negative ions spark the defense cells in this system\nin order to bolster and increase our resistance to disease. In addition to\nbolstering our disease defense system, negative ions increase the amplitude of\nour brain waves, which contributes to an overall higher awareness level\nthroughout our body.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions promote\nalpha brain waves and increased brain wave amplitude which results in a higher\nawareness level. The body is better able to absorb oxygen into the blood cells,\noxidize serotonin and filter airborne contaminants.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sea water sits a\nrock and sprays hydrogen negative ions are released, purifying the air around\nus, killing bacteria, and increasing our energy level, especially in the presence\nof the sun.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best place to do\nSURYANAMASKAR is at&nbsp; seashore with feet\nin wet sand .&nbsp;&nbsp; Negative ions improve our\nability to absorb oxygen by neutralizing damaging free radicals (positive ions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positive and negative\nions are the components of the air one breathes.&nbsp; When one inhales negative ions, they increase\nthe level of prana in the body. The opposite happens when we inhale positive\nions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN RAJA RATEN SINGH CAME TO CALICUT TO SEE RANI PADMINI, SHE WAS AT KURUVADWEEP KALARI / AYURVEDA CENTRE</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE BRITISH VICEROYS USED TO COME TO KURUVADWEEP FOR AYURVEDIC REJUVINATION</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS ISLAND ( IN KABINI RIVER ) HAD A MIRACLE FRESH WATER SPRING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kabini river flows eastward to join the Kaveri River at Tirumakudalu Narasipura in Karnataka.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RANI PADMINI ( PADMAVATHY ) WAS ADAPT IN 64 KALAS OF A WOMAN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KALARI FIGHTING IS NOT INCLUDED IN THESE 64 PARTS.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/urumi-invincible-kalari-sword-wootz.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RATAN SINGH SAW HER FIGHTING WITH URUMI , AND WAS IMPRESSED.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE DEFEATED HIM IN SWORD FIGHTING AND THEN HE WAS HELL BENT ON MARRYING HER.. HE WAS INJURED&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RATAN SINGH RENAMED HER AS PADMAVATHY AND TOOK HER BACK TO RAJASTHAN</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE FIRST SHIP DELIVERED AT COCHIN SHIPYARD WAS NAMED RANI PADMINI-</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://www.indiatoday.in/magazine/economy/story/19801115-e.-sreedharan-dismissal-cast-a-gloom-in-sprawling-cochin-shipyard-821584-2014-01-04</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY FRIEND WAS THE CAPTAIN WHO TOOK DELIVERY -- WE STILL HAVE OWNERSHIP OVER RANI PADMINI</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/64-kalas-of-ancient-india-for-girl.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">KURUVADWEEP IS NAMED AFTER VERY LARGE FIERCE TIGERS ( WITH NON RETRACTABLE CLAWS WHO HAVE BROWN SKIN ) IN THE ISLAND--</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN KERALA WE CALL THESE TIGERS KADUVA IN MALAYALAM EVEN TODAY-- SOME ARE STILL THERE AT NEYYAR DAM.. THEY CAN EAT BENGAL TIGERS AND GIR LIONS FOR BREAKFAST-- AS A SIDE DISH</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><br />ON THIRUVATHIRA WE HAVE KADUVA DANCE ( NARI KALI ) IN CALICUT</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">h</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">ttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/thiruvathira-karva-chauth-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET RAJPUTS BELIEVE WHAT THEY WANT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHO CARES !</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 27, 2018 at 9:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.indiatoday.in/magazine/economy/story/19801115-e.-sreedharan-dismissal-cast-a-gloom-in-sprawling-cochin-shipyard-821584-2014-01-04<br />\n<br />\nLike Singapre, Singhal Dweep also means an island where lions are living. Before 18th century, 80% of the region were dense forests that were connected to each other. This means the wild animals could migrate thousands of miles similar to the great migration of wildebeests of Serengeti ( located in North Tanzania and South-Western Kenya). But today tiger population is far are more than lions.<br />\n<br />\nRegarding the exact location of Singhal Dweep, we may have believe more of folk lores or legends than the fictional imagination of a single poet. The first ship to roll out of the Cochin Shipyard was the MV Rani Padmini in 1981 under the stewardship of Metro man E Sreedharan</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_1MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-189947884\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_1B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_2B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7691599258788297366\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html?showComment=1517039921082#c7691599258788297366\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 27, 2018 at 1:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SRI LANKA HAS KADUVA ON THE FLAG- NOT LION.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THE ANIMAL ON SRI LANKAN FLAG HAS A SNOUT LIKE A \"KADUVA\"--AND IT HAS NON-RETRACTABLE CLAWS . THIS IS SHOWN CLEARLY ON SCULPTURES</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE KADUVA HAS A SNOUT LIKE A WOLF--&nbsp; AND THE WILD CAT IS LARGER AND FIERCER THAN THE AVERAGE LION OR TIGER --IT CAN RIP ASUNDER WITH ITS SHARP CLAWS --</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CLAWS OF THE KADUVA BE STRETCHED OUTWARDS LIKE A FAN..AND IT CAN HOLD AN OBJECT .. THIS IS DEPICTTED ON THE SRI LANKAN FLAG BY THE KADUVA HOLDING A SWORD ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HISTORICALLY THERE HAS NEVER BEEN LIONS IN SRI LANKA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE \"SINHA DYNASTY\" OF SRI LANKA WAS ORIGINALLY CALLED \"KADUVA DYNASTY\"--MISPRONOUNCED BY THE WHITE INVADER AS \"KARAVA\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FAKE TAMIL PRIDE HAS CONVERTED IT TO \"KARAVA \" CASTE OF TAMIL NADU--AND THIS BECAME A CORNER STONE FOR EALAM ( KARAVA SINGHE DYNASY OF JAFFNA )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHECK OUT THE UN-RETRACTABLE CLASS OF THE KADUVA BELOW-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SRI LANKA WAS FULL OF MALAYALIS ( PRABHAKARAN OF LTEE WAS A MALAYALI ) -- THESE PEOPLE CAME RUNNING BACK TO KERALA AS THEY DID NOT WANT TO WORK LIKE DONKEYS UNDER THE WHITE INVADER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAVANA WAS AN INDIAN WHO KNEW SANSKRIT, 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html?showComment=1517270216634#c7136757320290349305\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 30, 2018 at 5:26 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_74MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWHY WAS THE POPULAR AMERICAN TV SERIAL \"HOUSE OF CARDS \" SHUT DOWN ?<br />\n<br />\nIS IT BECAUSE THEY SHOWED RAMPANT SEX AND HOMOSEXUALITY IN SIDE THE WHITE HOUSE ?<br />\n<br />\nWELL THEY SHOWED 5% OF SEX AND HOMOSEXUALITY<br />\n<br />\nWHITE HOUSE IS A BUILDING ON PLANET EARTH WHERE MAXIMUM COCAINE IS SNORTED. THIS SERIAL NEVER SHOWED IT<br />\n<br />\nTHE SERIAL DIRECTORS MADE MISTAKE OF SHOWING THE RITUAL AT \"BOHEMIAN GROVE\"<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WHOLE RITUAL IS IN FRONT OF A HUGE CROW TYPE BIRD ( THOTH )<br />\n<br />\nTHOTH IA A COMBINATION OF GARUDA IN THE POISON INJECTED GARUDA PURANA--WHERE THERE IS PERMANENT HELL IN HINDUISM ( BALLS )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAND THE CARRIER OF LORD SHANI--THE HUGE RAVEN CROW<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY I SAW TRUPTI DESAI ON TV RAISING THE KERALA MUSLIM WOMAN WHO ACTED AS ULLAH AND LEAD THE FRIDAY PRAYERS -- BREAKING TRADITION<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS INDIVIDUAL KARMA AND COLLECTIVE KARMA<br />\n<br />\nSHANI DELIVERED COLLECTIVE KARMA BY \"BLACK DEATH\" IN EUROPE--AFTER THE ENTIRE CONTINENT DID CANNIBALISM<br />\n<br />\nASK ANY COMPETENT ASTROLOGER--HE WILL TELL YOU ABOUT THI DIVINE JUSTICE<br />\n<br />\nTHE DIRECTOR OF \"HOUSE OF CARDS\" DARED TO ALLUDE TO THE RAMPANT GAY ORGIES WHICH GO ON AT BOHEMIAN GROVE ... HE SHOWED THE GIRLIE BOYS ( ANAL SEX RECEIVING ) AND HUGE BLACK SPORTSMEN WITH BIG DONGS ( ANAL SEX HUMPING )<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST POWERFUL PEOPLE ON THE PLANET ( ALL FREEMASONS ) COLLECT HERE AT BOHEMIAN GROVE TO DISCUSS THE DESTINY OF THE PLANET<br />\n<br />\nBELOW--WIKIPEDIA SAYS THAT THE HUGE MASCOT IS AN OWL-SORRY--IT IS THOTH.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bohemian_Grove</span><br />\n<br />\nREAL HUMAN SACRIFICES HAVE HAPPENED HERE-<br />\n<br />\nONLY NIXON DARED TO REVEAL THE GAY ORGIES WHICH GO ON HERE<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HL6cxGg6yas</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE INITIAL ATTENDEES WERE MOSTLY DESCENDANTS OF THE \"BOSTON BRAHMINS\"-- THE POWER FAMILIES OF USA-- THE OPIUM DRUG RUNNING AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ( LIKE THE PARSIS AND MARWARI JEWS OF INDIA)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nISLAM AND FREEMASONS ARE LIKE OIL AND WATER--THEY DONT MIC<br />\n<br />\nYET BEFORE 1947, ALMOST ALL FAMOUS MUSLIM FREEDOM FIGHTERS WERE FREE MASONS .. THE ONES WHO ATTENDED ROUND TABLE CONFERENCE WITH GANDHI IN ENGLAND WERE HIGH RANKING ONES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN MY HOMETOWN CALICUT WE HAD ONE OF THE OLDEST FREEMASON LODGES OF INDIA.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/freemason-lodge-of-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE OATHS SWORN IN LODGES TAKE PREPONDERANCE OVER THE LAWS OF THE LAND.. THE CRY OF THE STUPID JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS \"LIBERTY , EQUALITY, FRATERNITY \" IS JEW ROTHSCHILDs CRY--AND THE MOB WHO BEHEADED THE FRENCH KING AND QUEEN CHANTED THIS<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MONOLOPISED MEDIA WROTE LIES THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD -THEY MUST EAT CAKE\".. Let us be Objective and NOT get emotional by looking at RNK's childhood struggles.........look purely at who is more capable to lead a Nation (even if it is a figurative head of Nation).<br />\n<br />\nE.Sreedharan VS Ram Nath Kovind --- a battle of credentials and contribution to this Nation !<br />\n<br />\nWho has been more Useful ? , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR NATION IS BUILT ON LIES--</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR FAKE ASHOKA SYMBOLS, OUR CURRENCY WITH GANDHIs HEAD ETC</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR TRUE SYMBOLS ARE BANYAN TREE , TIGER , PEACOCK , ARJUNA AWARD ( SHOOTING EYE OF FISH AS A CONSCIOUSNESS TEST ) etc&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_13b+seedEjhSD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_13b+seedEjhSD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html?showComment=1517408975254#c2267296177877944068\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 31, 2018 at 7:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_206MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rss-disempowering-women-were-fighting-its-ideology-rahul-gandhi/articleshow/62725818.cms<br />\n<br />\nWE WOULD LIKE TO SEE MARRIED MEN HEADING RSS<br />\n<br />\nWE DONT WANT BRAHMACHARIS ANYMORE<br />\n<br />\nThe Sarsanghchalak is the head of the RSS organisation; the position is decided through nomination by the predecessor.<br />\n<br />\nK. B. Hedgewar (1925\u20131930. 1931\u20131940)<br />\nLaxman Vaman Paranjpe (1930\u20131931)<br />\nM. S. Golwalkar (1940\u20131973)<br />\nMadhukar Dattatraya Deoras (1973\u20131993)<br />\nRajendra Singh (1993\u20132000)<br />\nK. S. Sudarshan (2000\u20132009)<br />\nMohan Bhagwat (incumbent since 21 March 2009)<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA WE DONT CARE FOR BRAHMACHARIS.. THIS LIE HAS BEEN BUSTED BY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/rss-rashtriya-swayamsevak-sangh-brief.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c618820442491589405\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_141M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html?showComment=1518568245831#c618820442491589405\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 14, 2018 at 6:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_141MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID--&nbsp; THERE IS A LATEST FAD OF BILLIONAIRES GIVING AWAY THEIR WEALTH ( MENTIONED IN THEIR WILLS ) LEAVING ASIDE A SMALL PERCENTAGE FOR THEIR CHILDREN TO TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES AND THE IMMEDIATE FIRST GENERATION CHILDREN THEY PRODUCE.<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE ANSWER?<br />\n<br />\nTHESE BILLIONAIRES UNDERSTAND THE PHILOSOPHY OF SANATANA DHARMA -- OR REBIRTH<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR-- WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT \"YOU\"<br />\n<br />\nYOU ARE ARE SEEING A HUMAN CADAVER IN WHICH YOU HAVE TAKEN SHELTER FOR THIS BIRTH ON PLANET EARTH&nbsp; -- LIKE A HAT OR A SHIRT<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY YOU WILL DIE AND YOUR SOUL ( YOU- A BALL OF ENERGY&nbsp; ) WILL EXIT -- AND PARK IN ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAITING NEXT RE-INDUCTION ON PLANET EARTH IN THE BODY OF A BABY IN SOME MOTHERs WOMB --COULD BE SOMALIA / JAPAN / AFRICA / ALASKA --WHATEVER<br />\n<br />\nNOW UNDERSTAND THE WISDOM<br />\n<br />\nYOU ARE ON A RAFT FLOATING ON A RIVER.&nbsp; &nbsp;THIS RAFT IF SWIFTLY GOING DOWN STREAM PROPELLED BY THE RIVER CURRENT TOWARDS A WATERFALL -- FOR THE FINAL PLUNGE( DEATH )...<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT STOP THIS PLUNGE TO DEATH<br />\n<br />\nWHILE ON THE RAFT , YOU ARE FISHING ..&nbsp; YOU CANT EAT MORE THAN 3 FISHES DAY<br />\n<br />\nYET SOME GREEDY CRIMINALS , THEY STEAL FISH FROM OTHER RAFTS .. THEY OVERFISH AND STORE THESE FISHES IN A FISH BANK ASHORE --THE BANKS ( CALL IT A COMPUTER )<br />\n<br />\nRICH CRIMINALS CAN NEVER SEE ALL THE FISH ( MONEY ) THEY HAVE STASHED AWAY ASHORE<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE USE OF ALL THIS HOARDED FISH ( MONEY -LAND -GOLD ) ?<br />\n<br />\nFOR ALL YOUR KNOW,&nbsp; YOUR GRANDCHILD MAY BE THE PERSON ( SOUL ) FROM WHOSE RAFT YOU STOLE FISH --IN HIS NEXT BIRTH<br />\n<br />\nWHERE IS THE WISDOM IN STEALING AND HOARDING FISH FOR NEXT 100 GENERATIONS?<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD HAS CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\nIN HIS NEXT LIFE HE COULD BE SOME PIRATE IN SOMALIA OR SOME ROHINGYA REFUGEE IN SOME CAMP<br />\n<br />\nAFTER DEATH -- THE KING AND THE PAWN GOES INTO THE SAME BOX ( ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX ASTRAL LAYERS )<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS ALL THIS BULLSHIT ONE-UP-MANSHIP WHILE ALIVE ?<br />\n<br />\nBE HAPPY WHILE ALIVE-- DONT OVERFISH -- FISH ENOUGH TO PROVIDE FOR YOURSELF AND YOUR CHILDREN ( WHO WILL TAKE CARE OF THEIR OWN CHILDREN WITH SOME LEFT OVER FISH --IF REQUIRED )<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />YOUR WORST ENEMY TODAY COULD BE YOUR GREAT GRANDSON</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">REMEMBER-- WE WERE ALL BORN WITH THE STARS --AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.. YOU GREAT GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WERE BORN AT THE SAME INSTANT.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHO AM I ?<br /><br />IF YOU UNDERSTAND THIS --AND LIVE IN THE MOMENT --YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE WILL REDUCE --BECAUSE YOU WILL NOT BE A SON OF A BITCH AFTER THAT</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br />DEATH IS A GREAT LEVELLER</b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">THE PURPOSE OF LIFE IS TO BE HAPPY ( NOT BY SCREWING SOMEBODY ELSEs HAPPINESS ) -AND BEING CREATIVE -- AND GRACEFUL.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/happiness-from-within-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 93 , BELOW</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "129", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6053164546350054990/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "688252673774180644", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-01-24T05:24:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-21T08:10:41+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU1ODE0NDQxNjI5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/688252673774180644", "title": "SANATANA DHARMA , HINDUISM EXHUMED AND RESURRECTED, PART 91 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 90, BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
