max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2152201745995146476\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_168M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516751371390#c2152201745995146476\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 24, 2018 at 5:19 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_168MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES SANATANA DHARMA INSIST OF<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"> <b>SANYASA ASHRAMA</b></span><br />\nWELL --IT IS NOT ABOUT BEING A HERMIT IN A CAVE<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />IT IS ABOUT SELF IMPOSED SOLITUDE.&nbsp; THE GREATEST CREATIVITY IN ANCIENT INDIA CAME FROM SOLITUDE</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThere is a great difference between LONELINESS and SOLITUDE<br />\n<br />\nLoneliness is the poverty of self, the pain of being alone, unwanted \u2014it breaks human spirit.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />Solitude is the richness of self, the glory of being alone. In solitude mind grains strength.<br /><br />In solitude you face yourself\u2014it is delicious in years of human maturity.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nThis is why Sanatana Dharma insisted in Vanaprasta and Sanyasa ashramas.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />In solitude you have god as your friend. The best thoughts come while in self imposed solitude</span><br />\n<br />\nIn the Hindu system four stages of life have been prescribed: brahmacharya (celibacy), grihastha (family life), vanaprastha (literally, living in a forest), sanyasa (total renunciation).<br />\n<br />\nIn the first stage, brahmacharya, a person leads the life of a student as a celibate.<br />\n<br />\nAfter finishing the studies, he enters the married life of a grihastha.<br />\n<br />\nHaving fulfilled the obligations to children and the society, both husband and wife follow spiritual pursuits during Vanaprasta --they move closer to nature<br />\n<br />\nIn sanyasa, a person completely renounces all worldly belongings and lives in solitude<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW WHITE MIND HAS NEVER REALLY UNDERSTOOD SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nALL SINGLE MESSIAH SINGLE HOLYBOOK RELIGIONS COLLECTIVELY ARE A DROP OF DIRTY WATER-- SANATANA DHARMA IS THE PRISTINE DEEP BLUE OCEAN<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A CRYING SHAME-- INDIANS CONVERTED TO THE SHALLOW RELIGIONS OF INVADERS BY SWORD ( FEAR ) AND SOP ( GREED ) --AND THEIR DESCENDANTS FOLLOW THE RELIGIONS OF THEIR ANCESTORS WHO HAD EXTREMELY POOR CHARACTER<br />\n<br />\nGREED IS A HEART ISSUE<br />\n<br />\nFEAR IS THE REAL ENEMY. KICK THE BASTARD AS HARD AS YOU CAN IT ITS TEETH ( Walter White --BREAKING BAD )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7yID_vczVPo/WmfM-7LokBI/AAAAAAABYMw/BriDrwSHV1cMFs5tBzmxXjVXmUtjWmqDwCLcBGAs/s1600/solituWde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"440\" data-original-width=\"660\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7yID_vczVPo/WmfM-7LokBI/AAAAAAABYMw/BriDrwSHV1cMFs5tBzmxXjVXmUtjWmqDwCLcBGAs/s640/solituWde.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is 1% of what\nhappens and 99% of how you react to it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If you react wrong you karmic baggage increases<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changing your reaction\nis the start to personal empowerment. You now refuse to be a victim of the past\nwhich breaks the cycle of old perceptions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma&nbsp; is a just way of managing life.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Bhagavad Gita is all about BEING IN THE\nMOMENT. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man is the only living\ncreature who can control or change his life. He is not a slave to his\nsurroundings or at the mercy of nature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without spiritual development , man is\nwithout love or positive emotions ( affection, care, respect, sympathy ) .&nbsp; Computers don\u2019t have emotions and can never\nbe a life guru..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without positive emotions man cant be happy. Sanatana Dharma\nwants you to be happy while you are on planet earth..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A wise man can live in\npeace with things he cannot change. Never try to do things you cant. What is\nthe point in teaching a donkey to sing. It is a sheer waste of time and effort.\nY</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ou must fight and make your own life on the planet. Don\u2019t expect anybody else\nto do it for you.&nbsp; Make most of the best\nand least of the worst. Man alone is the architect of his destiny.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No dream can become true unless you have some\nskill and go to work. Check out what skills are most needed in the market.&nbsp; Choose a job you love, then you don\u2019t have to\nwork a day in your life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hunt or get hunted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE OF THE SECRETS OF\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL AT SEA WAS,THAT I TREATED LIFE AS AN ADVENTURE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belief is the power\nbehind all accomplishments. The man who wins is the man who thinks he can.&nbsp; Faith and trust are the seeds which bring the\nsweet fruits of success.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Faith is about \u201c can do\u201d&nbsp; think \u201c it is possible\u201d&nbsp; it gives you new energy. Faith is the bird\nwhich sings when the dawn is still dark.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Will power is the\ndecision to carry on the fight. Self esteem is required to make a person\nmentally healthy.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>IN SANATANA DHARMA\nPRAYER IS A FORM OF INTENTION WHILE BEING IN A FRAME OF GRATITUDE TO THE\nSUPREME FORCE..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>PRAYER IS NOT BEGGING\nFOR MERCY LIKE IN OTHER SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLYBOOK RELIGIONS..</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WHEN A HINDU PRAYS HE\nDOES NOT NEED TO LISTEN TO SOMEONE HOLLERING ON LOUDSPEAKER &nbsp;--THAT ONLY MY\nGOD IS EKDUM AWWAL \u2014 NO 1&nbsp;</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum field or\npure consciousness is influenced by intention <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic maharishis\nwrote down 7000 years ago , that our universe is not woven from&nbsp; matter but consciousness .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The double slit\nexperiment tells clearly that as per&nbsp;\nquantum physics&nbsp; you cant have a universe\nwithout mind entering into it, and the mind is actually shaping the very things\nthat is perceived.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your current thoughts are shaping your future life When you\nvisualise you generate powerful thoughts and feelings of having it now.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of attraction\nreturns that reality exactly&nbsp; as you saw\nit in your mind. Matter, energy and consciousness are interchangeable . There\nare connections between quantum mechanics and consciousness . Consciousness is\nthe intelligence, the organising principle behind the arising of form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything is energy,\nthis is the wisdom of the Universe. As we become clearer channels the awareness\nof our connection to all things increases. We understand there is an infinite\nsupply of energy in the world around us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrons&nbsp; assume the nature of a self-regulating\norganism, as they are inherently intelligent. The principle of Non-Locality\nmeans that everything is joined as an interconnected whole and that space and\ntime are one in the cosmic sea of sub-atomic reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>7000 YEARS AGO , OUR VEDAS RECORDED THAT THERE ARE 108 ELEMENTS</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, Karma Yoga is\nperformance of actions dwelling in union with the Divine, removing attachment\nand remaining balanced ever in success and failure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you act as an\ninstrument in the hands of the Lord, as a participant in the cosmic activity of\nNature, without expectation of fruits, that Karma will not bind you. Karma,\nthen becomes Karma Yoga..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Work unselfishly. Feel that you are only an\ninstrument and that the Lord is working through you. Surrender the actions and\ntheir fruits to the Lord. You will be freed from the bonds of Karma and enjoy\npeace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ignorant people jump at\nonce to Jnana Yoga, without first having a preliminary training in Karma\nYoga.&nbsp; Selfless service is the only way\nto remove the impurities lurking in the mind.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing called\nBHAKTI YOGA in Sanatana Dharma. This concept was cooked up by the white\ninvader. He also gave us 330 million gods\u2014to divide and rule<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two types of\nKarma:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakama Karma - selfish\nactions</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkama Karma -\nselfless actions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakam Karma is to work\nwith selfish expectations and your own interests in mind. Nishkam Karma on the\nother hand is working with unselfish/selfless motives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam karma is the\nopposite of sakam karma and is considered to be selfless action without even the\nsubtle internal hope for a \u201cthank you\u201d or goodness returned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakam karma is\nconsidered attachment to the result of personal actions in life with motives of\nself-interest, whereas nishkam karma centers on actions a yogi takes within the\nworld for the sake of others and not for self-benefit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna suggests that\nwe have rights only on the work or the action, and not on its results, whether\nit is good or bad. Our works, our desires should be \"desireless\", we\nshould not desire for any pleasing (or unpleasing) result.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkama karma simply\nmeans conscientious action. Do what your conscience says because that is the\nultimate guiding soul voice inside a person. Nishkama karma means you have to\nwork without any desire for name and fame.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The doctrine of Karma\nbrings HOPE &nbsp;to the hopeless, help to the\nhelpless, joy to the cheerless and new strength to the weak. It braces up a\nsunken man. It is an ideal \"pick-me-up\" for the depressed and gloomy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The doctrine of Karma teaches: \"Do not blame anybody when you suffer. Do\nnot accuse God. Blame yourself first. You will have to reap what you have sown\nin your previous birth. Your present sufferings are due to your own bad Karma\nin your past life. You are yourself the author of the present state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of weeping over\nthe failure of crops during last year, go on ploughing this year. Do virtuous\nactions now. Think rightly. Act rightly.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will have a brilliant and a\nglorious future.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How soul-stirring is this magnanimous doctrine of Karma! The\ndoctrine of Karma develops faith and supports ethics. It says: \"If you\nhurt another man, you hurt yourself.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are the master of\nyour destiny.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can attain Self-realisation with the help\nof a dynamic will.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu theory is\nthat thought and feeling, as well as actual speech or deeds, are part of Karma\nand create effects, and we do not accept the white man\u2019s &nbsp;sentiment that outward expression of thought\nand feeling in speech or deed is&nbsp; more\nimportant than the thought or feeling itself.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; We might look different, but we are all made of the same\nstuff.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An experiment by French\nphysicist Alain Aspect in 1982 showed that when two particles (photons) are\nseparated, and one of them is given a different charge (positive or negative)\nthe other particle, instantly, without any time delay also changes its charge.\nIt didn\u2019t matter if the particles were one mile apart or one million miles\napart.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s called Quantum Entanglement or Quantum Nonlocality which is\nexplained in Vedas . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIEF EINSTEIN WAS\nHOPELESS IN MATH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</a></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein who studied\nSanskrit and Vedanta himself called quantum physics, \u201cspooky action at a\ndistance.\u201d As he did NOT understand it..&nbsp;&nbsp;\nQuantum mechanics is where the magic takes place. It is the structure of\nthe universe. Quantum mechanics states that our physical reality is incomplete.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein\u2019s theory,\nwhich describes gravity as distortions of space and time, included a\nmathematical element known as a Cosmological Constant. Einstein originally\nintroduced it to explain a static universe, but discarded his mathematical\nfactor as a BLUNDER after it was discovered that our universe is expanding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Einstein himself called\nthis his greatest mistake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He added a cosmological constant to his theory of\ngeneral relativity in order to address the thorny issue that while he believed\nthe Universe was static and unchanging, it&nbsp;\nwas&nbsp; dynamic in the Math\nequations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And we honor this thief and charlatan today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prarabdha is only\nPurushartha of previous birth.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nPrarabdha is that portion of the past karma which is responsible for the\npresent body.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By Purushartha we mean\nthe pursuance of those actions ( choices from free will ) which lead to the\nfulfillment of socially approved values and goal<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny or Prarabdha\nthat we enjoy or suffer in this life is the result of the exercise of our free\nwill or Purushartha in previous lives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our actions in this life will shape our\ndestiny in future lives. Prarabdha and Purushartha, destiny&nbsp; and free will, are not two different entities,\nbut only two different names to indicate the same set of actions viewed from a\nparticular point of time and from a particular angle of metaphysical\nspeculation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O_e578lGJVQ/Wmi2fwkt28I/AAAAAAABYNA/QXk35G4WaW8qWYEjugZ0Vh3jkKU6_vzJQCLcBGAs/s1600/main-qimg-6bbcE3001dbe306126b518d7de266b681-c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"294\" data-original-width=\"602\" height=\"312\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O_e578lGJVQ/Wmi2fwkt28I/AAAAAAABYNA/QXk35G4WaW8qWYEjugZ0Vh3jkKU6_vzJQCLcBGAs/s640/main-qimg-6bbcE3001dbe306126b518d7de266b681-c.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Karma or the conscious\nactions that you do in the present life is passed on to the next life.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>But fate is not passed\non to the next life \u2014&nbsp; read this a <span style=\"color: red;\">TRILLION&nbsp;</span> &nbsp;times</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">FATE DOES NOT SNOWBALL<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">DESTINY SNOWBALLS THROUGH\nSUCCESSIVE RE-BIRTHS AS A HUMAN<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: magenta; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>I WAS A VERY SUCCESSFUL CHANGE MANAGER AT SEA<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: magenta; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>I USED PRINCIPLES OF KARMA AND FREE WILL IN\nMY MODUS OPERANDI<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; --&nbsp; THE ULTIMATE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wQnsyTgZ4os/Wmi4IztVX9I/AAAAAAABYNM/HcrktQGyfJgrFEY4vhjxybY4rYeQWgQYQCLcBGAs/s1600/KEarma%2B14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"375\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wQnsyTgZ4os/Wmi4IztVX9I/AAAAAAABYNM/HcrktQGyfJgrFEY4vhjxybY4rYeQWgQYQCLcBGAs/s640/KEarma%2B14.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">You sow an action and\nreap a tendency. You sow a tendency and reap a habit. You sow a habit and reap\nyour character. You sow your character and reap your destiny. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Therefore destiny is of\nyour own creation. If you change your habits, you can become master of your\ndestiny. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Deep rooted habits and\nvices take a 21 day window period to break&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sabarimala offers double\nthis time<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God never punishes nor\ngives rewards. He is not sitting with a whip to chastise people. Life is governed\nby fundamental divine laws -- this is quantum physics .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law operates and\nman reaps the fruits of his actions. Consciously or unconsciously, through our\nthoughts, beliefs and actions, we create our own realities<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is a bank of\nthoughts of many past lives, the information of which is stored in our deep\nunconscious minds <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain phenomena,\nconnected with the quantum level of reality can not by predicted. They are the\nso-called \u201cincalculables\u201d. Each quantum phenomena includes a degree of freedom.\nEach time the wave function collapses, the result has a chance degree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may be associated\nwith the free will, which is non-deterministic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The particle may reach\na final state that does not depend on its past. In other words, a \u201cfree choice\u201d\nis allowed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heisenberg\u2019s principle\nexplains this degree of freedom. He proved that nobody could perfectly\naccurately observe a particle. We either know precisely its position, but not\nits trajectory, or we know precisely and accurately its trajectory, but we do not\nknow its position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This limit in\nobservation induces an intrinsic degree of incertitude, an imprecision at a\ntheoretical level, a degree of indetermination in each act of observation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern physics allows\nthe concept of free will even at the most fundamental level, contrasting to the\ndeterministic theory of Newton and Descartes ( despite scrounging from India\n)&nbsp; which consider that destiny is decided\nfrom the start, and in an inexorable manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nTantric philosophy, the degree of spiritual evolution of a human being is\ndirectly proportional with the degree of freedom that being has. Hinduism has\nnever shacked anybody with dogma.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While\nSanatana Dharma does not allow killing for food, there are NO dogmas like PIG\nmeat for Muslims<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At first glance Tantra\nand Astrology appear to be at odds with each other: astrology suggests the hand\nof destiny, while Tantra reinforces the freedom of our will.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra is NOT deviant\nsex. &nbsp;Tantra teaches us to shift our\nawareness away from the objects of our lives and focus instead on the awareness\nitself.&nbsp; Tantra is instant manifestation\nand one of the tools is beej mantras.&nbsp; Tantra\nfills everything with divinity of consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An astrological birth\nchart is none other than a map of how we are bound in our human condition.\nTantra is the map of how to overcome the bounds of the human condition. The\nVedic birth chart is the body of Kala Parusha, kala means time, while Purusha\nindicates an individual soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalapurusha is\nTime-personified, TIME itself viewed as a human being. Ketu is the inlet point\nof Karma, the planet ruling the sign occupied by Ketu is said to show incoming\nor past life Karmic control while the planet ruling the sign occupied by Rahu\ncontrols Karmic distribution in this life. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gbAjulQlHAM/WmlbIvvBGqI/AAAAAAABYNs/vjkS6z1-LH8P4k4d6Icq1Q-er6UtQjdPQCLcBGAs/s1600/Gorya.4.11s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanting the Vedic King\nmantra OM raises your vibration to a higher consciousness, and it clears the\nchannel for intuition..which are messages from your unconscious mind making\ncontact with your consciousness.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ndivining power of intuition comes from our inner self. It arises from very\nrapid processing of bits of information that are stored in our subconscious.\nIntuition thinks in terms of metaphor, feelings,, and the spatial whole and\ndoesn't fit neatly into the cause-and-effect model. It is about trusting your\nown integrity - trusting your gut, trusting your heart.. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your intuition will\nnot force you to do things that are truly wrong for yourself or other people in\ncontradiction with the laws of the universe. Intuition is listening to the\ninner voice or heeding the promptings from within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition is a ability\nto cut through the thickness of surface realityIntuition acts like a bridge\nbetween your logical reasoning and the sum total of your experience-based\nknowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition is a knowing,\na sensing that is beyond the conscious understanding \u2014 a gut feeling-- flashes\nof spontaneous thought that are done apparently without relating to facts or\nlogic. Intuition is fast, based on pattern matching. Quantum mechanics makes\nperfect sense mathematically, but defies your 5 senses at every turn.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real\nrevolution is the revolution of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are three types\nof actions; mental, verbal and physical and every word, deed or thought has an\neffect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire moral\ntheology of Sanatana Dharma rests upon the concept of \u201cbenefit of all beings\u201d\n(loka-sangraha). Motivation or intention is the deciding factor of the moral\nnature of an action.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Motivation which centres on the welfare of others\n(parartha) is of the nature of holiness, goodness and purity whereas motivation\nwhich centres upon the oneself (svartha) is negative and leads to suffering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sin in the Vedantic\ncontext is an un-skilled use of action, a lack of spiritual understanding which\ncauses one to transgress the Cosmic Order (Rta). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This human birth is\nattained after millions of rebirths in lower species (8.7 million) and after\nmuch travail and is therefore extremely precious.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One should be encouraged not to waste this\nvaluable opportunity in vain pursuit of sense-gratification but should use this\nopportunity for striving for Moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; We need to change from\ninside to eliminate the divisionary materialistic noise, we have been\nconditioned to think is true, while aligning with our true empirical oneness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ltE5VyJ484o/Wmm1shP_W4I/AAAAAAABYPg/xbWs7IbBgnEzrMI_VjguoJCbt3oBtQ9wACLcBGAs/s1600/iemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ltE5VyJ484o/Wmm1shP_W4I/AAAAAAABYPg/xbWs7IbBgnEzrMI_VjguoJCbt3oBtQ9wACLcBGAs/s400/iemages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will have to do two\nthings to achieve Soul contact: trust, and leap into the unknown. Both choices\nwill be seen as desperate by the mind that clings to limiting belief. These old\nbeliefs get their strength from the mind's powerful need to reinforce its ideas\nof reality...This is basic survivalist experience, and not a path to life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition&nbsp; is a psychological and philosophical term\nwhich designates the process of immediate apprehension or perception of an\nactual fact, being, or relation between two terms and its results.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is something\nwonderful that happens when we are connected with the universal flow of life..\nAt the point of realization, quantum awakening happens and everything you have\nexperienced makes complete sense with an utter clarity that you are forever\nchanged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self acceptance is the\nkey to a higher consciousness and more attractive energy. Maturity is deep\ntrust in your own consciousness. We see incredible order and harmony and\npattern which no accident can produce.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The image of the human being is\ncontained within the microscopic DNA strands of the fertilised egg in the womb.\nConsciousness is the&nbsp; intelligent force\nthat started the blueprint which ultimately manifested itself as a particular\nform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals express\nconsciousness through instinct.&nbsp; Humans ,\nin addition to instinct we possess the highest quality of consciousness, --self\nawareness. Self awareness or reflective thought is thus the difference between\nanimals and humans.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reflection is the power to turn one\u2019s consciousness upon\noneself, to know oneself and especially to know that one knows..&nbsp; Maths , physics, philosophy , astronomy etc\nis due to man\u2019s unique ability to reflect inwardly. The expanded abilities of\nself awareness is abstract reasoning, free will, creativity, foresight\netc.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our culture is oriented towards\nreducing one\u2019s self awareness rather than expanding it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the ancient Vedic\nrishis, it is the flower children ( hippies ) of the sixties ,who cam walking\nall the way to India.&nbsp; They took on\nKOSHER big brother and tried to expand self awareness with the help of Indian\nCannabis&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people never raise their consciousness much above that of the\nbeast and the spark of divinity within them remains dormant the whole of their\nlives .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perception occurs in the gap of alert attention. This is the inner\nspace. When you visit new places , the experiencing and sense perception takes\nup more of their consciousness than thinking .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OhccdbBZzK0/Wmm2AQouQPI/AAAAAAABYPk/hij2ZtITF1oJS8MRVEJsWAWkiaEeIalYgCLcBGAs/s1600/imsages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OhccdbBZzK0/Wmm2AQouQPI/AAAAAAABYPk/hij2ZtITF1oJS8MRVEJsWAWkiaEeIalYgCLcBGAs/s400/imsages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter. Realm of no mind\u2014is pure\nconsciousness. You can create a gap in the mind stream simply by directing the\nfocus of your attention into the NOW.&nbsp;\nConsciousness enables us to think and at the same time observe our\nthinking process.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ChVeunA95J8/Wmm2MtXPBII/AAAAAAABYPo/nzFbjrGt-MgpUI8OidKpX9lkNTY3O5lgACLcBGAs/s1600/4f37815835aa1aee043246dfbabea8fc2--energy-quotes-mind-over-matter.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"480\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ChVeunA95J8/Wmm2MtXPBII/AAAAAAABYPo/nzFbjrGt-MgpUI8OidKpX9lkNTY3O5lgACLcBGAs/s400/4f37815835aa1aee043246dfbabea8fc2--energy-quotes-mind-over-matter.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain without\nconsciousness is inert and lifeless.&nbsp;\nConsciousness is a form of matter just as matter is a form of\nconsciousness. All atoms in the entire universe are capable of mind reading and\ncommunicating with other atoms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our consciousness is a cosmic DVD player. On\nthe subatomic level\u2014mind is over matter. The brain and DNA is governed by the\nlaws of quantum physics rather than the laws of biology or neurophysiology.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cosmic consciousness is the concept that the universe is a living superorganism\nwith which animals, including humans, interconnect, and form a collective\nconsciousness which spans the cosmos. Cosmic Consciousness lies in a mystic\nstate above and beyond Self-consciousness, which is an acute sense of\nself-awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is not\nlimited to the brain. The other chakras in our body are also conscious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How we think, feel and\nperceive ourselves to be gives power to our thoughts that organize the reality\nthat surrounds us.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bmgdI0LeL6s/Wmmx9OH4o8I/AAAAAAABYOg/iuX-So1QfVYNNXtq3UlMBMo46SImfyPogCLcBGAs/s1600/imuages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bmgdI0LeL6s/Wmmx9OH4o8I/AAAAAAABYOg/iuX-So1QfVYNNXtq3UlMBMo46SImfyPogCLcBGAs/s400/imuages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE LAST FRONTIER---THE\nNEW ERA, IS OF THE MIND . SO SAYS VEDANTA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no matter as\nsuch--matter exists because of an intelligent force which holds the spiralling\natoms -- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eenergy when slowed\ndown becomes coalesced matter which our 5 senses pick up--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YES-- THE HOLOGRAPHIC\nMIND IS THE MATRIX OF ALL MATTER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cEhBSWjNaiE/WmnRCf8xLbI/AAAAAAABYQE/Fncv3L2Tw-Uk6J9YQY-Lp2o1KszGSWOZwCLcBGAs/s1600/srimad-bhagaWvad-gita.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Yoga\ndescribes the mind as the creation of atma shakti or the &nbsp;creative power of consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the\nBhagavad Gita Krishna &nbsp;compares the mind\nto a chariot, the body and senses to the &nbsp;horses and the atma to the charioteer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hLQhGQFIeCU/WmpruIX1mrI/AAAAAAABYQc/_9XYWzT2_-g7TpT1ENP0sx5ABNRG6Io8wCLcBGAs/s1600/_home_hiranDyas_brightFuture_wiki_images_b186.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nare the three &nbsp;levels from which we\noperate. In swara yoga each level is associated with a specific nadi.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pingala\nis responsible for &nbsp;external awareness\nand motivating the body. Ida withdraws &nbsp;the\nmind and activates internal awareness. Sushumna is the &nbsp;passage of transcendental consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Kpji-ivRl2s/WmprBuWuvsI/AAAAAAABYQU/Xr5Fp-6RP2Q97JwDxo_R0gW7awDXWTLsQCLcBGAs/s1600/SurrEender_of_the_Ego.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"389\" data-original-width=\"480\" height=\"518\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Kpji-ivRl2s/WmprBuWuvsI/AAAAAAABYQU/Xr5Fp-6RP2Q97JwDxo_R0gW7awDXWTLsQCLcBGAs/s640/SurrEender_of_the_Ego.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5151564486355224252\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_101M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html?showComment=1516890679229#c5151564486355224252\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 25, 2018 at 8:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_101MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nYOU HAVE REACHED PART 91 OF SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nHOW MUCH HAVE YOU COVERED?<br />\n<br />\nYOU REALLY WANNA KNOW?<br />\n<br />\n4 %</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">VEDIC SRUTIS ON TANTRA ( QUANTUM IONIC CHARGE ) AND SWARA ( SECRETS OF BREATH ) WAS NOT BEEN PENNED DOWN IN 5000 BC -- SO AS NOT TO GIVE A MATCH STICK TO A MONKEY</span></span></div>\n<br />\nAll that exists in the three worlds rests in the control of prana. As a mother protects her children, O prana, protect us and give us splendor and wisdom.<br />\n\u2014Prashna Upanishad 2.13- 5000 BC<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\"Prana springs from the Atman and is as inseparable from the self as a shadow from he who casts the shadow.\" --Prashnopanishad (Ch. 3) --5000 BC<br />\n<br />\nWILL I WRITE ABOUT TANTRA AND PRANA FROM PARTS 92 TO 108 ?<br />\n<br />\nI DONT KNOW<br />\n<br />\nI LOOK FOR SIGNS !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
